3I kom nino dwe aboŋwen me dwe me aŋwen onoŋo kec odoko marac i
Jerucalem, ma omiyo cam pe dok nen pi lwak.
4 Ka gumuko cel me gaŋ woko, ci kabaka ki lwak lulweny ducu gumol gurmo
woko ki i dyewor, kun giwok ki i dog gaŋ ma i kin cel aryo me Jerucalem, ma i ŋet
poto pa kabaka, kadi onoŋo jo Kaldaya gurumo gaŋ woko. Gucito gulubo yo ma
dok tuŋ Araba.
5Ento mony pa jo kaldaya guryemo kor kabaka, ci gumake wa i bar me Jeriko; ci
monnye guket woko ducu ki i kome.
6Ka gumako kabaka, ci gukelo en bot kabaka me Babilon i Ribla, ka ma oŋolle iye
kop.
7Ka gucako neko awobe pa Jedekia woko ki i nyime ma wane neno, ka gikolo
wane giloyo woko, ka gitweye ki nyor, gitere kwede wa i Babilon.
Gitero jo Juda i opii
(2 Tek 36.17-21; Jer 39.8-10;52.12-30)
8I dwe me abic, i kom nino dwe me abirone, ma en aye mwaka me aboŋwenne me
loc pa kabaka Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon, en aye Nebujaradan ma ladit pa
lugwok kabaka, ma latic pa kabaka me Babilon, obino i Jerucalem.
9Ocako wano ot pa Rwot woko, ki ot pa kabaka, ki odi ducu ma tye i Jerucalem;
owaŋo odi madito woko ducu ki mac.
10Ki mony pa jo Kaldaya ducu, ma yam gitye kacel ki ladit pa lugwok kabaka,
gumuko kicika cel murumo Jerucalem woko.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
663
11Ki lwak ma yam gudoŋ i gaŋ, ki jo ma yam gukobo gigi kengi bot kabaka me
Babilon, kacel ki lwak ma gudoŋŋe ducu, Nebujaradan ma ladit pa lugwok kabaka
oterogi woko i opii.
12Ento owe ko lucan mogo gudoŋ i lobo wek gubed lugwok poto olok ki lupur ki
kweri dyaŋ.
13 Ki wir mola aryo ma yam gitye i ot pa Rwot, ki litino gadigadi ki nam me mola
ma yam gitye i ot pa Rwot, jo Kaldaya guturo, guŋido woko ka gutero molane wa i
Babilon.
14 Gutero lwak agulu ducu, ki akwaya latokke-gu, ki magac-gu ki atabo me odok
eceta, ki jami mola ducu ma yam gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot,
15ki weer me waŋo mac bene, ki becen-gu. Gin ma yam gitiyo ki jabu, ladit pa
lugwok kabaka otero macalo jabu, gin ma yam gitiyo ki ryal, otero macalo ryal.
16Lok ma dok i kom wir aryo-ni, ki nam acel, ki litino gadigadi ducu, ma yam
Solomon otiyo pi ot pa Rwot, pek me mola ma oa ki i kom jami magi ducu dwoŋ,
pe pimme.
17Bor pa wir acel romo futi pyeraryo wiye abiro. I wiye yam giketo iye lalukana
me mola, kun lalukana borre romo futi aŋwen ki nucu. I kom lalukana onoŋo
giketo iye obwo ki cal nyig okwer pomegranat, ma gin ducu gitiyogi ki mola, ma
girumo lalukana dyere. Wir me aryo bene rom ki lawote, kun tye ki obwone me
mola.
18Ladit pa lugwok kabaka otero Ceraya bene ma ajwaka madit, ki Jepania, ajwaka
me aryone, ki lukurdoggola me ot pa Rwot gin adek.
19Ka dok okwanyo ladit ma loyo lumony ki i dye gaŋ, ki lumemba abic me lukiko
pa kabaka ma onoŋogi i dye gaŋ; ki karan pa ladit me mony ma yam coko jo me
lobo pi lweny, ki jo pyerabic i kin wegi lobo ma ginoŋogi i dye gaŋ.
20Nebujaradan ladit pa lugwok kabaka omakogi, oterogi wa i Ribla bot kabaka me
Babilon.
21Kabaka me Babilon ocako nekogi woko ducu; onekogi i Ribla ma i lobo Kamat.
Jo Juda yam gikwanyogi woko ki i lobogi giterogi i opii kit meno.
Jo mudoŋ gulwi woko i Ejipt
(Jer 40.7-9;41.1-3)
22Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon oketo Gedalia wod pa Akikam ma wod pa
Capan me loyo jo mudoŋ i lobo Juda, ma yam owekogi gubwot.
23Ka ludito me mony ducu ma i kin gaŋi guwinyo ni kabaka me Babilon otyeko
keto Gedalia me bedo laloyo, ci gubino ki lwakgi bot Gedalia wa i Mijpa. Nyiŋgi
ene: Icmael wod pa Netania, Yokanan wod pa Karea, Ceraya wod pa Tankumet
ma jo Netopa, ki Jajania wod pa jo Maaka.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
664
24Gedalia ocako kwoŋo kwoŋ botgi ki bot lwakgi ducu kun wacci, “Pe wulwor
ludito tic pa jo Kaldaya. Wubed i lobo, wuti bot kabaka me Babilon, ci wubibedo
maber laboŋo ayela mo.”
25Ento i dwe me abiro, Icmael wod pa Netania, wod pa Elicama, ma tye i kaka pa
luker, obino kacel ki jo apar, ci gulwenyo ki Gedalia, guneko woko, kacel ki
Lujudaya ki jo Kaldaya ma gitye kwede i Mijpa.
26 Lacen lwak ducu, jo matino ki jo madito, ki ludito me mony gua gucito wa i
Ejipt, pien gulworo jo Kaldaya.
Giketo deyo bot Yekoyakin ki i Babilon
(Jer 52.31-34)
27I kare me mwaka pyeradek wiye abirone nia ma gitero kwede Yekoyakin
kabaka me Juda i opii, i dwe me apar wiye aryo, i kom nino dwe pyeraryo wiye
abiro, en aye Evil-merodak, kabaka me Babilon, otimo kica ki Yekoyakin kabaka
me Juda, ogonye woko ki i mabuc, i mwaka ma en ocamo iye ker.
28Obedo ka lok kwede mot maber, oketo en obedo i kom madit makato ducu ma i
kin kom pa luker ma onoŋo gibedo kwede i Babilon.
29Kit meno omiyo Yekoyakin olunyo boŋo mabuc mere woko, obedo ka cam i wi
meja pa kabaka jwijwi, pi kare me kwone ducu.
30Pi miye gin me konye kwede, kabaka dok obedo ka miye lim me tic kwede
jwijwi, nino ducu me kwo mere.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
665
1 Tekwaro
1 Tekwaro 1
Likwayo pa Adam
(Acak 5.1-32)
1Adam onywalo Ceji, Ceji onywalo Enoci, Enoci onywalo Kenan;
2Kenan onywalo Maalalel, Maalalel onywalo Jared;
3Jared onywalo Enoka, Enoka onywalo Metucela, Metucela onywalo Lamek;
4Lamek onywalo Nua, Nua onywalo Cem, Kam ki Yafeci.
Likwayo pa litino pa Nua
(Acak 10.1-32)
5Litino awobe pa Yafeci aye Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mecek ki Tirac,
6Litino awobe pa Gomer aye Acikenaj, Dipat ki Togarma,
7Litino awobe pa Javan gin Elica, Tarcic, Kitim ki Rodanim.
8Litino awobe pa Kam gin aye Kuc, Ejipt, Put ki Kanaan,
9Litino awobe pa Kuc aye Seba, Kavila, Cabta, Raama ki Cabteka, Litino awo be pa
Raama gin aye Ceba ki Dedan.
10Kuc onywalo mere Nimulodi; en aye okwoŋo bedo oteka i wi lobo.
11Likwayo pa Ejipt gin aye jo Lud, jo Anam, jo Leab, jo Naptuk,
12jo Patruc, jo Kacluk ki jo Kaptor, ma gin aye kaka ma jo Piliciti gua ki i komgi.
13Kanaan onywalo Cidon, latin kayone, ki Ket ma likwaye gilwoŋo ni jo Kit.
14Likwayo mu kene pa Kanaan gin aye jo Jebuc, jo Amor, jo Girgac,
15jo Kiv, jo Arki, jo Cin,
16jo Arvad, jo Jemar ki jo Kamat.
17Litino awo be pa Cem gin aye Elam, Acur, Arpakcad, Lud, Aram, Uj, Kul, Geter ki
Mecek.
18Arpakcad onywalo Cela, Cela onywalo Eber.
19Eber onywalo litino awobe aryo; acel nyiŋe Peleg, pien i karene aye gipoko iye
lobo, ki nyiŋ ominne onoŋo Yokotan.
20Yokotan onywalo Almodad, Celep, Kajarmavet, Jera,
21Adoram, Ujal, Dikla,
22Obal, Abimael, Ceba,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
666
23Opir, Kavila ki Jobab; magi ducu gin litino awobe pa Yokotan.
Likwayo pa Cem
(Acak 11.10-26)
24Cem onywalo Arkpacad, Arpakcad onywalo Cela, Cela onywalo Eber;
25Eber onywalo Peleg, Peleg onywalo Reu, Reu onywalo Cerug;
26Cerug onywalo Nakor, Nakor onywalo Tera;
27Tera onywalo Abram, meno aye Abraim.
Likwayo pa Icmael ki pa Ketula
(Acak 25.12-16)
28Litino awobe pa Abraim gin aye Icaka ki Icmael.
29Litino pa Icmael gin ene: Nebayof ma latin kayone, ki Kedar, Adbeel, Mibcam,
30Micima, Duma, Maca, Adad, Tema,
31Jetur, Napic ki Kedema. Jo magi ducu aye litino awobe pa Icmael.
32Litino awobe pa Ketula ma obedo dako pa Abraim ma aŋeca gin ene: en
onywalo Jimran, Yokocan, Medan, Midian, Icibak ki Cua, Litino awobe pa Yokocan
gin aye Ceba ki Dedan.
33Litino awobe pa Midian gin aye Epa, Eper, Kanok, Abida ki Eldaa, Magi ducu aye
likwayo pa Ketula.
Likwayo pa Ecau
(Acak 36.1-43)
34Abraim onywalo Icaka, Litino awobe pa Icaka gin aye Ecau ki Icrael.
35Litino awobe pa Ecau aye Erifaji, Reuel, Jeuc, Jalam ki Kora.
36Litino awobe pa Erifaji aye Teman, Omar, Jepi, Gatam, Kenaj, Timna ki Amalek.
37Litino awobe pa Reuel gin Nakat, Jera, Ca ma ki Mija.
38Litino awobe pa Ceir aye Lotan, Cobal, Jibeon, Aŋa, Dicon, Ejer ki Dican.
39Litino awobe pa Lotan aye Kori ki Komam; lamiŋ Lotan aye Timna.
40Litino awobe pa Co bal gin aye Alian, Manakat, Ebal, Cepi ki Onam, Litino
awobe pa Jibeon aye Aiya ki Aŋa.
41Latin awobi pa Aŋa aye Dicon, Litino awobe pa Dicon aye Kamram, Eciban,
Itran ki Keran.
42Litino awobe pa Ejer aye Bilan, Jaavan ki Jaakan, Litino awobe pa Dican aye Uj
ki Aran.
43Magi aye luker ma guloyo lobo Edom ma onoŋo pud peya kabaka mo oloyo jo
Icrael: Bela wod pa Beor ma nyiŋ gaŋ kalle Dinkaba.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
667
44Ka Bela oto, ci Jobab wod pa Jera me Bojra oleyo ka tyene.
45Ka Jobab oto, ci Kucam mua ki i lobo pa jo Teman oleyo ka tyene.
46Ka Kucam oto, ci Adad wod pa Bedad oleyo ka tyene. En aye yam olwenyo ki jo
Midian, ci oloyogi i lobo Moab; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle aye Avit.
47Ka Adad oto, ci Camla me Macireka oleyo ka tyene.
48Ka Camla oto, Caul me Rekobot ma tye i dog kulu Euprate oleyo ka tyene.
49Ka Caul oto, ci Baal-kanan wod pa Akbor oleyo ka tyene.
50Ka Baal-kanan oto, ci Adad oleyo ka tyene; nyiŋ gaŋ kalle Pai. Nyiŋ dakone
Meketabel nya pa Matred, ma nya pa Mejakab.
51Ci Adad oto woko. Rwodi ma i Edom gin ene: Timna, Alia, Jetet,
52Okolibama, Ela, Pinon,
53Kenaj, Teman, Mibjar,
54Magdiel ki Iram; magi aye rwodi ma i Edom.
1 Tekwaro 2
Litino awobe pa Icrael
(Acak 35.22-26)
1Magi aye litino awobe pa Icrael: Reuben, Cimeon, Levi, Juda, Icakar, Jabulon,
2Dan, Yucepu, Benjamin, Naputali, Gad ki Acer.
Likwayo pa Juda
3Litino awobe pa Juda gin aye Er, Onan ki Cela. Jomagi adek-ki Bat-Cua ma nya jo
Kanaan aye onywalogi. Er ma en aye latin kayo pa Juda obedo dano marac i wan
Rwot, omiyo Rwot oneke woko.
4Juda dok onywalo Perej ki Jera ki Tamar ma ci-wode; litino awobe pa Juda gin
ducu abic.
5Litino awobe pa Perej gin aye Kejeron ki Kamul.
6Litino awobe pa Jera aye Jimri, Etan, Eman, Kalkol ki Dara, gin ducu abic.
7 Latin awobi pa Karmi en aye Akar, layel Icrael, ma yam obalo i kom jami ma
gidyero bot Rwot.
8Wod pa Etan obedo Ajaria.
9Litino awobe pa Kejeron ma en onywalo gin aye Jeramel, Ram ki Kelubai.
10Ram onywalo Aminadab, Aminadab onywalo Calma,
11Calma onywalo Boaj,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
668
12Boaj onywalo Obed, Obed onywalo Yece,
13Yece onywalo Eliab ma latin kayone, me aryone Abinadab, me adekke Cimea,
14me 385 aŋwenne Netanel, me abicce Radai,
15me abicelle Ojem, me abirone Daudi.
16Lumegigi gin aye Jeruya ki Abigail. Litmo awobe pa Jeruya gin Abicai, Joab ki
Acael, gin adek.
17Abigail onywalo Amaca; won Amaca obedo Jeter ma jo Icmael.
18Kaleb wod pa Kejeron onywalo Jeriot ki dakone Ajuba. Litino awobe pa Ajuba
gin aye Jecer, Cobab ki Ardon.
19Ka Ajuba oto, Kaleb onyomo Eprat ma onywalo Kur.
20Kur onywalo Uri, Uri onywalo Bejalel.
21Lacen Kejeron obedo ki nya pa Makir ma won Gilead. Onyomo ma onoŋo
mwaka me ditte romo pyerabicel; dako meno onywalo Cegub.
22Cegub onywalo Jair ma yam obedo ki gaŋine pyeraryo wiye adek i lobo Gilead.
23Ento jo Gecur ki jo Aram gumayo gaŋi pa Jair ki bot wegine, kacel ki Kenat ki
gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, gaŋi ducu pyerabicel. Jo magi ducu gin likwayo pa Makir
ma won Gilead.
24Ka Kejeron doŋ oto, ci Kaleb obedo ki Eprata ma ci-wonne dako pa Kejeron, ci
onywalo kwede Acikur ma ocako gaŋ Tekoa.
25Litino awobe pa Jeramel ma latin pa Kejeron gin aye Ram ma latin kayone, ki
Buŋa, Oren, Ojem ki Akija.
26Jeramel onoŋo tye ki dakone mukene bene ma nyiŋe Atara; en aye min Onam.
27Litino awobe pa Ram ma latin kayo pa Jeramel gin aye Naaj, Jamin ki Eker.
28Litino awobe pa Onam gin aye Camai ki Jada. Litino awobe pa Camai aye Nadab
ki Abicur.
29Nyiŋ dako pa Abicur obedo Abikail; en aye onywalo Aban ki Molid.
30Litino awobe pa Nadab gin aye Celed ki Apaim. Celed oto ma pe ki latin mo.
31Latin awobi pa Apaim aye Ici. Latin awobi pa Ici aye Cecan. Latin awobi pa
Cecan en aye Aklai.
32Litino awobe pa Jada ma omin Camai gin aye Jeter ki Yonacan; Jeter oto ma pe
ki latin mo.
33Litino awobe pa Yonacan gin aye Pelet ki Jaja. Jo magi ducu gin likwayo pa
Jeramel.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
669
34Cecan yam pe ki litino awobe; onywalo anyira keken. Ento Cecan onoŋo tye ki
opiine ma Laejipt ma nyiŋe Jara.
35Cecan omiyo nyare mo bot opiine Jara, ci onywalo kwede Atai.
36Atai onywalo Natan, Natan onywalo Jabad.
37Jabad onywalo Eplal, Eplal onywalo Obed,
38Obed onywalo Yeko, Yeko onywalo Ajaria.
39Ajaria onywalo Kelej, ki Kelej onywalo Eleaca,
40Eleaca onywalo Cicimai, ki Cicimai onywalo Calum.
41Calum onywalo Jekamia, Jekamia onywalo Elicama.
42Litino awobe pa Kaleb ma omm Jeramel gin ene: Meca ma latin kayone obedo
won Jip. Latin awobi pa Jip aye Mareca ma won Kebron.
43Litino awobe pa Kebron aye Kora, Tapua, Rekem ki Cema.
44Cema onywalo Rakam ma won Jorkeam, Rekem onywalo Camai.
45Latin awobi pa Camai en aye Maon; Maon onywalo Beŋur.
46Kaleb obedo ki dako ma aŋeca bene ma nyiŋe Epa; en aye onywalo Karan, Moja
ki Gajej; Karan bene obedo ki wode ma nyiŋe Gajej.
47Litino awobe pa Jadai gin aye Regem, Yocam, Gecan, Pelet, Epa ki Caap.
48Maaka ma dako pa Kaleb ma aŋeca onywalo Ceber ki Tirkana.
49Dako meno bene dok onywalo Caap ma ocako gaŋ Madmana, ki Ceva ma ocako
gaŋi Makbena ki Gibea, Akaca obedo nya pa Kaleb.
50Jo man ducu gin likwayo pa Kaleb. Litino awobe pa Kur ma latin kayo pa Eprata
gin aye Cobal ma ocako gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Kiriat-jearim,
51Calma ma ocako Beterekem, ki Karep ma ocako Bet-gader.
52Likwayo pa Cobal ma ocako Kiriat-jearim gin aye jo Karoe ki nucu pa jo
Menukot.
53Doggola pa jo Kiriat-jearim ducu gin aye jo Itri, jo Put, jo Cumat ki jo Micra; jo
Jora ki jo Ectaol bene gua ki i kom jo meno.
54Likwayo pa Calma ma ocako gaŋ Beterekem gin aye jo Netopa, jo Atrotbet-joab,
nucu pa jo Manakat, ki jo Jora.
55Doggola pa lukaran bene ducu ma gibedo i Jabej gin aye jo Tira, io Cimea ki jo
Cuka. Magi aye jo Keni ma gunyomme ki jo ma i dog ot pa Rekab.
1 Tekwaro 3
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
670
Litino awobe pa Daudi
(2 Cam 3.2-5;5.13-16;1 Tek 14.3-7)
1Magi aye litino awobe pa Daudi ma en onywalo i Kebron: latin kayone aye
Amnon, ma minne obedo Akinoam me Jejreel; me aryone Daniel, ma minne
obedo Abigail me Karmel;
2me adekke obedo Abcalom, ma minne Maaka ma nya pa Talmai kabaka me
Gecur; me aŋwenne Adoniya, ma minne Kagit;
3me abicce Cepatia, ma minne Abital; me abicelle Itream, ma minne Egla.
4 Daudi onywalo jo abicelli i Kebron, ka ma yam obedo ka loc iye pi mwaka abiro
ki dwe abicel. Ka dok obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek.
5 Dano magi en onywalogi i Jerucalem: Cimea, Cobab, Natan ki Solomon; gin
aŋwen-ni ducu mingi Bat-cua ma nya Amiel.
6Ka dok onywalo Ibar, Elicama, Elipelet,
7Noga, Nepeg, Japia,
8Elicama, Eliada ki Elipelet, gin aboŋwen.
9Magi ducu gin litino awobe pa Daudi, ma pe gikwano iye litino pa mon aŋecane;
ki lamingi en aye Tamar.
Likwayo pa Solomon
10Likwayo pa Solomon gin ene: en onywalo wode Rekoboam, ma wode Abija, ma
wode Aca, ma wode Yekocapat,
11ma wode Joram, ma wode Akajia, ma wode Yoaci,
12ma wode Amajia, ma wode Ajaria, ma wode Yocam,
13ma wode Akaj, ma wode Kejekia, ma wode Manace,
14ma wode Amon, ma wode Yocia.
15Litino awobe pa Yocia gin aye Yokanan ma latin kayone, me aryone Yekoyakim,
me adekke Jedekia me aŋwenne Calum.
16Likwayo pa Yekoyakim gin ene: en onywalo wode Yekonia, ma wode Jedekia.
17Ka dok litino awobe pa Yekonia ma yam gitere i opii-ni gin ene: Cealtiel,
18Malkiram Pedaya, Cenajar, Jekamia, Kocama ki Nedabia.
19Litino awobe pa Pedaya gin aye Jerubabel ki Cimei. Litino awobe pa Jerubabel
aye Meculam ki Anania, ma lamingi aye Celomit;
20ki Kacuba, Okel, Berekia, Kacadia ki Jucab-keced, gin abic.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
671
21Likwayo pa Anania gin ene: en onywalo Pelatia ki Jecaya, ma wode Repaya, ma
wode Aman, ma wode Obadia, ma wode Cekania.
22Latin awobi pa Cekania aye Cemaya, Ki litino awobe pa Cemaya gin aye Katuc,
Igal, Baria, Nearia ki Capat, gin abicel.
23Litino awobe pa Nearia gin aye Elioenai, Kijikia ki Ajrikam, gin adek.
24Litino awo be pa Elioenai gin aye Kodavia, Eliacib, Pelaya, Akub, Yokanan,
Delaya ki Anani, gin abiro.
1 Tekwaro 4
Likwayo pa Juda
1Litino awobe pa Juda aye Perej, Kejeron, Karmi, Kur ki Cobal.
2Reaya ma wod pa Cobal onywalo Jakat, Jakat onywalo Akumai ki Lakad. Meno
aye doggola pa jo Jora.
3Magi aye litino awobe pa Etam: Jejreel, Icima ki Idibac; nyiŋ lamingi obedo
Kajelelponi.
4Penuel ocako gaŋ Gedor, ki Ejer ocako gaŋ Kuca. Magi aye litino awobe pa Kur
ma obedo latin kayo pa minne Eprata; en aye ocako Beterekem.
5Acikur ma ocako gaŋ Tekoa, yam tye ki mon aryo, Kela ki Naara.
6Naara onywalo Akujam, Keper, Temeni ki Akactari. Meno aye litino awobe pa
Naara.
7Litino awobe pa Kela gin aye Jeret, Ijar ki Etanan.
8Koj onywalo Anub ki Jobeba; jo me doggola pa Akarkel ma wod pa Karum ducu
gubedo likwaye.
9Jabej onoŋo giworo maka to omegine ducu. Minne ocako nyiŋe Jabej kun wacci,
“Pien anywale ki arem madwoŋ.”
10Jabej okok bot Lubaŋa me Icrael kun wacci, “Tim ber, imiya gum ci imi wan
lobona obed malac. Bed kweda, igwoka i kom gin marac ducu wek pe otima
malit.” Ci Lubaŋa oye gin ma en olego.
11Kelub ma omin Cuka onywalo Mekir, Mekir onywalo Eciton.
12Eciton onywalo Bet-rapa, Pacea ki Tekina ma ocako gaŋ ma gilwoŋo Ir-Nakac,
Magi aye jo Reka.
13Litino awobe pa Kenaj gin aye Otiniel gin ki Ceraya. Litino awobe pa Otiniel aye
Katat ki Meonatai.
14Meonatai onywalo Opra, ki Ceraya onywalo Joab ma ocako nota pa lutic diro.
Gin mumiyo gilwoŋo kit meno, pien gin ducu lutic diro.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
672
15Litino awobe pa Kaleb ma wod pa Jepune gin aye Iru, Ela ki Naam. Latin awobi
pa Ela aye Kenaj.
16Litino awobe pa Jekalelel gin aye Jip, Jipa, Tiria ki Acarel.
17Litino awobe pa Ejra gin aye Jeter, Mered, Eper ki Jalon. Mered onyomo Bitia
ma nya pa Parao; en ogamo ci onywalo nyare Miriam ki litino awobe aryo, Camai
ki Iciba ma ocako gaŋ Ectemoa.
18Ki dakone ma Lajuda Mered dok onywalo Jered ma ocako gaŋ Gedor, Keber ma
ocako gaŋ Coko, ki Jekutiel ma ocako gaŋ Janoa.
19Litino awobe pa dako pa Kodia ma lamiŋ Nakam gunywalo jo magi, Keila ma
obedo kwaro pa jo Garmi, ki Ectemoa ma obedo kwaro pa jo Maaka.
20Litino awobe pa Cimon gin aye Amnon, Rina, Ben-kanan ki Tilon. Litino awobe
pa Ici gin aye Joket ki Ben-joket.
Likwayo pa Cela
21Likwayo pa Cela ma wod pa Juda aye Er ma ocako gaŋ Leka, Laada ma ocako
gaŋ Mareca, ki doggola pa lucwe boŋo camanini ducu ma gibedo i Bet-acibea;
22ki Jokim, ki jo Koceba, ki Yoaci, ki Carap ma yam obedo laloc i Moab ka dok
odwogo obedo i Beterekem. (Meno lok macon twatwal.)
23Jo-nu aye lucwe agulu, ki jo ma gubedo i Netaim ki i Gedera. Onoŋo gibedo
kunnu kacel ki kabaka pi tiyo ticce.
Likwayo pa Cimeon
24Litino awobe pa Cimeon gin aye Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Jera ki Caul.
25Caul onywalo wode Calum, ma wode Mibcam, ma wode Micima.
26Litino awobe pa Micima gin aye wode Kamuel, ma wode Jakur, ma wode Cimei.
27Cimei onoŋo tye ki awobene apar wiye abicel ki anyirane abicel; ento omegine
pe gubedo ki litino mapol, kadi wa ludoggolagi ducu pe gunya mapol ma rom ki jo
Juda.
28 Gin yam gibedo i Beer-ceba, Molada, Kajar-cual,
29Bila, Ejem, Tolad,
30Becweri, Korma, Jiklag,
31Bet-markabot, Kajar-cucim, Bet-biri ki Caaraim. Magi aye obedo gaŋigi nio wa i
kare me loc pa Daudi.
32Kabedo mukene ma gin gubedo iye gin aye Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Token ki Acan,
gagi ducu abic,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
673
33kacel ki gagi matino ma orumo gagi man ducu nio kwede wa i Baalat, Magi aye
kabedogi, dok gin aye gubedo ki buk me tekwarogi.
34Mecobab, Jamlek, Joca ma wod pa Amajia,
35Joel, Yeko ma wod pa Jocibia, wod pa Ceraya, ma wod pa Aciel,
36Elionia, Jaakona, Jecokaya, Acaya, Adiel, Jecimiel, Benaya,
37Jija wod pa Cipi ma wod pa Alon, wod pa Jedaya, wod pa Cimri, ma wod pa
Cemaya,
38jo magi ducu ma gicoyo nyiŋgi malo-ni gin aye lutel me doggolagi. Dog odi pa
kwarogi onya madwoŋ,
39ci gucako wot nio wa i yo ma donyo i Gerar, kun girabo dog nota yo tuŋ wokceŋ
pi yenyo ka kwayo romigi ki dyegigi.
40Gunoŋo kakwat maber kunnu ma lum olot iye madwoŋ, lobone bene lac ma
obedo mot ki kuc. Jo ma gukwoŋo bedo kunnu aye jo Kam.
41Jo meno ma gicoyo nyiŋgi-ni guo kunnu i kare pa Kejekia kabaka me Juda, ci
guneko jo Kam woko, kacel ki jo Meuni ma gunoŋo kunnu, gutyekogi woko liweŋ
nio wa i kare-ni, Kit meno guleyo kabedogi woko, pien onoŋo ka kwayo romigi ki
dyegigi tye kunnu maber.
42Jo mogo ma i kingi, jo Cimeon ma giromo miya abic, gucito wa i got Ceir kun
gitye ki jo magi ma lutel wigi: Pelatia, Nearia, Repaya ki Ujiel ma gin litino awobe
pa Ici.
43Guneko jo Amalek ma yam guriŋo ci gubwot ma gudoŋ kunnu, ci gucako bedo
kunnu nio wa onyoo.
1 Tekwaro 5
Likwayo pa Reuben
1 Man lok kom likwayo pa Reuben ma latin kayo pa Icrael. En aye latin kayo, ento
otimo kir pi bedo ki ci-wonne. Pi meno ditte me anywalli gimiyo bot litino awobe
pa Yucepu wod pa Icrael, pe doŋ gicoyo nyiŋe i buk me tekwaro ma lubo kit ma
ginywale kwede.
2 Dok kadi bed Juda yam obedo oteka i kin omegine, dok laker bene onoŋŋe ki i
kin likwaye, ento dit me anywalli onoŋo tye bot Yucepu.
3Litino awobe pa Reuben ma latin kayo pa Icrael gin aye Kanok, Pallu, Kejeron ki
Karmi.
4Litino awobe pa Joel gin ene: wode obedo Cemaya, ma wode Gog, ma wode
Cimei,
5ma wode Mika, ma wode Reaya, ma wode Baal,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
674
6 ma wode Beera ma yam Tiglat-pilecer kabaka me Aciria otero woko i opii; en
yam obedo ladit pa jo Reuben.
7Lukakagi yam gicoyo tekwarogi kun lubo yalwakgi ki doggolagi, gin ene: laditgi
Jeyel, ki Jekaria,
8ki Bela wod pa Ajaj ma wod pa Joel; en yam bedo i Aroer, ma lobone oo wa i
Nebo ki Baal-meon.
9En yam obedo bene yo tuŋ wokceŋ ma lobone o wa i dog tim ma i ŋet kutu
Euprate tuŋ kany, pien onoŋo doŋ limgi onya madwoŋ i lobo Gilead.
10I kare pa Caulo gubedo ka lweny ki jo Agri ci gunekogi, ka gucako bedo i kemagi
i lobo ducu ma i ŋet lobo Gilead yo tuŋ wokceŋ.
Likwayo pa Gad
11Likwayo pa Gad gubedo i lobo Bacan nio kwede wa i Caleka, kun gukemme ki jo
Reuben.
12Joel obedo laditgi, me aryone Capamo Janai ki Capat bene gubedo i Bacan.
13Lukakagi gupokke i doggola mapatpat ma kwarogi obedo Mikael, Meculam,
Ceba, Jorai, Jakan, Jia ki Eber, gin abiro.
14Magi aye gubedo likwayo pa Abikail wod pa Kuri, ma wod pa Jaroa, wod pa
Gilead, wod pa Mikael, wod pa Jecicai, wod pa Jado, wod pa Buj.
15Aki wod pa Abdiel ma wod pa Guni, en aye obedo ladit ma loyo dog odi pa
kwarogi.
16Gin gubedo i Gilead, i Bacan ki i gaŋi ma i lobo meno, ki i kakwat ducu ma i lobo
Caron, nio wa i waŋ lobo kikome.
17Jo magi ducu gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro i kare pa Yocam kabaka me Juda,
ki i kare pa Jeroboam kabaka me Icrael.
Lok kom kaka aryo ki nucu
18Jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad, ki nucu kaka pa Manace yam gitye ki twoni oteka
lweny ma gitye ki kwotgi ki pala lucwangi, ma gutelo atumgi bene, ma gin oyita
lweny, dano alip pyeraŋwen wiye aŋwen, ki miya abiro ki pyerabicel ma guyubbe
pi lweny.
19Gulwenyo ki Jekur, Napic ki Nodab, ma gin jo Agri.
20Lubaŋa okonyogi ka lweny kwedgi, pien gukok bote i kare ma gilwenyo, ci en
oye legagi pien onoŋo gigene, ci omiyo jo Agri ki lwakgi ducu i ciŋgi.
21Guyako limgi makwo ma romo kinaga alip pyerabic kulu, romi alip miya aryo ki
pyerabic, ki kana alip aryo, kacel ki dano alip miya acel ma guyakogi makwo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
675
22Guneko jo mapol, pien mony meno obedo mony pa Lubaŋa. Ci gubedo i lobo pa
jo-nu nio wa i kare ma giterogi i opii.
23Jo me nucu kaka pa Manace gubedo i lobo meno. Gubedo mapol mada cakke ki i
lobo Bacan nio kwede wa i Baal-kermon, Cenir ki got Kermon
24Magi aye ludito wi kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi: Eper, Ici, Eliel, Ajriel, Jeremia,
Kodavia ki Jadiel, twoni oteka lweny ma nyiggi oywek, ma gin aye ludito i odi pa
kwarogi.
25Ento guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa pa kwarogi, gubedo ka woro lubaŋa pa jo me lobo
meno ki tim kwele kwele-gu, gin jo ma onoŋo Lubaŋa otyekogi woko ki i nyimgi.
26 Pi meno Lubaŋa opiyo Pul kabaka me Aciria, ma en aye Tiglat-Pilecer kabaka
me Aciria, ci oterogi i opii, gin jo Reuben, jo Gad ki nucu kaka pa jo Manace.
Oterogi wa i Kalak, Kabor, Kara ki i kulu Gojan, pud gitye kunnu nio wa onyoo.
1 Tekwaro 6
Likwayo pa Levi
1Litino awobe pa Levi gin aye Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
2Litino awobe pa Kokat aye Amram, Ijur, Kebron ki Ujiel.
3Litino pa Amram aye Aron, Moses ki Miriam. Litino awobe pa Aron gin aye
Nadab, Abiu, Eleajar ki Itamar.
4Eleajar onywalo Finekaci, Finekaci onywalo Abicua,
5Abicua onywalo Buki, Buki onywalo Uji,
6Uji onywalo Jerakia, Jerakia onywalo Merayot,
7Merayot onywalo Amaria, Amaria onywalo Akitub,
8Akitub onywalo Jadok, Jadok onywalo Akimaj,
9Akimaj onywalo Ajaria, Ajaria onywalo Yokanan,
10Yokanan onywalo Ajaria, ma en aye obedo ajwaka ma tiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ma
yam Solomon ogero i Jerucalem.
11Ajaria onywalo Amaria, Amaria onywalo Akitub,
12Akitub onywalo Jadok, Jadok onywalo Calum,
13Calum onywalo Ilkia, Ilkia onywalo Ajaria,
14Ajaria onywalo Ceraya, Ceraya onywalo Yekojadak.
15Yekojadak gitero woko i opii i kare ma Rwot omiyo Nebukadnejar otero jo Juda
ki jo Jerucalem i opii.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
676
16 Litino awobe pa Levi aye Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
17Magi aye nyig litino awobe pa Gercom: Libni ki Cimei.
18Litino awobe pa Kokat gin aye Amram, Ijar, Kebron ki Ujiel.
19Litino awobe pa Merari aye Makali ki Muci. Magi aye doggola pa jo Levi, ma
lubo kwarogi.
20Likwayo pa Gercom gin ene: en onywalo wode Libni, ma wode Jakat, ma wode
Jima,
21ma wode Joa, ma wode Iddo, ma wode Jera, ma wode Jeaterai.
22Likwayo pa Kokat gin ene: en onywalo wode Aminadab, ma wode Kera, ma
wode Acir,
23ma wode Elkana, ma wode Ebiacap, ma wode Acir,
24ma wode Takat, ma wode Uriel, ma wode Ujia, ma wode Caul.
25Likwayo pa Elkana gin aye Amacai ki Akimot,
26ma wode Elkana, ma wode Jopai, ma wode Nakat,
27ma wode Eliab, ma wode Jerokam, ma wode Elkana.
28Litino awobe pa Camuel gin aye Joel ma latin kayone, ki me rayone Abija.
29Likwayo pa Merari gin ene: en onywalo Makali ma wode Libni, ma wode Cimei,
ma wode Uja,
30ma wode Cimea, ma wode Kagia, ma wode Acaya.
Luwer i ot pa Lubaŋa ma Daudi oketogi
31Magi aye jo ma Daudi oketogi me loyo tic me wer i ot pa Lubaŋa, i ge kare ma
gitero canduk pa Rwot giketo obedo iye.
32Ticgi obedo me wer i nyim kema, ma en aye kema me rwatte, nio wa i kare ma
Solomon doŋ ogero ot pa Rwot i Jerucalem; gubedo ka tiyo ticgi kun gilubo cik
ma gimiyogi.
33Magi aye nyig dano ma gitiyo tic meno, ki nyig likwayogi. Likwayo pa Kokat gin
ene: Eman ma lawer, ma wod pa Joel, wod pa Camuel,
34wod pa Elkana, wod pa Jerokam, wod pa Eliel, wod pa Toa,
35wod pa Jup, wod pa Elkana, wod pa Makat, wod pa Amacai,
36wod pa Elkana, wod pa Joel, wod pa Ajaria, wod pa Jepania,
37wod pa Takat, wod pa Acir, wod pa Ebiacap, wod pa Kora,
38wod pa Ijar, wod pa Kokat, wod pa Levi, wod pa Icrael;
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
677
39ki ominne Acap ma yam Cuŋ ka gete tuŋ bade malacuc, en aye Acap ma wod pa
Berekia, wod pa Cimea,
40wod pa Mikael, wod pa Baaceya, wod pa Malkija,
41wod pa Etini, wod pa Jera, wod pa Adaya,
42wod pa Etan, wod pa Jima, wod pa Cimei,
43wod pa Jakat, wod pa Gercom, wod pa Levi.
44Omegigi ma likwayo pa Merari yam gicuŋ tuŋ lacam; gin ene: Etan wod pa Kici,
wod pa Abdi, wod pa Maluk,
45wod pa Kacabia, wod pa Amajia, wod pa Ilkia,
46wod pa Amji, wod pa Bani, wod pa Cemer,
47wod pa Makali, wod pa Muci, wod pa Merari, wod pa Levi.
48Yam giketo omegigi mukene ma gin Lulevi me tiyo tic ducu ma i kema, ma en
aye ot pa Lubaŋa.
Likwayo pa Aron
49Ento Aron ki awobene aye gityero gityer i wi keno tyer me gitum awaŋa, ki i
keno tyer me waŋo odok eceta. Gin aye onoŋo gitiyo tic ducu ma i kabedo maleŋ
makato ducu, ki tic me kwanyo bal ki i kom jo Icrael, kit ma Moses latic pa
Lubaŋa yam ociko kwede ducu.
50Magi aye likwayo pa Aron: en onywalo wode Eleajar, ma wode Finekaci, ma
wode Abicua,
51ma wode Buki, ma wode Uji, ma wode Jerakia,
52ma wode Merayot, ma wode Amaria, ma wode Akitub,
53ma wode Jadok, ma wode Akimaj.
Gaoi pa Lulevi
(Yoc 21.1-42)
54Magi aye kabedo ma likwayo pa Aron ma i doggola pa jo Kokat yam gubedo iye,
ma oporo kit bedogi ki wan lobogi, kit ma kwir opoto kwede:
55yam gimiyo botgi Kebron ma i lobo Juda, kacel ki olet ma orumo ducu;
56ento potti ducu ma tye pi gaŋ meno, ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, onoŋo gimiyogi
woko bot Kaleb wod pa Jepune.
57Ka dok likwayo pa Aron gimiyo botgi Kebron ma en aye gaŋ me laro lunek
dano, Libna ki olette bene, Jatir, Ectemoa ki olette,
58Kilen ki olette, Debir ki olette,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
678
59Acan ki olette, ki Bet-cemec ki olette.
60Ka dok gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki i lobo me kaka pa Benjamin:
Geba ki olette, Alemet ki olette, Anatot ki olette. Kumeno gaŋi ma i doggolagi
ducu onoŋo giromo apar wiye adek.
61Jo Kokat mudoŋ gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar ma gipokogi ki kwir, ma gikwanyogi ki
bot nucu kaka pa Manace.
62Jo Gercom gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar wiye adek macalo doggolagi tye, ma
gikwanyo ki i kaka pa Icakar, Acer, Naputali ki Manace i lobo Bacan.
63Jo Merari gimiyo botgi gaŋi apar wiye aryo macalo doggolagi tye, ma gikwanyo
ki i kaka pa Reuben, Gad ki Jabulon.
64Kit meno jo Icrael gumiyo gaŋi bot jo Levi kacel ki oletgi ducu, wek gubed iye.
65Gumiyo botgi gaŋi ma gicoyo nyiŋgi malo-ni ma gikwanyogi ki bot kaka pa Juda,
Cimeon ki Benjamin kun gibolo kwir.
66Ka dok doggola mogo pa likwayo pa Kokat gimiyo botgi gaŋi ma gikwanyo ki
bot kaka pa Epraim.
67Gimiyo botgi Cekem ma en aye gaŋ me laro lunek dano ma i lobo godi me
Epraim, ki olette, Gejer ki olette,
68Jokmeam ki olette, Bet-koron ki olette,
69Aijalon ki olette, Gat-Rimmon ki olette.
70Ka dok doggola pa jo Kokat mudoŋŋe ducu gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma
gikwanyo ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace: Aner ki olette, Bileam ki olette.
71Jo pa Gercom gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot nucu kaka pa Manace:
Golan ma i Bacan ki olette, Acitarot ki olette;
72ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Icakar: Kedec ki olette, Daberat ki
olette,
73Ramot ki olette, Anem ki olette;
74ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Acer: Macal ki olette, Abudon ki
olette,
75Kukok ki olette, Rekob ki olette;
76ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Naputali: Kedec ma i Galilaya ki
olette, Kamon ki olette, Kiriataim ki olette.
77Jo pa Merari mudoŋ gimiyo botgi gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa
Jabulon kun gibolo kwir: Rimmono ki olette, Tabor ki olette;
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
679
78ka dok i loka kulu Jordan yo tuŋ wokceŋ ma cok ki Jeriko gimiyo botgi gaŋi
magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Reuben: Bejer ma i tim aroo kacel ki olette, Jaja
ki olette,
79Kedemot ki olette, Mepaat ki olette;
80ka dok gaŋi magi ma gikwanyo ki bot kaka pa Gad: Ramot ma i Gilead ki olette,
Makanaim ki olette,
81Kecbon ki olette, Jajer ki olette.
1 Tekwaro 7
Likwayo pa Icakar
1Litino awobe pa Icakar aye Tola, Puwa, Jacub ki Cimron, gin aŋwen.
2Litino awobe pa Tola aye Uji, Repaya, Jeriel, Jamai, Ibcam ki Cemuel, Gin aye
ludito kaka pa jo Tola ki i odi pa kwarogi ma gubedo twoni oteka lweny i
yalwakgi. I kare pa Daudi welgi oromo alip pyeraryo wiye aryo ki miya abicel.
3Latin awobi pa Uji aye Ijrakia. Litino awobe pa Ijrakia aye Mikael, Obadia, Joel ki
Icia, gin abic, ma gin ducu jo madito.
4Ka dok onoŋo tye lwak buca mony pa lulweny ma gicoyo nyiŋgi ma lubo
yalwakgi ma i dog odi pa kwarogi; welgi obedo alip pyeradek wiye abicel, pien
onoŋo gitye ki mon mapol ki litino awobe mapol.
5Lukakagi ma i doggola pa Icakar ducu onoŋo giromo twoni oteka lweny alip
pyeraboro wiye abiro ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi.
Likwayo pa Benjamin
6Litino awobe pa Benjamin gin aye Bela, Beker ki Jediael, gin adek.
7Litino awobe pa Bela aye Ejibon, Uji, Ujiel, Jerimot ki Iri, gin abic, ma gin ducu
ludito wi kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka lweny, I kare ma yam gicoyo
nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro, welgi oromo alip pyeraryo wiye aryo ki pyeradek wiye
aŋwen.
8Litino awobe pa Beker gin aye Jemira, Yoaci, Eliejer, Elioenai, Omri, Jeremot,
Abija, Anatot ki Alemet; jo magi ducu gin awobe pa Beker.
9Yam gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro ma lubo yalwakgi, kun gin ludito wi kaka i
odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka lweny; welgi onoŋo romo alip pyeraryo ki miya aryo.
10Latin awobi pa Jediael aye Bilan. Litino awobe pa Bilan aye Jeuc, Benjamin,
Ekud, Kenaana, Jetan, Tarcic ki Akicakar.
11Magi ducu likwayo pa Jediael ma gin ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, twoni oteka
lweny; welgi oromo alip apar wiye abiro ki miya aryo ma guyubbe pi lweny.
12Cupim ki Kupim gin aye litino awobe pa Ir, Kucim obedo latin awobi pa Aker.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
680
Likwayo pa Naputali
13Litino awobe pa Naputali gin aye Jajiel, Guni, Jejer ki Calum, gin aye likwayo pa
Bila.
Likwayo pa Manace
14Litino awo be pa Manace aye Aciriel ki Makir ma obedo won Gilead. Gin aryo
ducu dako aŋecane ma anyira jo Aram aye onywalogi.
15Makir onyomo dako ki Kupim ki Cupim bene. Nyiŋ laminne aye Maaka. Nyiŋ
wode me aryone Jelopekad. Jelopekad onywalo anyira keken.
16Maaka ma dako pa Makir onywalo wode ma ocako nyiŋe Perec; nyiŋ ominne
Cerec. Litino awobe pa Perec aye Ulam ki Rakem.
17Latin awobi pa Ulam aye Bedan. Magi gin likwayo pa Gilead wod pa Makir, ma
wod pa Manace.
18Kamoleket ma lamiŋ Gilead onywalo Icikod, Abiejer ki Makala.
19Litino awobe pa Cemida gin aye Akian, Cekem, Liki ki Aniam.
Likwayo pa Epraim
20Likwayo pa Epraim gin aye Cutela ma wode Bered, ma wode Takat, ma wode
Eleada, ma wode Takat,
21ma wode Jabad, ma wode Cutela. Litino awobe mukene pa Epraim aye Ejer ki
Elead ma jo Gat ma gin wegi lobo-nu guneko woko i kare ma awo be-nu gucito ka
yako dyaŋigi.
22Wongi Epraim obedo ka kokogi pi kare malac, dok omegine bene gubino ka
kweyo cwinye.
23Lacen Epraim obedo ki dakone ci dako ogamo, onywalo wode. Wonne ocako
nyiŋe Beria, pien onoŋo can opoto i ode.
24Nyare obedo Ceera; en aye ogero gaŋ Bet-koron mapiny ki mamalone bene, ki
Ujen-Ceera.
25Wod pa Beria aye Repa ma wode Recep, ma wode Tela, ma wode Takan,
26ma wode Ladan ma wode Amikud, ma wode Elicama,
27ma wode Nun, ma wode Yocwa.
28Lobogi ki kabedogi gin aye Betel ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, ka dok yo tuŋ wokceŋ
Naaran, ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ Gejer ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Cekem ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Aya ki
gaŋi ma i ŋete:
29ka dok i wan lobo pa jo Manace, Bet-cean ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Taanak ki gaŋi ma i
ŋete, Megido ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Dor ki gaŋi ma i ŋete, Likwayo pa Yucepu wod pa
Icrael yam gubedo i kabedo magi.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
681
Likwayo pa Acer
30Litino awobe pa Acer gin aye Imna, Iciva, Icivi, Beria ki Cera ma lamingi.
31Litino awobe pa Beria gin aye Keber ki Malkiel ma ocako gaŋ Bir-jait.
32Keber onywalo Japulet, Gomer, Kotam ki Cua ma lamingi.
33Litino awobe pa Japulet aye Racak, Bimal ki Acivat. Magi gin Iiiino pa Japulet.
34Litino awobe pa ominne Cemer aye Roga, Jekuba ki Aram.
35Litino awobe pa ominne Keler gin aye Jopa, Imna. Celec ki Ama!.
36Litino awobe pa Jopa aye Cua, Kameper, Cual, Beri, Imra,
37Bejer, Kod, Cama, Ciloa, Itran ki Beera.
38Litino awobe pa Jeter aye Jepune, Picpa ki Ara,
39Litino awobe pa Ula aye Ara, Kaniel ki Rijia.
40Magi ducu jo pa Acer, ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, jo ma giyerogi, twoni oteka
lweny, jo madito i kin lutel wi kaka. I kare ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwaro pi
tic i lweny, welgi onoŋo romo alip pyeraryo wiye abicel.
1 Tekwaro 8
Likwayo pa Benjamin
1Benjamin onywalo Bela ma latin kayone, me aryone Acibel, me adekke Akara,
2me aŋwenne Noka, me abicce Rapia.
3Bela onywalo litino awobe bene ma gin aye Adar, Gera, Abikud,
4Abicua, Naaman, Akoa,
5Gera, Cepupan ki Kuram.
6Magi aye likwayo pa Ekud; gin gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i kin jo ma
yam gibedo i Geba, ma giterogi i opii wa i Manakat. Gin ene:
7Naaman, Akija ki Gera, ma en aye Keglam, ma obedo won Uja ki Akikud.
8Cakaraim onywalo litino awobe i lobo Moab, ma doŋ otyeko ryemo monne
Kucim ki Baara woko.
9Onywalo litino awobe ki dakone Kedec, gin aye Jobab, Jibia, Meca, Malkam,
10Jeuj, Cakia ki Mirma. Magi aye litino awobene ma gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa
kwarogi.
11Cakaraim onywalo litino awobe bene ki dakone Kucim, gin aye Abitub ki Elpaal.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
682
12Litino awobe pa Elpaal aye Eber, Micam ki Cemed. Cemed ogero gaŋ Ono, ki
Lod, ki gaŋi ma i ŋete.
13Beria ki Cema aye gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i kin jo ma gibedo i
Aijalon, ma guryemo jo ma yam gubedo i Gat woko.
14Akio, Cacak, Jeremot,
15Jebedia, Arad, Eder,
16Mikael, Icipa ki Joka gin aye likwayo pa Beria.
17Jebadia, Meculam, Kijiki, Keber,
18Icimerai, Ijilia ki Jobab gin aye likwayo pa Elpaal.
19Jakim, Jikri, Jabdi,
20Elienai, Jiletai, Eliel,
21Adaya, Beraya ki Cimrat aye likwayo pa Cimei.
22Icipan, Eber, Eliel,
23Abudon, Jikri, Kanan,
24Anania, Elam, Antotija,
25Ipedaya ki Penuel gin aye likwayo pa Cacak,
26Camcerai, Cekaria, Atalia,
27Jarecia, Elia ki Jikri gin aye likwayo pa Jerokam.
28Jo magi gubedo ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi i yalwakgi; gin jo madito. Jo magi
ducu gubedo i Jerucalem.
Tekwaro pa Caulo
29Jeyel ma ocako gaŋ Gibeon yam bedo i Gibeon. Nyiŋ dakone Maaka.
30Latin awobine me kayo aye Abudon, ka dok Jur. Kic, Baal, Nadab,
31Gedor, Akio, Jeker,
32ki Miklot, ma en aye won Cimea. Jo magi bene kacel ki lukakagi yam gubedo ma
gukemme ki lukakagi ma gibedo i Jerucalem.
33Ner onywalo Kic. Kic onywalo Caulo, Caulo onywalo Yonacan, Malkicua,
Abinadab, ki Ecibaal.
34Yonacan onywalo Meribaal, Meribaal onywalo Mika.
35Litino awobe pa Mika aye Piton, Melek, Tarea ki Akaj:
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
683
36Akaj onywalo Yekoada, Yekoada onywalo Alemet, Ajimavet ki Jimri. Jimri
onywalo Moja,
37Moja onywalo Binea ma wode Rapa, ma wode Eleaca, ma wode Ajel.
38Ajel yam tye ki litino awobe abicel ma nyiŋgi ene: Ajrikam, Bokeru, Icmael,
Cearia, Obadia ki Kanan. Jo magi ducu aye litino awobe pa Ajel.
39Litino awobe pa ominne Ecek gin ene: Ulam ma latin kayone, me aryone Jeuc,
me adekke Elipelet.
40Litino awobe pa Ulam yam gin twoni oteka lweny, wegi atum, ma litino
awobegi ki likwayogi pol mada, gin ducu miya acel ki pyerabic. Jo magi ducu gin
jo pa Benjamin.
1 Tekwaro 9
Dano ma gudwogo cen ki i Babilon
1Yam gicoyo nyiŋ jo Icrael ducu i buk me tekwarogi, ma gicoyogi i buk pa Luker
me Icrael. Jo Juda yam giterogi i opii i Babilon pien onoŋo guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa.
2 Jo ma gukwono dwogo cen ka bedo i dul lobo ma yam gimiyo botgi i gaŋigi gin
aye jo Icrael kacel ki ajwagi pa Lubaŋa, Lulevi, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
3Jo mogo me kaka pa Juda, Benjamin, Epraim ki Manace gucako bedo i Jerucalem.
4Gin aye Utai wod pa Amikud, ma wod pa Omri, wod pa Imri, wod pa Bani ki i kin
likwayo pa Perej ma wod pa Juda.
5Dok i kin likwayo pa Cela, Acaya ma latin kayo ki litino awobene.
6Ki i kin likwayo pa Jera, Jeuel ki lukakagi, gin miya abicel ki pyeraboŋwen noŋo.
7Ki i kin jo Benjamin Calu ma wod pa Meculam, wod pa Kodavia, wod pa Kacenua.
8Ibneya wod pa Jerokam, Ela wod pa Uji ma wod pa Mikri, ki Meculam wod pa
Cepatia ma wod pa Reuel, wod pa Ibinija,
9kacel ki lukakagi ma lubo yalwakgi, dano miya aboŋwen ki pyerabic wiye abicel.
Gin ducu ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi.
10Ajwagi pa Lubaŋa ma gudwogo cen ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Jedaya,
Jekoyarib, Jakin
11ki Ajaria wod pa Ilkia ma wod pa Meculam, wod pa Jadok, wod pa Merayot, wod
pa Akitub, ma en aye ladit ma loyo ot pa Lubaŋa;
12ki Adaya wod pa Jerokam ma wod pa Packur, wod pa Malkija; ki Maacai wod pa
Adiel ma wod pa Jakajera, wod pa Meculam, wod pa Mecilemit, wod pa Imer;
13kacel ki lukakagi bene ma gin tudito kaka i odi pa kwarogi, gin dano alip acel ki
miya abiro ki pyerabicel, jo makwiri twatwal i kom tic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
684
14Lulevi ma gudwogo cen ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Cemaya wod pa Kacub,
ma wod pa Ajrikam, wod pa Kacabia, wod pa Merari;
15ki Bakbakar, Kerec, Galal, ki Matania wod pa Mika ma wod pa Jikri, wod pa
Acap;
16ki Obadia wod pa Cemaya ma wod pa Galal, wod pa Jedutun; kacel ki Berekia
wod pa Aca wod pa Elkana ma obedo i kin gaŋi pa jo Netopa.
17Lugwok-doggola ot pa Lubaŋa ma gubedo i Jerucalem gin aye Calum, Akub,
Talmon, Akiman ki lukakagi, ma Calum aye laditgi.
18Nio wa i kare meno onoŋo gubedo lugwok-doggola ot pa Lubaŋa ma kabaka
wok ki iye, yo tuŋ wokceŋ. Magi aye lugwokdoggola gaŋ pa Lulevi.
19Calum wod pa Kore, ma wod pa Ebiacap, wod pa Kora, kacel ki lukakagi ma i
dog ot pa kwarogi, likwayo pa Kora, gin aye lugwok dog kema, kit macalo
kwarogi yam gubedo ludito ma giloyo gony pa Rwot kun gigwoko doggola me
donyo.
20I kare macon onoŋo Finekaci wod pa Eleajar en aye obedo ladit ma loyogi;
onoŋo Rwot tye kwede.
21Jekaria wod pa Mecelemia en aye onoŋo lagwok-doggola ma donyo i kema me
rwatte.
22Jo magi ducu ma yam giyerogi me bedo lugwok-doggola onoŋo giromo dano
miya aryo ki apar wiye aryo, Gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi ki i gaŋgi. Onoŋo
kabaka Daudi ki Camuel ma lanen-piny yam gumoko kwarogi i dog tic man, pien
gubedo dano ma gigenogi twatwal.
23Kit meno gin ki likwayogi gubedo ludito tic ma loyo doggola ot pa Rwot, en aye
ot me kema pa Rwot, macalo lukur-piny.
24Lugwok-doggola giketogi i kabedo aŋwen, yo tuŋ wokceŋ, yo tuŋ potoceŋ, yo
tuŋ acam ki yo tuŋ acuc.
25Lukakagi ma i gaŋigi myero gubin pi nino abiro kare ki kare me bedo kwedgi;
26pien lugwok-doggola madito gibedo kunnu kare ducu, gin aye Lulevi ma giloyo
kicika odi matinone ki odi kano lim ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
27Odi butogi girumo ot pa Lubaŋa, pien tic me kuro piny obedo megi, gin bene
gigwoko layab me yabo ot odiko odiko.
28Jo mogo i kingi onoŋo gigwoko jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa; i kare
ducu ma gidwokogi ki ma gikwanyogi woko, gikwanogi.
29Jo mukene i kingi giketogi me loyo jami ma bedo i ot pa Lubaŋa, ki jami tic
maleŋ ducu, dok giloyo bene moko mapwotte, ki koŋo vino, ki moo, ki odok eceta,
ki an wece.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
685
30Jo mukene ma gin litino pa ajwagi giyubo jami me aruba pi aŋwece.
31Matitia, dano acel ma i kin Lulevi, ma en latin kayo pa Calum ma jo Kora, en aye
obedo lalo tic me tedo mugati ma apada-ni, pien en dano ma genne.
32Lukakagi mogo ma gin jo Kokat giloyo mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot; ticgi
obedo me yu bone cabit ki cabit.
33Magi aye luwer, ma gin ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi; yam gibuto i kicika odi
matinone ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ma pe gitiyo tic mukene, pien yam gibedo i dog tic
dyeceŋ ki dyewor.
34Magi aye ludito kaka i odi pa kwarogi ma i kaka pa Lulevi, ma lubo yalwakgi,
gin aye ludito ma yam gibedo i Jerucalem.
Tekwaro pa Caulo
(1 Tek 8.29-38)
35Jeyel ma won Gibeon yam bedo i Gibeon; nyiŋ dakone Maaka,
36latin awobine me kayo en Abudon, ka dok Jur, Kic, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
37Gedor, Akio, Jeker, ki Miklot;
38Miklot aye won Cimeam, Jo magi bene yam gubedo ma gukemme ki lukakagi
ma gibedo i Jerucalem, kacel ki lukakagi.
39Ner onywalo Kic, Kic onywalo Caulo, Caulo onywalo Yonacan, Malkicua,
Abinadab ki Ecibaal;
40Yonacan onywalo Meribaal, Meribaal onywalo Mika.
41Litino awobe pa Mika gin aye Piton, Melek, Takrea ki Akaj.
42Akaj onywalo Jara, Jara onywalo Alemet, Ajimavet ki Jimri. Jimri onywalo Moja,
43Moja onywalo Binea; ma wode Repaya, ma wode Eleaca, ma wode Ajel.
44Ajel yam tye ki litino awobe abicel, ma nyiŋgi ene: Ajrikam, Bokeru, Icmael,
Cearia, Obadia ki Kanan. Jo magi aye litino awobe pa Ajel.
1 Tekwaro 10
To pa Caulo ki awobene
(1 Cam 31.1-13)
1I kare meno jo Piliciti gulwenyo i kom Icrael. Jo Icrael guriŋo woko ki i nyim jo
Piliciti, ci ginekogi i wi got Gilboa.
2Jo Piliciti guriŋo gudiŋo kor Caulo ki awo bene, ci guneko Yonacan ki Abinadab
ki Malkicua, gin ducu awobe pa Caulo.
3Lweny ogeto matek i kor Caulo, ci wegi atero gucele woko, guketo ret i kome.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
686
4Caulo owaco bot latin jami lwennye ni, “Wot pala lucwanni woko, icoba kwede
pil, wek jo ma pe gilirogini, ma pe giŋeyo Lubaŋa pe gubin i koma, miyo giyarre i
koma.” Ento latin jami lwennye pe oye, pien lworo omake matek, omiyo Caulo
okwanyo pala lucwanne kikome ci opoto ogurre kwede kekene.
5Ka latin jami lwennye oneno ni Caulo doŋ oto woko, ci en bene opoto ogurre
kene ki pala lucwanne, oto woko.
6Kit meno Caulo ki awobene adek-ki kacel ki jo me ode ducu, guto woko
lawaŋacel.
7Ka jo Icrael ducu ma onoŋo gitye i nota guneno ni mony pa jo Icrael guriŋo
woko, ki Caulo ki awobene ginekogi woko, ci guriŋo guweko gaŋigi woko; ci jo
Piliciti gubino gucako bedo i gaŋi-nu.
8Orwone jo Piliciti gubino ka lunyo boŋŋi ki i kom jo ma ginekogi, ci gunoŋo kom
Caulo ki kom awobene adek-ki i kom got Gilboa.
9Gulunyo jami lweny pa Caulo ki i kome, gucito kwede, wa ki wiye bene ma
gutoŋo, ka gucwalo kwena oromo i lobo pa jo Piliciti ducu pi tero lok me
yomcwiny bot jogigi ki bot lwakgi ducu.
10Guketo jami lweny pa Caulo i oŋogigi; ka dok guguro wiye i ot jok Dagon.
11Ento ka jo Jabec-gilead ducu guwinyo gin ma jo Piliciti gutimo i kom Caulo,
12ci oteka lwenygi ducu gua, gukwanyo kom Caulo woko ki kom awobene,
guterogi wa i Jabec, Ka guyiko cogogi i te yat kworo ma tye i Jabec, ci guri kec pi
nino abiro.
13 Caulo oto pien pe obedo lagen; oŋayo waŋ Rwot woko, pe otiyo gin ma Rwot
ociko, dok owoto ka tyet bot lakor tipo pi yero nyime,
14ma pe openyo dog Rwot. Pienno omiyo Rwot oneke woko, ci okwanyo ker
omiyo bot Daudi ma wod pa Yece.
1 Tekwaro 11
Daudi odoko kabaka me Icrael kacel ki Juda
(2 Cam 5.1-5)
1Lacen jo Icrael ducu gucokke bot Daudi i Kebron, ci guwacci, “Nen ba, wan aye
wa cogo komi ki riŋo komi.
2I kare macon ca, wa i kare ma onoŋo Caulo aye kabaka ma loyowa, in yam itelo
wi jo Icrael ka gicito ka lweny, idwokowa paco bene, Rwot Lubaŋani bene nene
owaco boti ni, ‘In aye ibibedo lakwa lwakka jo Icrael, dok ibibedo laker ma
loyogi.’ “
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
687
3Kit meno ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gubino bot kabaka i Kebron. Kabaka Daudi
oketo gicikke kwedgi i Kebron i nyim Rwot, ci guwiro Daudi obedo kabaka ma lo
yo jo Icrael, kit ma yam Rwot oloko ki i dog Camuel.
Daudi omayo got Cion
(2 Cam 5.6-10)
4 Daudi ki jo Icrael ducu gucito i Jerucalem, ma en aye Jebuc, ka lweny i kom jo
Jebuc ma gibedo i lobo kunnu.
5Jo ma gibedo i Jebuc onoŋo guwaco bot Daudi ni, “In pe ibidonyo kany.” Ento
Daudi ocito omayo gogo me Cion woko, ci odoko gaŋ kalle.
6Daudi owacci, “Dano ma bikwoŋo neko jo Jebuc, en aye bibedo ladit ma
lawimony.” Ci Joab wod pa Ceruya okwono ito kunnu ci en odoko laditgi.
7Daudi ocako bedo i cel gogo, mumiyo gilwoŋo ni, Gaŋ kai pa Daudi.
8Daudi ogero gaŋ madit orumo woko likiŋ, cakke ki i Millo; Joab ogero odi
mukene ma i gaŋ ma yam oballe.
9Daudi omedde odoko dit twatwal, pien onoŋo Rwot me mony aye tye kwede.
Twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi
(2 Cam 23.8-39)
10Magi gin aye ludito ki i kin twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi, jo ma yam gumiyo kony
matek i kerre, kacel ki jo Icrael ducu, ci guketo en me bedo kabaka, kit ma onoŋo
Rwot yam oloko i kom Icrael.
11Man aye lok kom twoni oteka lweny pa Daudi: Jacobeam ma jo Kakmon en aye
ladit pa jo adek-ki; en yam okato ki toŋŋe i kom jo miya adek, ci onekogi woko
ducu lawaŋacel.
12Ŋat ma lubo en ki i kin twoni oteka rweny acel-ki en aye Eleajar wod pa Dodo
ma jo Akoki.
13En obedo kacel ki Daudi i Pac-dammim i kare ma jo Piliciti gucokke ka lweny
kunnu. Poto onoŋo tye kunnu ma cayiri ocek iye mabup, ci lwak ocako riŋo woko
ki i nyimjo Piliciti.
14Ento en ocamo co ci ocuŋ i dye poto pi laro, ocako neko jo Piliciti, ci Rwot
olarogi ki loc madit twatwal.
15Jo adek ki i kin ludito pyeradek-ki gulor piny wa i got ka ma Daudi bedo iye i
boro Adullam; onoŋo mony pa jo Piliciti ogony i nota Repaim.
16I karenu onoŋo Daudi tye i kakannene, ki cel gogo pa Lupiliciti onoŋo tye i
Beterekem.
17Daudi oloko ki miti madwoŋ ni, “Kono ŋatti mo ocito ka twomo pii ki i wan it
Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ca, omiya amati, kono ber mada!”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
688
18Ci twoni lweny adek-ku gucito gubaro dye gony pa jo Piliciti, gutwomo pii ki i
wan it Beterekem ma tye cok ki dog gaŋ ca, ci gukelo bot Daudi. Ento Daudi pe
omato; otiŋo oliyo piny i nyim Rwot pi gityer amata,
19kun wacci, “Pe obed kumeno ki i nyim Lubaŋana, an pe myero atim kit man. An
aye dok amato remo pa jo-ni? Pien gukelo pi dyero komgi.” En aye lok mumiyo pe
omato pii meno. Twoni lweny adek-ku yam gutimo kit meno.
20Abicai omin Joab onoŋo ladit i kin jo pyeradek-ki. Otiŋo toŋŋe olwenyo i kom jo
miya adek ci onekogi woko ducu, ma omiyo nyiŋe oywek ma mito rom ki jo adek
ca.
21Pienno olimo yweka madit ki i kom jo pyeradek-ki, ci odoko ladit wi monygi;
ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca.
22Ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo twon oteka ma i Kabjeel, latim gin madito;
en oneko awobe aryo ma gin twoni labwor me Moab. En bene olor odonyo i bur
ci oneko iye labwor i kare ma pee ocwer mapek.
23Ka dok oneko Laejipt mo, dano ma kome pek ma borre romo futi abiro ki nucu.
Laejipt meno onoŋo tye ki toŋŋe i ciŋe ma rom ki rii yat lacwe boŋo; ento en
Benaya ocito bote ki odoone, ci oyuto toŋ woko ki i cin Laejipt, ka oneke kwede
woko ki toŋŋe-nu.
24Benaya wod pa Yekoyada otimo gin madito kit meno, omiyo nyiŋe olimo yweka
madit ma mito rom ki twoni lweny adek-ki.
25Nyiŋe oywek i kin jo pyeradek-ki, ento pe olimo rwom pa jo adek ca. Daudi
oketo en obedo ladit pa jo ma gwoko en kabaka.
26Twoni oteka lweny ma i kin lumony gin aye Acael ma omin Joab, Elkanan wod
pa Dodo me Beterekem,
27Camot me Karod, Kelej ma jo Palti,
28Ira wod pa Ikec me Tekoa, Abiejer me Anatot,
29Cibekai ma Lakucat, Ilai ma jo Akoki,
30Makarai me Netopa, Keled wod pa Baana me Netopa,
31Itai wod pa Ribai me Gibea pa jo Benjamin, Benaya me Ptraton,
32Kurai ma bedo i nota ora me Gaac, Abiel me Arba,
33Ajimavet me Bakarum, Eliaba me Caalbon,
34Kacem ma jo Gijon, Yonacan wod pa Cage ma jo Karar,
35Akiam wod pa Cakar ma jo Karar, Elipal wod pa Ur,
36Keper ma jo Mekerat, Akija ma jo Pelon,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
689
37Kejero me Karmel, Naarai wod pa Eiibai,
38Joel omin Natan, Mibkar wod pa Agri,
39Jelek ma jo Ammon, Nakarai me Beerot ma latin jami lweny pa Joab wod pa
Jeruya,
40Ira ma jo Itri, Gareb ma jo Itri,
41Uria ma jo Kit, Jabad wod pa Aklai,
42Adina wod pa Cija ma jo pa Reuben, ma ladit i kin jo pa Reuben, en aye obedo ki
jone pyeradek bene;
43Kanan wod pa Maaka ki Yocapat ma Lamitini,
44Ujia ma jo Acitera, Cama ki Jeyel ma awobe pa Ketam me Aroer,
45Jediael wod pa Cimri ki ominne Joka, ma Latiji,
46Eliel ma jo Makavi, ki Jeribai ki Jocavia ma awobe pa Elnaam, ki Itima ma jo
Moab,
47Eliel ki Obed, ki Jaciel ma jo Mejoba.
1 Tekwaro 12
Lukony Daudi i Jiklag
1Jo magi yam gubino bot Daudi i Jiklag, i kare ma piny odiyo ma doŋ pe twero wot
ka mo pi Caulo wod pa Kic; gin aye onoŋo gitye i kin twoni oteka ma gubedo ka
konye i lweny.
2Gin wegi atum; gin yam gicelo atero nyo gibayo kidi kadi ki ciŋgi ma lacuc ki
lacam bene. Gin onoŋo jo pa Benjamin, ma i kaka pa Caulo-gi.
3Laditgi obedo Akiejer, ka dok Yoaci gin aryo ducu litino pa Cema me Gibea; ka
dok Jejiel ki Pelet ma awobe pa Ajimavet; ki Beraka, Yeko me Anatot.
4Icmaya me Gibeon, twon oteka ma i kin jo pyeradek ca, en ladit ma loyo jo
pyeradek-ku; Jeremia, Jakajiel, Yokanan, Jojabed me Gedera,
5Elujai, Jerimot, Bealia, Cemaria, Cepatia ma jo Karup;
6Elkana, Icia, Ajarel, Joejer ki Jacobeam, ma gin jo pa Kora,
7ki Joela ki Jebadia, gin awobe pa Jerokam me Gedor.
8Oteka ma guŋiyo ki lweny ma i kin jo pa Gad gugwarre gucito bot Daudi i
kakannene ma i tim, oyi ta ma giŋeyo lweny ki kwot ki toŋ, ma wangi nen calo
wan labwor, ma gidwir calo til ma i godi.
9Gin ene: Ejer ma laditgi, me aryone Obadia, me adekke Eliab,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
690
10me aŋwenne Micimana, me abicce Jeremia,
11me abicelle Atai, me abirone Eliel,
12me aborone Yokanan, me aboŋwenne Elijabad,
13me aparre Jeremia, me apar wiye acelle Makibanai.
14Jo Gad magi ducu gin ludito ma loyo mony; ludito matinone giloyo jo miya, ki
maditone loyo jo alip.
15Magi gin aye jo ma yam guŋolo Jordan i dwe mukwono, i kare ma onoŋo piine
opoŋ woko Libyeny nio wa i tura ci guryemo jo ma gitye i nota ducu, ma yo tuŋ
wokceŋ ki yo tuŋ potoceŋ.
16Ka dok jo pa Benjamin mogo, ki pa Juda, gubino bot Daudi i kakannene.
17Daudi okato woko ka jolo wigi, kun waco botgi ni, “Ka ce wubino bota ki cwiny
me wat pi konya, ci abibedo kwedwu ki yomcwiny. Ento ka ce wubino ka umo
waŋa wek wumiya bot lumerokka, kadi bed an cwinya leŋ, ci Lubaŋa pa kwarowa
myero onen ci oŋol gire.”
18Ci Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino i kom Amacai, ma en aye ladit pa jo pyeradek ca, ci
owacci, “Wan wa lwakki, in Daudi, wabibedo kwedi, in wod pa Yece. Kuc, kuc
obed kwedi, kuc bene obed i kom lukony in! Pien Lubaŋani aye tye ka konyi.”
Daudi ojologi, ci oketogi gubedo ludito me buca monnye.
19Jo pa Manace mogo gulokke bot Daudi i kare ma obino ki jo Piliciti ka lweny i
kom Caulo. Kadi bed kumeno en pe omedo ki konyogi pien ludito pa jo Piliciti
guyubo lok i kome, ci guryeme woko, kun giwacci, “Ka ce bidok bot laditte Caulo,
ci doŋ wato oke.”
20Jo pa Manace ma gudonyo bote i kare ma en cito i Jiklag gin ene: Adina, Jojabad,
Jediael, Mikael, Jojabad, Eliu ki Jiletai, ma gin aye ludito ma loyo jo alip ma i
Manace.
21Gukonyo Daudi ki lweny i kom buca mony pa luyak; pien onoŋo gin ducu twoni
oteka lweny ma ludito me mony.
22Dano gibino ka konyo Daudi nino ki nino, nio ka gudoko cwar mony madit, ma
rom ki mony pa Lubaŋa.
Mony ma Daudi obedo kwede i Kebron
23Magi gin aye wel dul buca mony ma guruko lweny ma yam gubino bot Daudi i
Kebron pi dwoko ker pa Caulo i ciŋe, kit ma yam Rwot owaconi.
24Jo pa Juda ma wegi kwot ki toŋ onoŋo giromo alip abicel ki miya aboro ma
guruko lweny.
25Ki jo pa Cimon ma twoni oteka lweny alip abiro ki miya acel.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
691
26Jo pa Levi alip aŋwen ki miya abicel.
27Ka dok Yekoyada ma loyo jo me ot pa Aron obino ki jo alip adek ki miya abiro.
28Jadok latin awobi ma twon oteka obino ki ludito wi mony pyeraryo wiye aryo
ma i dog ot pa wonne kikome.
29Jo pa Benjamin ma lukaka pa Caulo gubino ma romo alip adek; jo mapol ki i
komgi yam gubedo ka cwako kor ot pa Caulo nio wa i kare meno.
30Jo pa Epraim gubino ma romo alip pyeraryo ki miya aboro, ma gin oteka lweny
ma nyiŋgi oywek i dog odi pa kwarogi.
31Jo ma i nucu kaka pa Manace gubino ma romo jo alip aboro ma giyerogi ki
nyiŋgi wek gubin ka keto Daudi kabaka.
32Jo pa Icakar, jo ma onoŋo giŋeyo kare dok giŋeyo gin ma myero Icrael oti,
gubino ki ludito miya aryo ki lukakagi ducu ma i te locgi.
33Jo pa Jabulon gubino ki jo ma gunyebbe ki lweny ma romo alip pyerabic, ma
gurukke pi lweny ki jami lwenygi ducu pi konyo Daudi ki cwinygi acel.
34Jo pa Naputali gubino ki ludito wi mony ma romo alip acel ma gitye ki danogi
alip pyeradek wiye abiro ma gutiŋo kwot ki toŋ.
35Jo pa Dan gubino ki jo alip pyeraryo wiye aboro ki miya abicel ma guyubbe pi
lweny.
36Jo pa Acer gubino ki jo ma gunyebbe ki lweny ma romo alip pyeraŋwen, ma doŋ
guyubbe pi lweny.
37Jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad ki nucu kaka pa Manace ma gua loka Jordan gubino ma
romo alip miya acel ki pyeraryo ma gurukke ki jami lwenygi ducu.
38Lulweny magi ducu gurwayo ma guryeyo kikore, gubino kwede wa i Kebron ki
cwiny mukemo keto Daudi kabaka ma loyo Icrael ducu; kit meno jo Icrael ducu
mudoŋŋe gubedo ki cwiny acel me keto Daudi kabaka.
39Ci gubedo ki Daudi kunnu pi nino adek kun gicamo, gimato bene, pien onoŋo
utmegigi gutyeko yubbe pigi.
40Dok jo ma gicok kwedgi bene, ma gua wa ki i lobo Icakar ki Jabulon ki Naputali
gucom ki cam ma giketo i wi kana, ki kinaga, ki kana madito ki twoni-gu; gukelo
lwak moko kwon madwoŋ, ki poki otini, ki dog tuga olok mutwo-gu, ki koŋo vino,
ki moo-gu, ki twoni ki romi, pien onoŋo yomcwiny tye i Icrael.
1 Tekwaro 13
Daudi okelo tam me kela canduk pa Lubaŋa i Jerucalem
1Daudi yam oyubo lok ki ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca mony me jo
miya, ki ludito ma i dul acel acel.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
692
2Ci Daudi oloko ki kacokke pa jo Icrael ducu kun wacci, “Ka ce bedo ber botwu,
ma Rwot Lubaŋawa bene mito, ci wacwalu kwena orom kin utmegiwa ma gudoŋ
i lobo Icrael ducu, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi ma i gaŋi ma gitye ki lobo me
kakwatgi, wek gubin gucokke kacel botwa.
3Ka wek doŋ wakelu canduk pa Lubaŋawa botwa, pien i kare pa Caulo yam
watenyo woko ata.”
4Ci kacokke ducu oye ni gitim kit meno, pien lokke onen atir bot lwak ducu.
Daudi ocito ka omo canduk pa Lubaŋa
(2 Cam 6.1-11)
5 Daudi ocoko jo Icrael ducu cakke ki i Cikor ma i Ejipt nio wa i yo ma donyo i
Kamat, pi kelo canduk pa Lubaŋa ki i Kiriat-jearim.
6 Daudi ki jo Icrael ducu gucito i Baala, ma en aye Kiriat-jearim ma tye i Juda, ka
omo canduk pa Lubaŋa woko ki kunnu, en aye canduk ma gilwoŋo ki nyiŋ Rwot
ma bedo i wi komker malo ka wi lukerubi.
7Ci gutiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa i wi gadigadi manyen, gukelo woko nia ki i ot pa
Abinadab, ci Uja ki Akio gubedo ka Leko twoni ma ywayo gadigadi.
8Daudi ki jo Icrael ducu gubedo ka yarre ki myel ki yomcwiny i nyim Lubaŋa ki
kero komgi ducu, ki wero wer-gu, ki goyo opuk-gu ki naŋa-gu ki ajaa-gu, ki atego
agoya-gu ki tum-gu.
9Ka guo i laro moyo pa Kidon, Uja ocwalo ciŋe pi mako kom canduk, pien onoŋo
twoni gucato.
10Ci kiniga omako Rwot i kom Uja, ci oneke woko pien onoŋo oketo ciŋe i kom
canduk; oto woko kunnu i nyim Lubaŋa.
11Ci kiniga omako Daudi, pien Rwot otugge i kom Uja; mumiyo kabedo-nu
gilwoŋo ni Perej-uja nio wa onyoo.
12Daudi obedo ki lworo i kom Lubaŋa i nino meno; owacci, “Abikelo canduk pa
Lubaŋa wa paco bota niŋniŋ?”
13Kit meno omiyo Daudi pe otero canduk wa i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, ento oŋak kwede
woko i ot pa Obed-edom ma jo Gat.
14 Canduk pa Lubaŋa obedo i ot pa Obed-edom pi dwe adek; ci Rwot omiyo gum
bot Obed-edom ki jone ducu.
1 Tekwaro 14
Kiram opwoyo ker pa Daudi
(2 Cam 5.11-12)
1Kiram kabaka me Turo yam ocwalo kwena bot Daudi, kun miyo bao yat cedar ki
lupa-godi bene ki lupa-bao me gero ot pa Daudi.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
693
2Omiyo Daudi oniaŋ ni Rwot otyeko moko en me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael, dok
ni otyeko miyo kerre obedo ki deyo madwoŋ pi pilo wi jone jo Icrael.
Litino ma Daudi onywalogi i Jerucalem
(2 Cam 5.13-16;1 Tek 3.5-9)
3Daudi dok omedde ki nyomo mon i Jerucalem, ci onywalo awobe ki anyira
mukene.
4Magi aye nyiŋ litino ma onywalogi i Jerucalem. Camua, Cobab, Natan, Solomon,
5Ibar, Elicua, Elpelet,
6Noga, Nepeg, Japia,
7Elicama. Beeliada ki Elipelet.
Daudi oloyo jo Piliciti
(2 Cam 5.17-25)
8Ka jo Piliciti guwinyo ni Daudi doŋ gityeko wire odoko kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael
ducu, ci jo Piliciti ducu gucito ka yenyo Daudi; ento Daudi owinyo pigi, okato
woko ka lweny i komgi.
9Onoŋo jo Piliciti gubino gumonyo nota Repaim.
10Daudi ocako penyo dog Lubaŋa ni, “Ber acit ka lweny i kom jo Piliciti? Ibimiyogi
i ciŋa?” Rwot ogamo doge ni, “Citi, abimiyogi i ciŋi.”
11Daudi ocito wa i Baal-perajim, ci oloyogi kunnu, ci owacci, “Lubaŋa otyeko baro
dye lumerok woko ki ciŋa, macalo lalele mucorre.” Mumiyo nyiŋ kabedo meno
gilwoŋo ni, Baal-perajim.
12Jo Piliciti gutenyo cal jogigi kenyo, ci Daudi ociko pi waŋogi woko.
13Jo Piliciti dok gudwogo gumonyo nota meno.
14Ka Daudi dok openyo dog Lubaŋa, ci Lubaŋa ogamo ni, “Pe ibicito i komgi atir.
Wot iman ŋegi ci ipot i komgi ki ka ma okemo yadi owak.
15Ka ce iwinyo kor tyen dano ma gitye ka wot lirukruk ma winnye wa i wi yadi
owak, ci doij icit ka lweny, pien Lubaŋa doŋ obetelo nyimwu pi neko mony pa jo
Piliciti woko.”
16Daudi otiyo kit ma Lubaŋa ocike kwede, ci guneko mony pa jo Piliciti nia ki i
Gibeon nio wa i Gejer.
17Nyiŋ Daudi oywekoromo lobo ducu, ci Rwot omiyo lworo omako rok ducu i
kom Daudi.
1 Tekwaro 15
Gikelo canduk pa Lubaŋa i Jerucalem
(2 Cam 6.16-23)
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
694
1Daudi ogero odine i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ci oyubo kabedo pi canduk pa Lubaŋa,
ocako guro kema pire.
2 Daudi dok owacci, “Dano mukene pe bitiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, ento Lulevi
keken, pien Rwot yam oyerogi pi tino canduk pa Rwot ki pi tiyo bote matwal.”
3Daudi ocoko jo Icrael ducu otorogi i Jerucalem, pi kelo canduk pa Rwot i
kabedone ma yam oyubo pire.
4Ci Daudi ocoko litino awobe pa Aron ki Lulevi kacel, gin ene:
5i kin likwayo pa Kokat, Uriel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya acel ki pyeraryo;
6i kin likwayo pa Merari, Acaya ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya aryo ki
pyeraryo;
7i kin likwayo pa Gercon, Joel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya acel ki pyeradek;
8i kin likwayo pa Elicapan, Cemaya ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine miya aryo;
9i kin likwayo pa Kebron, Eliel ma laditgi, kacel ki utmegine pyeraboro;
10i kin likwayo pa Ujiel, Aminadab ma laditgi, ki utmegine miya acel ki apar wiye
aryo.
11Daudi dok olwoŋo ajwagi Jadok ki Abiatar, ki Lulevi magi, Uriel, Acaya, Joel,
Cemaya, Eliel ki Aminadab,
12ci owaco botgi ni, “Wun aye ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarowu ma jo pa Levi;
wulonnye kekenwu wubed maleŋ, wun kacel ki utmegiwu, wek wukel canduk pa
Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, i kabedo ma atyeko yubone pire.
13I kare mukwono ca onoŋo Rwot Lubaŋa otugge i komwa, pien pe wun aye
onoŋo wutiŋo i kare-nu, pien pe yam wapenyo doge i kit ma cik mito.”
14Kit meno ajwagi ki Lulevi gulonnye kekengi pi kelo canduk pa Rwot, Lubaŋa pa
Icrael.
15 Lulevi gucako tiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, gulebo ki talle i wi gwokgi, kit ma yam
Moses ocikogi kwede, macalo Rwot owaco.
16Daudi dok ociko ludito pa Lulevi pi yero utmegigi wek gubed luwer ma
gibigoyo jami wer maloŋo, naŋa ki opuk ki atego agoya-gu, me tino dwan malo ki
yomcwiny.
17Kit meno Lulevi gucako yero Eman wod pa Joel, ka dok Acap wod pa Berekia ki
i kin utmegine. I kin likwayo pa Merari guyero utmegigi magi, Etan wod pa
Kucaya;
18ka dok guyero utmegigi ma i dul me aryo, gin aye Jekaria, Jajiel, Cemiramot,
Jekiel, Uni, Eliab, Benaya, Maaceya, Matitia, Elipeleku ki Mikneya, ki lugwok-
doggola Obed-edom ki Jeyel.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
695
19Luwer magi Eman, Acap ki Etan ticgi obedo me goyo atego mola;
20Jekaria, Ajiel, Cemiramot, Jekiel, Uni, Eliab, Maaceya ki Benaya ticgi obedo me
goyo naŋa i kit me Alamot;
21ento Matitia, Elipeleku, Mikneya, Obed-edom, Jeyel ki Ajajia gin ticgi obedo me
telo wer ki opuk i kit me Ceminit.
22Kenania, ma en aye latelwer pa Lulevi, ticce me nyuto kit me wer pien en aye
niaŋ maber.
23Berekia ki Elkana yam gin lugwok-doggola me canduk pa Lubaŋa.
24Cebania, Jocapat, Netanel, Amacai, Jekaria, Benaya ki Eleajar, ma gin ducu
ajwagi, ticgi me kuto tum i nyim canduk pa Lubaŋa, Obed-edom ki Jekia gin bene
gubedo lugwok-doggola me canduk pa Lubaŋa.
25Kit meno Daudi ki ludoŋo pa jo Icrael, ki ludito ma loyo jo alip, gucako wot me
omo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot nia ki i ot pa Obed-edom ma cwinygi yom
matek.
26Gucako tumo twoni abiro ki nyogi romi abiro, pien Lubaŋa okonyo Lulevi ma
gutiŋo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
27Daudi onoŋo orukke ki jor me camanini maberre, macalo Lulevi ducu ma
gutiŋo canduk pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki luwer, ki Kenana ma latel-wer pa luwer ducu;
Daudi onoŋo otweyo pyere ki epod me camanini.
28Yam jo Icrael ducu gukelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot kit meno, ma giwayo ma
rwatte ki koko bila, ki tum, ki atego agoya-gu, kun giwero ki naŋa ki opuk-gu
maloŋo.
29Ka canduk me gicikke pa Rwot obino wa i gaŋ kai pa Daudi, ci Mikal ma nya pa
Caulo obolo wane woko ki i wan dirica oneno kabaka Daudi ka myelo ma cwinye
yom, ci obedo ka cayo en ki i cwinye.
1 Tekwaro 16
1Gukelo canduk pa Lubaŋa wa paco, gucibo i kema ma yam Daudi oguro pire;
gucako tyero gitum awaŋa ki gityer lakwecwiny i nyim Lubaŋa.
2Ka Daudi otyeko tyero gitum awaŋa-gu ki gityer lakwecwiny, ci ocako lamo gum
i kom lwak i nyiŋ Rwot.
3Lacen ocako poko jami ki jo Icrael ducu, co wa ki mon; dano acel acel gimiye
mugati acel, ki riŋo anida, ki poki olok mutwone.
4Dok oketo Lulevi mogo pi bedo lutic i nyim canduk pa Rwot, pi lwoŋo nyiŋ
Lubaŋa, pi pwoyo en ki pi pako Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
696
5Acap aye laditgi, ki me aryone ma lube obedo Jekaria, Jeyel, Cemiramot, Jekiel,
Matitia, Eliab, Benaya, Obed-edom ki Jeyel, gin aye lugo naŋa ki opuk. Acap onoŋo
goyo atego agoya,
6ki Benaya ki Jakajiel ma ajwagi gin aye lukut tum teretere i nyim canduk me
gicikke pa Rwot.
Wer me pwoc pa Daudi
(Jab 105.1-15;96.1-13;106.47-48)
7I kare meno en aye nino ma Daudi okwono ciko ni Acap ki utmegine gubed ka
wero wer me pwoyo Rwot, kit man:
8Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, wulwoŋ nyiŋe, wumi ticce oŋene i rok ducu!
9Wuwer bote wer me pako en, wutit ticce me aura ducu!
10Wuket deyo i kom nyiŋe maleŋ; jo ma yenyo Rwot cwinygi obed yom!
11Wubin bot Rwot wek wunoŋ tek ki bote, wubed i nyime nakanaka.
12Wupo kom tic me aura ma en otiyo ducu, ginaura ma yam otiyo ki kop ma
oŋolo,
13wun likwayo pa Abraim ma yam laticce, wun litino pa Yakobo ma en oyerowu.
14En aye Rwot Lubaŋawa; kop ma en oŋolo romo i lobo ducu.
15En cwinye omoko i kom gicikkene ma bedo nakanaka, i kom lok ma yam ociko,
pi yatwak alip ki alip,
16 en gicikke ma oketo ki Abraim, ki lok ma yam okwoŋo ki Icaka,
17 ma omoko odoko cik bot Yakobo, wek obed gicikke ki Icrael matwal,
18kun wacci, “Abimiyo lobo Kanaan botwu, obed lobo me aleyawu.”
19I kare ma pud gin nok, ma welgi tidi, ma pud gin lubedo i lobo-nu,
20ma giwirre i kin rok mapatpat, ma gia i te ker acel, gikobo i rok mukene,
21 Lubaŋa pe oye ŋat mo odiyogi; ojuko luker mapol pigi kun wacci,
22“Pe wugud kom jo ma an awirogi, pe wutim lunebina marac!”
23Wuwer bot Rwot, wun lobo ducu! wutit pi larre nino ducu.
24Wutuc deyone bot lurok, wutit ticce me aura bot rok ducu!
25Rwot aye dit, myero gipake twatwal, myero gilwore makato lubaŋa mukene-gu
ducu.
26Pien lubaŋa pa lurok ducu gin cal jogi apaya, ento Rwot aye oketo polo.
27Deyo ki dit tye bote, tek ki yomcwiny tye ka ma en bedo iye.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
697
28Wun kaka me rok ducu, wumi deyo bot Rwot, wumi deyo ki tek bot Rwot!
29Wumi deyo bot Rwot muporo nyiŋe; wukel gityer, wubin wa i nyime! Wuwor
Rwot ki boŋo maleŋ;
30komwu omyel i nyime, wun lobo ducu; ada, lobo ocuŋ matek ma pe yeŋŋe.
31Polo iye obed yom lobo bene obed ma cwinye yom, dano guwac i kin lurok ni,
“Rwot tye ka loc!”
32Wek nam omor, ki gin mupoŋ iye, poto bene oum, ki jami ducu ma tye iye!
33Yadi ma i buŋa ducu gibiwer ki yomcwiny i nyim Rwot, pien obebino ka ŋolo
kop i kom lobo.
34 Wumi pwoc bot Rwot, pien en ber; mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka!
35Wuwac bene ni, “Larwa, ai Lubaŋa lalarwa, icokwa ci ilarwa ki i kin lurok, wek
wapwo nyiŋi maleŋ, waum ka wapaki.
36Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, nia con ki con nio nino ma pe tum!” Lwak ducu
gugamo ni, “Amen!” ci gupako Rwot.
Giketo Lulevi pi tic i kom canduk pa Lubaŋa
37Daudi oweko Acap ki utmegine i nyim canduk me gicikke pa Rwot wek gubed
ka tic kunnu i nyim canduk pa Rwot kit ma mitte kwede i nino acel acel,
38ka dok Obed-edom ki utmegine pyerabicel wiye aboro, kun Obed-edom wod pa
Jedutun ki Koca gubedo lugwok-doggola.
39Dok oweko ajwaka Jadok ki utmegine ma gin ajwagi wa i nyim kema pa Rwot i
ka woro Lubaŋa i wi got ma tye i Gibeon,
40pi tumo gitum awaŋa bot Rwot i wi keno tyer me gitum awaŋa, kun lubo lok
ducu ma gicoyo i cik pa Rwot ma yam ociko ki io Icrael.
41Ki Eman ki Jedutun gunywako tic kwedgi, kacel ki jo mukene ma yam giyerogi
ki nyiŋgi pi miyo pwoc bot Rwot pi mar mere ma bedo nakanaka.
42Eman ki Jedutun onoŋo gitye ki tura ki atego agoya pi wer agoya, ki jami agoya
mukene ma gigoyo i kare me wero wer maleŋ, Litino awobe pa Jedutun yam
giketogi pi gwoko doggola ot pa Rwot.
43 Ci lwak ducu guket, dano acel acel odok i ode, ki Daudi bene odok i pacone ka
lamo gum i kom jone.
1 Tekwaro 17
Lubaŋa oketo gicikke ki Daudi
(2 Cam 7.1-29)
1I kare ma doŋ Daudi obedo i ode, ocako waco bot lanebi Natan ni, “Nen ba, an
doŋ abedo i ot baorcedar, ento canduk me gicikke pa Rwot pud bedo i kema.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
698
2Ci Natan odok Iye bot Daudi ni, “Tigin ducu ma tye i cwinyi, pien Lubaŋa tye
kwedi.”
3Ento i dyewor acel-lu lok pa Rwot dok obino bot Natan ni,
4“Cit icitit bot laticca Daudi ni Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘In pe ibigerra ot me bedo.
5Pien peya abedo i ot mo nia wa i kine ma atelo iye wi Icrael nio kwede wa
onyoo-ni, ento abedo ka kobo nia ki i kema man nio wa i kema mukene, ki nia ki i
kabedo man nio wa i kabedo mukene.
6Kabedo ducu ma abedo ka wirre iye ki jo Icrael ducu, an yam koŋ aloko lok mo
bot luŋolkop me Icrael ma yam acikogi pi kwayo lwakka kun awacci, “Piŋo pe koŋ
wugerra ot mo me bao cedar?” ‘
7Koni doŋ ibiwaco ki laticca Daudi ni, ‘Rwot me mony owaco kuman ni, an yam
akwanyi ki kakwat i olet, ka ma ibedo ka leko iye romi, wek ibed laker ma loyo
jona jo Icrael;
8dok abedo ka loŋŋe kwedi i kabedo ma icito iye ducu, abedo ka jwero lumerokki
woko ki i nyimi. Dok abimiyo nyiŋi ywek, ma rom ki nyiŋ jo madito ma i wi lobo-
ni.
9Dok abimiyo kabedo ki jona jo Icrael; ci abiketogi iye, wek doŋ gubed i kabedogi
kikome, ma pe doŋ giyelogi matwal, wa lulweny magwa bene pe dok bipoto i
komgi i kare mo, kit ma con ca,
10ma nia wa i kare ma con aketo luŋolkop ma guloyo jona jo Icrael; ci abitayo
lumerok meri ducu. Ento atucci ni. Rwot bimiyo odi bedo madit.
11Ka kareni oromo me yweyo kacel ki kwarini, ci abiketo lakwaru mo ma bilubi
bedo dit, ma ŋat acel i kom likwayi kikomi, ci abimoko kerre bedo matek.
12En aye bigerra ot, an abimoko komkerre bedo matwal.
13 Abibedo wonne, ki en bibedo woda; pe abikwanyo mar mera ma pe lokke ki i
kome, kit ma yam akwanyo ki i kom ŋat mutelo nyimi-ni.
14Ento abimoko en i oda ki i kerra matwal; ki komker mere bene bimoko matwal.’
“
15Natan otito bot Daudi kit lok magi ducu, ki kit ginanyuta ma onen bote ducu.
16Lacen Kabaka Daudi ocito obedo piny i nyim Rwot, ci owacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa,
an aŋa, oda kono gin aŋo, mumiyo ikonya nio wa onyoo-ni?
17Pud ibwono kony man ni tidi ki tuŋ boti, ai Lubaŋa; ibedo ka lok i kom oda kit
ma bibedo kwede pi kare malac ma tye anyim, dok inyutta bene likwaya ma
anyim, ai Rwot Lubaŋa.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
699
18An Daudi dok abiwacci kit lok aŋo i kom deyo ma imiyo bota? Pien in iŋeya, an
ma abedo laticci-ni.
19Pira keken, ai Rwot, dok pi cwinyi giri keni, omiyo itiyo gin madito magu ducu,
pi miyo gin madito ducu ma kit man oŋene.
20Pe tye ŋatti mo macalo in, ai Rwot, dok pe tye Lubaŋa mo, kono in keken, kit ma
yam wawinyo ki itwa-ni.
21Rok mene ma wi lobo ma rom ki joni jo Icrael, ma yam Lubaŋa ocito ka kokogi
wek gubed jone, wek nyiŋi oywek pigi, pi tiyo gin madito ma miyo dano lworo, ki
pi ryemo rok mapol kacel ki lubaŋagi i nyim lwakki, ma yam in ikokogi ki i Ejipt?
22In ityeko miyo lwakki jo Icrael gudoko joni nakanaka; dok in, ai Rwot, yam
idoko Lubaŋagi.
23Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ imok lok meri ma yam iwaco i koma ki i kom jo
ma i oda matwal, ci doŋ itim kit ma ityeko waco-ni.
24Mok lok ma iwaco-ni, wek nyiŋi obed me adwora nakanaka kun giwacci, ‘Rwot
Lubaŋa me mony, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, en aye Lubaŋa ma loyo Icrael,’ ki ot pa laticci
Daudi bimoko i nyimi matwal.
25Pien in, Lubaŋa, ityeko nyuto bota ni ibimiyo oda bedo madit; mumiyo an laticci
alimo tekcwiny me kela lega man i nyimi.
26Ai Rwot, in aye Lubaŋa, ci in doŋ ityeko cikke me timo gin man maber pira.
27Pi meno, mi gum i kom dano ma i oda ki yomcwiny, wek likwaya gumedde
ameda ki bedo i nyimi nakanaka; pien gin ma in imiyo gum, gumme bedo
nakanaka, ai Rwot.”
1 Tekwaro 18
Daudi omedo kerre malac
(2 Cam 8.1-14)
1Lacen Daudi dok otayo jo Piliciti, ocako loyogi, ci omayo Gat ki gaŋi matino ma i
ŋete ki i ciŋ jo Piliciti.
2Daudi dok otayo jo Moab, ci jo Moab gudoko luticce, kun giculo mucoro bote.
3Daudi dok otayo Adadejer kabaka me Joba, ma yo tun Kamat, ma yam ocito ka
cibo got me po en i dog kulu Euprate.
4Daudi omako gadigadi lwennye alip acel, ki wegi aguragura alip abiro, ki askari
ma giwoto ki tyengi alip pyeraryo oŋolo odoŋ tyen aguraguragi ducu ma yam
giywayo gadigadi Lwenygi, ento oweko mogo manok odoŋ ma romo ywayo
gadigadi miya acel.
5Ka jo Ciria me Damaciko gubino ka konyo kor Adadejer kabaka me Joba, Daudi
oneko jo Ciria alip pyeraryo wiye aryo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
700
6Daudi oketo lumony i cel gogo i lobo Ciria ma i te loc me Damaciko; ci jo Ciria
gudoko lutic pa Daudi, kun giculo mucoro bote. Rwot obedo ka miyo tek me
bwoyo lobo bot Daudi ka ma yam ocito iye ducu.
7Daudi oyako lwak kwodi me jabu ma yam lwak pa Adadejer tiŋogi, ci oterogi i
Jerucalem.
8Daudi oyako lwak mola mapol ki i gaŋi magi, Tibat ki Kun, ma onoŋo yam gaŋi
pa Adadejer. Man aye mola ma yam Solomon otiyo kwede nam me mola, ki wir, ki
agulu mola-gu.
9Ka cen Tou kabaka me Kamat owinyo ni Daudi otyeko tayo mony pa Adadejer
woko ducu liweŋ,
10ci ocwalo wode Adoram bot kabaka Daudi ka mote, ki pi pwoyo en pi lweny i
kom Adadejer ki pi loyo en woko; pien yam Adadejer obedo ka lweny ki Tou tyen
mapol. Dok ocwalo lwak jami mapol me jabu, ki me ryal ki me mola-gu;
11jami meno bene kabaka Daudi yam odyerogi bot Rwot, kacel ki ryal ki jabu ma
yam oyakogi nia ki i rok ducu, nia wa i lobo Edom, Moab, ki bot jo Ammon ki jo
Piliciti ki jo Amalek.
12 Dok Abicai wod pa Jeruya oneko jo Edom alip apar wiye aboro i nota me Kado.
13Ci oketo lumony i cel gogo i Edom; ci jo Edom ducu gudoko lutic pa Daudi. Rwot
omiyo Daudi obwoyo lobo ka ma yam ocito iye ducu.
Ludito pa Daudi
(2 Cam 8.15-18;20.23-26)
14Daudi oloyo jo Icrael ducu kit meno; obedo ka ŋolo kop atir dok kakare i kom
lwakke ducu.
15Joab wod pa Jeruya obedo ladit me mony; ki Yekocapat wod pa Akilud obedo
laco lok ma timme;
16Jadok wod pa Akitub ki Akimelek wod pa Abiatar gubedo ajwagi; Cavica obedo
karan,
17ki Benaya wod pa Yekoyada obedo ladit ma loyo jo Keret ki jo Pelet; ki awobe
pa Daudi gubedo ludito ma loyo tic pa kabaka.
1 Tekwaro 19
Daudi oloyo jo Ammon ki jo Ciria
(2 Cam 10.1-19)
1Ka man otum, Nakac kabaka pa jo Ammon oto woko, ci wode oleyo ka tyene.
2Daudi owacci, “Abinyuto cwiny me mar bot Kanun wod pa Nakac, kit ma yam
wonne onyuto cwiny me mar bota-ni.” Mumiyo Daudi ocwalo lukwena bote ka
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
701
kweyo cwinye pi to pa wonne, Lutic pa Daudi guo bot Kanun i lobo pa jo Ammon
ka kweyo cwinye.
3Ento rwodi pa jo Ammon guwaco bot Kanun ni, “In itamo ni Daudi ocwalo lukwe
cwinyi pi keto deyo i kom woru? Daudi mono pe ocwalo luticce ka ŋiyo piny, ki
ka turo gaŋ, ki pi roto lobo ducu?”
4Kit meno omiyo Kanun omako lutic pa Daudi, ci olyelo yer tikgi, ka dok oŋolo
dye boŋogi i kom pyergi, ka ocwalogi kwede woko; ci gucito.
5Ka gitito bot Daudi pi jo meno, ci ocwalo dano ka jologi, pien onoŋo gitye ki
lewic madwoŋ twatwal. Ci kabaka owacci, “Koŋ wubed i Jeriko, nio ka yer tikwu
otwi olot, ka doŋ wudwog kany.”
6Ka jo Ammon guneno ni pigi odoko ŋwe marac bot Daudi, ci Kanun ki jo Ammon
gucwalo ryal ma romo talanta alip acel ka wilo gadigadi lweny ki wegi aguragura
ki bot jo Mecopotamia, wa ki i lobo Arammaaka, ki i Joba.
7Ci guwilo gadigadi lweny alip pyeradek wiye aryo, ki kabaka me Maaka bene, ma
onoŋo obino ki monnye, ogony i nyim Medeba. Jo Ammon bene gucokke ki i
gaŋigi, gubino ka lweny.
8Ka Daudi owinyo pigi, ci ocwalo Joab kacel ki mony pa twoni oteka lweny ducu.
9Ci jo Ammon gubino gurwayo cok ka guryeyo i dog gaŋ; luker ma gubino
guryeyo kengi, i dye bar.
403
10Ka Joab oneno mony okace woko ryoryo, tuŋ nyime ki yo tuŋ ŋeye bene, ci
oyero jo Icrael ma oyita lweny, ocako ryeyogi gukemo jo Ciria;
11oketo jo mudoŋŋe bot ominne Abicai, gin bene guryeyo gukemo jo Ammon.
12Joab owacci, “Ka ce jo Ciria gubedo tek i koma, ci ibikonya, ento ka jo Ammon
aye gubedo tek i komi, an abikonyi.
13Bed oteka ma cwinye nwaŋ, wek walweny pi lutuwa, ki pi gaŋi pa Lubaŋawa,
Rwot bene otim gin ma oneno ni ber.”
14Kit meno Joab ki jo ma gitye kwede ducu gurwayo cok ka lweny i kom jo Ciria;
ci jo Ciria guriŋo woko ki i nyime.
15Ka jo Ammon guneno jo Ciria guriŋo woko, ci gin bene gucako riŋo woko ki i
nyim Abicai omin Joab, gudonyo wa i gaŋ, Ci Joab obino i Jerucalem.
16Ento ka jo Ciria guneno jo Icrael guloyogi, gucwalo lukwena ci gukelo jo Ciria
ma gitye loka Euprate, kacel ki Copak ma lawimony pa Adadejer ma latel wigi.
17Ka gitito pigi bot Daudi, ci en bene ocoko jo Icrael ducu oŋolo kwedgi kulu
Jordan, ci obino i komgi, oryeyo monnye orwayo i komgi. Ka Daudi doŋ oryeyo
monnye, orwayo kom jo Ciria, gucako lweny kwede.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
702
18Jo Ciria gucako riŋo woko ki i nyim Icrael; Daudi oneko jo Ciria ma romo riŋo ki
gadigadi lweny alip abiro, ki askari ma woto ki tyengi alip pyeraŋwen, ka dok
oneko Copak ladit me monygi bene.
19Ka lutic pa Adadejer guneno jo Icrael gutyeko loyogi woko, ci guketo kuc i kingi
ki Daudi, ci gudoko luticce. Kit meno jo Ciria pe dok gubedo ki miti me konyo jo
Ammon i kare mo.
1 Tekwaro 20
Daudi omako Raba
(2 Cam 12.26-31)
1 I dog oro ma en aye kare ma luker gicito kwede ka mony, Joab ocako telo wi
mony, guneko lobo pa jo Ammon woko, ka dok gubino gurumo gaŋ Raba. Ento
Daudi yam odon i Jerucalem. Joab olwenyo i kom Raba, ci oloyo.
2Ci Daudi okwanyo lalukana me jabu ki i wi kabakagi; pekke romo ratili miya
acel, got me wei bene onoŋo tye iye. Ci gicibo i wi Daudi. Dok okelo jami ma
giyako i gaŋ meno madwoŋ twatwal.
3Dok okelo jo ma giyakogi ki i gaŋ meno, ci oketogi ka tic ki mucumeno ki cururu
nyonyo ki latoŋ-gu, Daudi obedo ka timo jo ma i gaŋi pa jo Ammon ducu kit
meno. Ci Daudi ki lwak ducu gucako dok cen wa i Jerucalem.
Jo pa Daudi guneko oteka lweny
(2 Cam 21.18-22)
4Lacen lweny dok ocakke i kom jo Piliciti ma i Gejer; ci Cibekai ma Lakucat oneko
Cipai woko, ma onoŋo en ŋat acel ma i kin likwayo pa twon oluma-ni; yam giloyo
jo, Piliciti kit meno.
5 Ka lweny dok ocakke i kom jo Piliciti; ci Elkanan wod pa Jair oneko Lami ma
omin Goliac ma jo Gat, ma bol toŋŋe rom ki rii yat lacwe boŋo.
6Lweny dok obedo i Gat ka ma tye iye dano mo ma oputte mabor liwawo, ma tye
ki nyig ciŋe abicel, ki nyig tyene bene abicel, tuŋ ryoryo ducu, ci nyig Lwete ducu
romo pyeraryo wiye aŋwen; en bene yam lakwar twoni oluma-nu.
7Ka okatti ka nywaro jo Icrael ki ŋala, ci Yonacan wod pa Cimea ma omin Daudi
oneko en woko.
8Jo man gin likwayo pa twoni oluma ma i Gat; gin ducu Daudi kacel ki luticce
gutyekogi woko.
1 Tekwaro 21
Daudi okwano wei jo Icrael ki Juda
(2 Cam 24.1-25)
1Catan ocuŋ ka lweny i kom Icrael, ocako piyo Daudi pi kwano wel jo Icrael.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
703
2Kit meno Daudi owaco bot Joab ki ludito me mony ducu ni, “Wucit ka kwano wei
jo Icrael, cakke ki i Beer-ceba nio kwede wa i Dan, ci wudwok lokke bota, wek aŋe
welgi.”
3Ento Joab ojuko Daudi kun owaco ni, “Myero Rwot Lubaŋa aye omed wei lwak
tyen miya kulu, kit ma doŋ gidwoŋ-ŋi! Pe gin ducu lwakki, rwoda kabaka, gin
ducu luticci, rwoda. Ci piŋo imito lakit tim macalo man i Piŋo imito kela bal i kom
Icrael?”
4Ento lok pa kabaka obedo tek makato pa Joab. Omiyo Joab oa ocito orumo lobo
Icrael ducu, ka odwogo kwede cen i Jerucalem.
5Ka Joab ocako miyo wel lwak ma okwano-ni bot Daudi. Jo Icrael ducu onoŋo
giromo milion acel ki alip miya acel ma gin wegi pala lucwan, ki i Juda giromo
alip miya aŋwen ki pyerabiro ma gin wegi pala lucwan.
6Ento Joab pe okwano wel jo pa Levi ki pa Benjamin, pien onoŋo cwiny Joab dag
cik pa kabaka.
7Ento cwiny Lubaŋa pe obedo yom i kom lok meno; ocako neko jo Icrael.
8Ci Daudi ocako bako doge bot Lubaŋa kun waco ni, “Abalo twon bal mo madit pi
gin ma doŋ atyeko tiyone. Kombeddi doŋ alegi, ikwany roc pa laticci woko; pien
atimo lok man me miŋo twatwal.”
9Rwot ocako lok ki Gad, ma lanen pa Daudi, kun wacci,
10“Cit iciwac bot Daudi ni, ‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, Amiyi lok adek; in ikwany acel
ki i kingi, wek ami opot i komi.’ “
11Kit meno Gad obino bot Daudi ci otitte lok meno ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni
‘Kwany acel ma imitone!
12Imito kec opot pi mwaka adek; nyo lumerokwu oryemwu pi dwe adek, kun
ginekowu ki pala lucwan; nyo pala pa Rwot aye opot i loboni ki two gemo pi nino
adek kulu, kun lamalaika pa Rwot neko jo ma i lobo Icrael tyeko woko ducu?’ In
doŋ itam kit lok ma abidok kwede bot ŋat ma ocwala boti-ni.”
13Daudi owaco bot Gad ni, “An doŋ adonyo i twon can madit ma pe wacce; wek
apot i cin Rwot, pien kicane dwoŋ; ento pe apot i cin dano.”
14Kit meno Rwot ocako cwalo two gemo opoto i kom Icrael; ci jo Icrael guto ma
romo co alip pyerabiro.
15Ci Lubaŋa ocwalo lamalaika i kom Jerucalem pi tyekone woko; ento ka doŋ
mito tyekone, ci Rwot oneno, ci oŋut i kom gin marac man, ci ojuko lamalaika ma
lanek piny-nyi woko, kun wacci, “Man doŋ oromo, doŋ ikul ciŋi piny.” Lamalaika
pa Rwot onoŋo ocuŋ i ŋet laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
704
16Ka Daudi otiŋo waŋe malo ci oneno lamalaika pa Rwot ocuŋ i kin lobo ki polo,
kun ciŋe owoto pala lucwan otiŋo i kom Jerucalem. Ci Daudi ki ludoŋo ducu,
gucako ruko boŋo cola, gupoto kwede piny aryeba cwiny.
17Daudi owaco bot Lubaŋa ni, “Pe an aye yam aciko pi kwano wel lwak? An aye
