yam abalo atyeko tiyo roc madit twatwal, ento lwak romi man, gutimo kit roc
aŋo? Alegi ni, wek ciŋi opot i koma ki i kom ot pa kwara keken; pe iwek two gemo
opot wa i kom lwakki.”
18Lamalaika pa Rwot dok ociko Gad ni owac ki Daudi wek ocit ka caŋo keno tyer
pi Rwot i laro moyo pa Oman ma jo Jebuc.
19Daudi ocito kunnu pi lok pa Gad, ma onoŋo oloko kit ma Rwot ocike kwede.
20I kare-nu onoŋo Oman tye ka dino ŋano; ka olokke ci oneno lamalaika,
awobene aŋwen ma yam gitye kwede gukanne woko.
21Ka Daudi woto cito bot Oman, ci Oman oneno; ka oneno Daudi ci oa ki i laro
ocito bot Daudi, omiye woro kun oryebbe piny i nyime.
22Daudi owaco bot Oman ni, “Miya kabedo man me laro moyo wek acan iye keno
tyer pi Rwot, miya awil pi welle kikome, wek two gemo oke woko i kom lwak.”
23Omao owaco bot Daudi ni, “Ber iter; wek in, rwoda kabaka, ityer iye gin ma
ineno ni ber; nen amiyo twon me gitum awaŋa, ki opam ladin bel me yen, ki nyig
ŋano me gityer me moko kwon; amiyogi ducu.”
24Ento kabaka Daudi ogamo dog Oman ni, “Pe kumeno, ento abiwilo i welle
kikome; pe abityero jamini ma pe mera bot Rwot, pe abimiyo gitum awaŋa ma pe
awilo ki Limma.”
25Kit meno Daudi ocako miyo bot Oman cekel me jabu miya abicel ma gipimo
pekgi pi wilo kabedo-nu.
26Ci Daudi ocako caŋo keno tyer pi Rwot kunnu, ka otyero gitum awaŋa ki gitum
lakwecwiny-gu, ocako lwoŋo iye nyiŋ Rwot, ci Rwot odok iye ki mac ma oa i polo
ma obino i kom keno tyer me gitum awaŋa.
27Rwot ociko lamalaika, ci orwako pala lucwanne i akurane.
Daudi oyero kabedo pi ot pa Lubaŋa
28I kare meno, ka Daudi oneno ni Rwot otyeko dokke iye ki i laro moyo pa Oman
ma jo Jebuc, ci obedo ka tyero gitumme ducu kunnu.
29Pien kema pa Rwot ma Moses yam oti yo i tim, ki keno tyer me gitum awaŋa
bene onoŋo pud gitye wa i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa i wi got ma tye Gibeon;
30ento Daudi yam pe cito kunnu ka penyo dog Rwot Lubaŋa, pien obedo ka lworo
pala lucwan pa lamalaika pa Rwot.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
705
1 Tekwaro 22
1Daudi dok owacci, “Ot pa Rwot Lubaŋa bibedo kany, ki keno tyer me gitum
awaŋa pi jo Icrael bene bibedo kany.”
Daudi oyubo pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa
2Daudi ociko pi coko lurok ma onoŋo gibedo i lobo Icrael, ci oketo lupa-godi ka
yubo godi ma gipayogi mabeco pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa.
3Daudi dok okano lwak nyonyo madwoŋ me yubo mucumar pi guro kika me dog
gaŋ, ki okol latwe bao, ki lwak mola madwoŋ ma pekke pe pimme,
4ki lwak bao cedar ma welle pe kwanne, pien jo Cidon ki jo Turo gukelo bot Daudi
bao cedar madwoŋ twatwal.
5Pien Daudi yam owacci, “Latinna Solomon pud tidi, peya tye ki ŋec mo, dok ot
ma gibigero pi Rwot myero obed me deyo makato ducu, wek ywekane ki deyone
orom lobo ducu; mumiyo an aye ayubo kit gerone.” Pienne Daudi ocako yubo
lwak jami madwoŋ twatwal ma pud kwo.
6Ka dok olwoŋo wode Solomon, ociko en pi gero ot pa Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
7Daudi owaco ki Solomon ni, “Woda, onoŋo abedo ki tam i cwinya pi gero ot mo
pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋa.
8Ento lok pa Rwot yam obino bota kun wacci, ‘In doŋ ityeko oyo lwak remo
mapol, dok ibedo ka Lwenyo lweny madito-gu; pe ibigero ot mo pi nyina, pien
ityeko oyo lwak remo madwoŋ i nyima ki i wi lobo.
9Nen ba, ibinywalo latin laco; en bibedo ki kuc, abimiye kuc ma lumerokke ducu
pe gibiyele; pienno nyiŋe bibedo Solomon, dok abimiyo kuc ki yweyo bot Icrael i
karene.
10En aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa, En bibedo woda, ki an abibedo wonne, dok abimoko
komkerre bedo i Icrael matwal.’
11Iyo latinna, Rwot obed kwedi, wek ityek gero ot pa Rwot Lubaŋani, kit ma yam
oloko kwede i komi-ni.
12Atikane, Rwot aye myero omiyi ryeko ki niaŋ matut, wek ibed ka lubo cik pa
Rwot Lubaŋani ka en doŋ omiyi dit me loyo Icrael.
13 Dok ibilimo gum ka ce ibedo ka gwoko kit cik ducu ki ŋol ducu ma cen Rwot
ociko ki Moses pi jo Icrael. Bed oteka ma cwinyi nwaŋ. Pe ilwor; cwinyi pe opoti.
14Nen an doŋ ayelle mada ci doŋ atyeko yubo jami magi pi ot pa Rwot: jabu ma
romo talanta alip miya acel, ryal ma romo talanta milion acel, ki mola ki nyonyo
ma pekke pe pimme, pien gidwoŋ twatwal; ka dok ayubo bao ki got-gu, In dok
imed mu kene i komgi.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
706
15Dok it ye ki lwak lutic mapol: I upa-godi, lugedo ki godi, lupac ki ludiro tic ducu
ma welgi pe kwanne, ki jo ma gikwiri i ticgi,
16ma gitiyo ki jabu, ki ryal-gu, ki mola ki nyonyo-gu, Doŋ ia malo icak tic cut!
Rwot obed kwedi.”
17Daudi dok ociko ludito ma i Icrael ducu pi konyo wode Solomon kun wacci,
18“Rwot Lubaŋa tye kwedwu? Dok pe en aye omiyowu kuc i kabedo ducu? En aye
otyeko miyo wegi lobo-ni i ciŋa; dok lobo doŋ gitayo ki i nyim Rwot ki i nyim
lwakke.
19Iyo, kombeddi doŋ wuket tamwu ki cwinywu ka yenyo Rwot Lubaŋawu. Doŋ
wutwarre malo wuciger kabedo maleŋ pa Rwot Lubaŋa, ka wek canduk me
gicikke pa Rwot ki jami pa Lubaŋa maleŋ-gu ducu gikelgi wa i ot ma doŋ gigero pi
nyiŋ Rwot.”
1 Tekwaro 23
1 Ka Daudi doŋ oti ma mwakane doŋ dwoŋ, ci ocako keto wode Solomon obedo
kabaka ma loyo Icrael.
Lwak dul pa Lulevi ki ajwagi ki dog ticgi
2Daudi ocoko ludito ma i Icrael ducu, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi.
3Gikwano Lulevi ducu ma ditogi romo mwaka pyeradek dok kwede malo, ci wel
co ducu oromo alip pyeradek wiye aboro.
4Daudi owacci, “Jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen ki i komgi gibiketogi ka tic i ot pa
Rwot; jo alip abicel gibibedo jagi ki luŋolkop;
5jo alip aŋwen gibibedo lugwok-doggola, ki jo alip aŋwen gibipako Rwot ki jami
wer ma yam atiyo pi pake kwede.”
6Ci Daudi opokogi i dul muporo awobe pa Levi, Gercom, Kokat ki Merari.
7Litino awobe pa Gercom gin aye Ladan ki Cimei.
8Litino awobe pa Ladan gin aye Jekiel ma laditgi, ki Jetam ki Joel, gin adek.
9Litino awobe pa Cimei gin aye Celomot, Kajiel ki Karan, gin adek. Magi gin aye
ludito kaka pa Ladan ma i odi pa kwarogi.
10Litino awobe pa Cimei gin aye Jakat, Jina, Jeuc ki Beria. Jo aŋwen-nu gin aye
litino awobe pa Cimei.
11Jakat aye onoŋo laditgi, ki me aryone Jija; ento Jeuc ki Beria pe gunywalo awobe
mapol, mumiyo gikwanogi macalo dog ot ma kwarogi acel.
12Litino awobe pa Kokat gin aye Amram, Ijar, Kebron ki Ujiel, gin aŋwen.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
707
13 Litino awobe pa Amram gin aye Aron ki Moses. Aron gibolle tic me kwero jami
maleŋ makato, wek en ki litino awobene guwan odok eceta i nyim Rwot matwal,
dok guti bote, gulam gum i nyiŋe matwal.
14Ento litino awobe pa Moses ma dano pa Lubaŋa yam gikwanogi i kin kaka pa
Levi.
15Litino awobe pa Moses gin aye Gercom ki Eliejer.
16Litirro awobe pa Gercom: Cebuel aye laditgi.
17Litino awobe pa Eliejer: Rekabia aye laditgi. Eliejer pe onywalo litino awobe
mukene, ento Rekabia onywalo litino awobe mapol mada.
18Litino awobe pa Ijar, Celomit aye laditgi.
19Litino awobe pa Kebron gin aye Jeria ma laditgi, ki me aryone Amaria, me
adekke Jakajiel, ki me aŋwenne Jekameam.
20Litino awobe pa Ujiel gin aye Mika ma laditgi, ki me aryone Icia.
21Litino awobe pa Merari gin aye Makali ki Muci. Litino awobe pa Makali gin aye
Eleajar ki Kic.
22Eleajar oto ma pe onywalo awobe, onywalo anyira keken; ento ludoggolagi ma
awobe pa Kic aye gunyomogi.
23Litino awobe pa Muci gin aye Makali, Eder ki Jeremot, gin adek.
24Magi aye litino awobe pa Levi ma i odi pa kwarogi, ma gin ludito kaka ma i odi
pa kwarogi kit ma yam gicoyogi kwede, ma lubo wei ki nyiŋ dano ki acel acel ma
ditogi romo mwaka pyeraryo dok kwede malo, ma gibedo ka tiyo tic i ot pa
Lubaŋa.
25Pien Daudi onoŋo owacci, “Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael doŋ omiyo kuc ki jone; en
doŋ bedo: i Jerucalem matwal.
26 Pi meno Lulevi pe doŋ gimitogi pi tiŋo kema pa Rwot, kadi jami mo ma gitiyo
kwede.”
27Pi lok ma Daudi oloko me agikkine omiyo gicoyo wel Lulevi ma ditogi romo
mwaka pyeraryo ki dok kwede malo.
28 En dok owacci, “Ticgi bibedo me konyo awobe pa Aron ka tic i ot pa Rwot, kun
gigwoko dyekal ki kicika odi matinone, gilonyo jami maleŋ ducu, dok gitiyo kit tic
mu kene ducu ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
29Dok ikonyo bene ki kela mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot, ki moko kwon me
gityer me moko kwon, ki capat mareppe ma tobi pe iye, ki gityer me moko kwon
ma gitedo i otako nyonyo, ki gityer me moko kwon ma girubo ki moo, ki gin pimo
pek ki dwoŋ pa jami mapatpat.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
708
30Gin gibicuŋ ka miyo pwoc ki pak bot Rwot odiko odiko, ki otyeno otyeno bene
kumeno,
31ki i kare ducu ma gityero gitum awaŋa bot Rwot i cen cabit, ki i por dwe, ki i
nino maditogu, gibicuŋ i nyim Rwot kare ducu, kun gilubo wel jo ma giciko.
32Gibigwoko kema me rwatte ki kabedo maleŋ kit meno, dok gibikonyo utmegigi,
awobe pa Aron, i ticgi ma i ot pa Rwot.”
1 Tekwaro 24
1Dul pa likwayo pa Aron gin ene. Litino awobe pa Aron gin aye Nadab, Abiu,
Eleajar ki Itamar.
2 Ento Nadab ki Abiu guto i kare ma wongi pud kwo, litinogi bene pe, mumi yo
Eleajar ki Itamar gudoko ajwagi pa Lubaŋa.
3Ci Daudi opokogi muporo dog ticgi ma giyerogi iye, kun jo ma gukonye gin aye
Jadok ma i kin likwayo pa Eleajar, ki Akimelek ma i kin likwayo pa Itamar.
4Doŋ macalo ginoŋo jo madito mapolle i kin likwayo pa Eleajar makato ma i kin
likwayo pa Itamar, gupoko ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarogi apar wiye abicel
pi likwayo pa Eleajar, ki ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi aboro pi likwayo pa
Itamar.
5Gipokogi ki bolo kwir, marom, pien ludito me kabedo maleŋ ki ludito pa Lubaŋa
yam gubedo i kin likwayo pa Eleajar ki i kin likwayo pa Itamar bene.
6Cemaya wod pa Netanel ma Lalevi, ma obedo karan, yam ocoyo nyiŋgi ki i nyim
kabaka, ki i nyim rwodi, ki ajwaka Jadok, ki Akimelek wod pa Abiatar, ki ludito
kaka ma i odi pa kwaro pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi; yam guyero dog ot pa kwarogi acel
pi Eleajar ki acel giyero pi Itamar.
7Kwir mukwoŋo opoto i kom Yekoyarib, ki me aryo i kom Jedaya,
8me adek i kom Karim, me aŋwen i kom Ceorim,
9me abic i kom Malkija, me abicel i kom Mijamin,
10me abiro i kom Kakoj, me aboro i kom Abija,
11me aboŋwen i kom Yecwa, me apar i kom Cekania,
12me apar wiye acel i kom Eliacab, me apar wiye aryo i kom Jakim,
13me apar wiye adek i kom Kupa, me apar wiye aŋwen i kom Jecebeab,
14me apar wiye abic i kom Bilga, me apar wiye abicel i kom Imer,
15me apar wiye abiro i kom Kejir, me apar wiye aboro i kom Kapijej,
16me apar wiye aboŋwen i kom Petakia, me pyeraryo i kom Jekejikel,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
709
17me pyeraryo wiye acel i kom Jakin, me pyeraryo wiye aryo i kom Gamul,
18me pyeraryo wiye adek i kom Delaya, me pyeraryo wiye aŋwen i kom Maajia.
19Dog tic ma giyero jo magi iye obedo me donyo i ot pa Rwot, kun gilubo cik ma
yam kwarogi Aron oketo pigi, macalo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael yam ociko en
kwede.
20Lok kom likwayo pa Levi mudoŋŋe: i kin likwayo pa Amram giyero Cubael; ki i
kin likwayo pa Cubael giyero Jedeya.
21Likwayo pa Rekabia: i kin likwayo pa Rekabia giyero Icia ma laditgi.
22I kin likwayo pa Ijar giyero Celamot; i kin likwayo pa Celamotgiyero Jakat.
23I kin likwayo pa Kebron giyero Jeria ma laditgi, me aryone Amajia, me adek
Jakajiel, me aŋwen Jekameam.
24I kin likwayo pa Ujiel giyero Mika; i kin likwayo pa Mika giyero Camir.
25Omin Mika en aye Icia; i kin likwayo pa Icia giyero Jekaria.
26I kin likwayo pa Merari giyero Makali ki Muci. I kin likwayo pa Jajia giyero
Beno.
27Likwayo pa Merari gin aye Jajia, Beno, Cokam, Jakur ki Ibri.
28I kin likwayo pa Makali giyero Eleajar ma pe onywalo awobe.
29I kin likwayo pa Kic giyero Jeramel.
30I kin likwayo pa Muci giyero Makali, Eder ki Jerimot. Magi gin aye likwayo pa jo
Levi, kun lubo dog odi pa kwarogi.
31Jo magi bene, ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwarogi acel acel gubolo kwir, kun
ladit bolo kacel ki utmegine matino, macalo utmegigi ma likwayo pa Aron gubolo
ki i nyim kabaka Daudi, Jadok, Akimelek ki ludito kaka ma i dog odi pa kwaro pa
ajwagi ki pa Lulevi.
1 Tekwaro 25
Dul pa luwer
1Daudi ki ludito ma loyo tic gubolo tic ki jo mogo ma i kin likwayo pa Acap, pa
Eman ki pa Jedutun, wek gutit lok pa Lubaŋa macalo lunebi ki opuk ki naŋa ki
atego agoya-gu, Nyiŋ jo ma yam gitiyo tic man, ki dog ticgi gin ene:
2i kin litino pa Acap, Jakur, Yucepu, Netania ki Acarela, ma litino pa Acap, Acap
aye telogi i wer, kun tito lok ma a ki bot Lubaŋa, i te cik pa kabaka.
3Litino pa Jedutun gin Gedalia, Jeri, Jecaya, Cimei, Kacabia ki Matitia, gin abicel,
ma wongi Jedutun aye telogi i wer, kun tito lok a ma ki bot Lubaŋa ki opuk pi
miyo pwoc bot Rwot.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
710
4Litino pa Eman gin Bukia, Matania, Ujiel, Cebuel, ki Jerimot, Anania, Kanani,
Eliata, Gidalti, ki Romamtiejer, Jocebekaca, Maloti, Kotir ki Makajiot.
5Magi ducu aye litino pa Eman ma lanen pa kabaka, macalo Lubaŋa yam ociko
bote ni ebipilo wiye; pien Lubaŋa omiyo ki Eman litino awobe apar wiye aŋwen
ki anyira adek.
6Gin ducu yam wongi aye telogi i wer i ot pa Rwot, kun giwero ki atego agoya,
naga ki opuk pi konyo lega ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, Acap, Jedutun ki Eman yam gitiyo i
te loc pa kabaka.
7Wei jo man giribo ki utmegigi ma yam gipwonyogi ki wer bot Rwot, jo ducu ma
yam luryeko, giromo miya aryo ki pyeraboro wiye aboro.
8Gin ducu gipokogi i dog tic kun gibolo kwir, kun jo matino ki jo madito, lupwony
ki jo ma gipwonyogi, gitimogi ducu marom.
9Kwir mukwoŋo opoto i kom Yucepu, ma jo pa Acap; me aryone opoto i kom
Gedalia, ci okwako en ki omegine, ki litino awobene, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
10me adekke opoto i kom Jakur kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar
wiye aryo;
11me aŋwenne opoto i kom Ijri kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar
wiye aryo;
12me abicce opoto i kom Netania kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu
apar wiye aryo;
13me abicelle opoto i kom Bukia kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu
apar wiye aryo;
14me abirone opoto i kom Jecarela kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu
apar wiye aryo;
15me aborone opoto i kom Jecaya kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu
apar wiye aryo;
16me aboŋwenne opoto i kom Matania kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin
ducu apar wiye aryo;
17me aparre opoto i kom Cimei kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine, gin ducu apar
wiye aryo;
18me apar wiye acelle opoto i kom Ajarel kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin
ducu apar wiye aryo;
19me apar wiye aryone opoto i kom Kacabia kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
711
20me apar wiye adekke opoto i kom Cubael kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
21me apar wiye aŋwenne opoto i kom Matitia kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
22me apar wiye abicce opoto i kom Jeremot kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
23me apar wiye abicelle opoto i kom Anania kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
24me apar wiye abirone opoto i kom Jocebekaca kacel ki litino awobene ki
omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
25me apar wiye aborone opoto i kom Kanani kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
26me apar wiye aboŋwenne opoto i kom Maloti kacel ki litino awobene ki
omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
27me pyeraryone opoto i kom Eliata kacel ki litino awo bene ki omegine, gin ducu
apar wiye aryo;
28me pyeraryo wiye acelle opoto i kom Kotir kacel ki litino awobene ki omegine,
gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
29me pyeraryo wiye aryone opoto i kom Gidalti kacel ki litino awobene ki
omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
30me pyeraryo wiye adekke opoto i kom Makajiot kacel ki litino awobene ki
omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo;
31me pyeraryo wiye aŋwenne opoto i kom Romamtiejer kacel ki litino awobene
ki omegine, gin ducu apar wiye aryo.
1 Tekwaro 26
Lugwok-doggola
1Lok kom dul pa lugwokdoggola. I kin jo pa Kora guyero Mecelemia ma wod pa
Kore ma i kin likwayo pa Acap.
2Mecelemia onywalo awobe magi: Jekaria ma latin kayone, ka dok me aryone
Jediael, me adekke Jebadia, me aŋwenne Jatiniel,
3me abicce Elam, me abicelle Yekokanan, me abirone Eliekoenai.
4 Obed-edom onywalo awobe magi: Cemaya ma latin kayo, ka dok me aryone
Yekojabad, me adekke Joa, me aŋwenne Cakar, me abicce Netanel,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
712
5me abicelle Amiel, me abirone Icakar, me aborone Peuletai; pien Lubaŋa omiye
gum.
6Ki wode Cemaya bene onywalo awobe ma gubedo rwodi i dog odi pa kwarogi,
pien gubedo jo makwiri atika.
7Litino awobe pa Cemaya gin aye Otini, Repael, Obed ki Eljabad, ma omegigi
gubedo jo makwiri, nyiŋgi Eliu ki Cemakia.
8Jo magi ducu gin aye likwayo pa Obed-edom kacel ki awobegi ki omegigi, jo
makwiri ma giromo tic; jo pa Obed-edom giromo pyerabicel wiye aryo.
9Mecelemia bene obedo ki awo bene ki omegine ma gikwiri, gin apar wiye aboro.
10Ki Koca ma i kin likwayo pa Merari onywalo awobe magi: Cimri aye laditgi; kadi
pe en aye latin kayo, ento wonne okero en odoko ladit;
11ka dok me aryone Ilkia, me adekke Tebalia, me aŋwenne Jekaria; awobe pa
Koca kacel ki omegine, ducu giromo apar wiye adek.
12Dul magi pa lugwok-doggola, ma dul acel acel tye ki laditte, gipokogi tic, kit ma
yam gipoko ki utmegigi bene ma gubedo ka tic i ot pa Rwot;
13dok gibolo kwir ma lubo dog odi pa kwarogi, pi noŋo doggola ma gibigwoko,
kun dog odi matino ki maditone gitimogi marom.
14Kwir ma gibolo pi doggola ma tuŋ wokceŋ opoto i kom Celemia. Gibolo kwir
bene pi wode Jekaria, ma en lami-tam ma ŋeyo piny mada, ci mere opoto pi
doggola ma tuŋ acam.
15Pa Obed-edom opoto pi doggola ma tuŋ acuc, ci pa awobene obedo ot kano
jami.
16Pa Cupim ki Koca opoto pi doggola ma tuŋ potoceŋ, kacel ki doggola ma
gilwoŋo Caleket ma i yo ma dok tuŋ malo. Lugwok-doggola gukemme ki luwotgi.
17Ki tuŋ wokceŋ gubedo jo abicel i nino acel acel, ki tuŋ acam jo aŋwen i nino acel
acel, ki tuŋ acuc bene jo aŋwen i nino acel acel, kacel ki jo aryo aryo i ot kano
jami.
18I ot ma tere aperu ma yo tuŋ potoceŋ onoŋo giketo jo aŋwen i ŋet yo, ki aryo i
ŋet ot ma tere aperu.
19Magi aye dul pa lugwok-doggola ma i kin jo pa Kora ki likwayo pa Merari.
Ludito ma gwoko odi me kano lim
20I kin Lulevi giketo Akija obedo ladit ma gwoko odi me kano lim ma i ot pa
Lubaŋa, ki odi me kano lim me mot ma gidyero bot Rwot.
21I kin likwayo pa Gercon likwayo pa Ladan aye gubedo ludito kaka i dog odi pa
kwarogi. Laditgi aye Jekieli.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
713
22Litino awobe pa Jekieli, ma gin aye Jetam ki ominne Joel, gubedo ludito ma
gwoko odi me kano lim ma i ot pa Rwot.
23I kin jo pa Amram, pa Ijar, pa Kebron ki pa Ujiel.
24Cebuel, ma lakwar Gercom ma wod pa Moses, en aye rwot madit ma giketo pi
gwoko odi me kano limo
25Omegine gin ene: i kin likwayo pa Eliejer obedo wode Rekabia, ma wode Jecaya,
ma wode Joram, ma wode Jikri, ma wode Celomot.
26Celomot man ki omegine gubedo ludito ma gwoko odi me kano mot ducu ma
yam kabaka Daudi odyero bot Rwot, ki mot ma ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi ki
ludito ma giloyo buca mony me jo alip, ki buca mony me jo miya, ki lutel wi mony
yam gudyero bene.
27Gin yam gudyero mot mua i lim ma giyako i lweny me yubo ot pa Rwot.
28Dok bene lim ducu ma yam Camuel ma lanen-piny, ki Caulo wod pa Kic, ki
Abneri wod pa Ner, ki Joab, wod pa Jeruya yam gudyero bot Rwot; mot ducu ma
gidyero Celomot ki omegine gubedo ka gwokone.
Ludito tic mukene
29I kom jo pa Ijar, giketo Kanania ki awobene pi tic ma woko ma i Icrael me bedo
jagi ki luŋolkop.
30I kom jo pa Kebron giketo Kacabia ki omegine ma gikwiri ma romo alip acel ki
miya abiro me ne no tic ma i Icrael ma loka Jordan yo tuŋ potoceŋ, pi tic pa Rwot
ducu ki pi tic pa kabaka bene.
31I kom jo pa Kebron laditgi obedo Jerija ma loyo jo pa Kebron ducu ma ocoko
dog odi pa kwarogi ducu. I mwaka me pyeraŋwen me loc pa Daudi yam gibedo ka
yenyo, ci ginoŋo jo makwiri atika ma i kingi i Jajer ma i Gilead.
32Kabaka Daudi oketo en ki omegine, jo makwiri ma romo alip aryo ki miya abiro,
ma gin ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, me neno tic pa jo pa Reuben, jo pa Gad ki
nucu kaka pa Manace pi lok ducu ma mako tic pa Lubaŋa ki pi lok pa kabaka.
1 Tekwaro 27
Ludito ma loyo tic pa kabaka
1Man aye nyiŋ jo Icrael ma ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarogi, ludito ma giloyo buca
mony pa jo alip ki buca mony pa jo miya, ki luditogi ma yam gitiyo bot kabaka i
kom lok ducu ma mako dul pa jo ma gibino ki ma gicito dwe ki dwe pi mwaka
ducu, kun dul acel acel welle romo jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen:
2Jacobeam ma wod pa Jabdiel en aye ladit ma loyo dul mukwono ma tiyo i dwe
mukwono; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
714
3En yam lakwar Perej, en yam ladit ma loyo luwi mony ducu pa mony ma gitiyo i
dwe mukwoŋo.
4Dodai ma jo Akoki aye ladit ma loyo jo ma tiyo i dwe me aryo; i dulle tye iye jo
alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
5Ladit me adekke, ma loyo jo ma tiyo i dwe me adek, en aye Benaya wod pa
ajwaka Yekoyada, en aye laditgi; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
6Benaya man en aye twon oteka ma i kin jo pyeradek ca, dok en aye ma loyo jo
pyeradek-ku; wode Amijabad aye ladit ma loyo lwak ma i dulle.
7Me aŋwenne obedo Acael ma omin Joab, pi dwe me aŋwen; ŋat ma olube obedo
Jebadia ma wode. I dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
8Ladit me abicce, pi dwe me abic, en aye Camkut ma jo pa Ijra; i dulle tye iye jo
alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
9Me abicelle pi dwe me abicel en aye Ira ma wod pa Ikec ma jo Tekoa; i dulle tye
iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
10Me abirone, pi dwe me abiro, en aye Kelej ma jo Pelon, ma i kin likwayo pa
Epraim; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
11Me aborone, pi dwe me aboro, en aye Cibekai ma jo Kueat, pa jo pa Jera; i dulle
tye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
12Me aboŋwenne, pi dwe me aboŋwen, en aye Abiejer ma jo Anatot, ma
Labenjamin; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
13Me aparre, pi dwe me apar, en aye Makarai ma jo Netopa, ma jo Jera; i dulle tye
iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
14Me apar wiye acelle, pi dwe me apar wiye acel, en aye Benaya ma jo Piraton, ma
i kin likwayo pa Epraim; i dulle tye i iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
15Me apar wiye aryone, pi dwe me apar wiye aryo, en aye Keldai ma jo Netopa,
likwayo pa Otiniel; i dulle tye iye jo alip pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
16Jo ma loyo kaka pa Icrael gin ene: ladit ma loyo jo pa Reuben en aye Eliejer ma
wod, pa Jikri; pi jo pa Cimeon, Cepatia ma wod pa Maaka;
17pi jo pa Levi, en Kacabia ma wod pa Kamuel; pi jo pa Aron, Jadok;
18pi jo pa Juda, Eliu, ma ŋat acel ma i kin omegi Daudi; pi jo pa Icakar, Omri ma
wod pa Mikael;
19pi jo pa Jabulon, Icmaya ma wod pa Obadia; pi jo pa Naputali, Jeremot ma wod
pa Ajriel;
20pi jo pa Epraim, Kocea ma wod pa Ajajia; pi nucu kaka pa Manace, Joel ma wod
pa Pedaya;
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
715
21pi nucu kaka pa Manace ma i Gilead, Iddo ma wod pa Jekaria; pi jo pa Benjamin,
Jaciel ma wod pa Abneri;
22pi jo pa Dan, Ajarel ma wod pa Jerokam. Magi aye ludito ma loyo kaka ducu ma i
Icrael.
23 Daudi yam pe okwano wel jo ma mwaka me ditogi pe romo pyeraryo, pien
Rwot yam ociko ni ebimiyo jo Icrael gibedo mapol macalo lwak lakalatwe me
polo.
24 Joab ma wod pa Jeruya yam ocako kwano welgi ento pe ocobo; kadi bed
kumeno akemo opoto i kom Icrael pi roc man, welgi bene pe gicoyo i buk me
tekwaro pa kabaka Daudi.
25Ŋat ma loyo odi me kano lim pa kabaka en aye Ajimavet ma wod pa Adiel; ki ma
loyo odi lim ma i lobo, ma i gaŋi madito ki matinone, ki i odi matego ma ocudo
malo liŋ aye Yonacan ma wod pa Ujia;
26ki ma loyo jo ma gitiyo tic me pur i poto en aye Ejiri ma wod pa Kelub;
27ki ma loyo poto olok en aye Cimei ma jo Rama; ki ma loyo gin ma ocek i poto
olok ma gikano i odi me kano kono yino en aye Jabdi ma jo Cipmi.
28Ŋat ma loyo yadi jeituni ki olam ma i bar Cepela en aye Baal-kanan ma jo Geder,
dok ŋat ma loyo ot kano moo jeituni en aye Yoaci.
29Ŋat ma loyo lwak dyaŋi ma gikwayogi i Caron aye Citrai ma jo Caron; ki ma loyo
lwak dyaŋi ma i nota ducu aye Capat ma wod pa Adlai.
30Ŋat ma loyo kinaga aye Obil ma jo Icmael; ki, ma loyo megi kana aye Jedeya ma
jo Meronot. Ŋat ma loyo romi ki dyegi aye Jajij ma jo Agri.
31Jo magi ducu gin lugwok-lim pa kabaka Daudi.
32Yonacan ma okeyo Daudi aye lami-tam, pien obedo dano ma niaŋ matut, dok
karan bene; en ki Jekiel ma wod pa Kakmoni gubedo lugwok litino awobe pa
kabaka.
33Akitopel obedo lami-tam pa kabaka, ki Kucai ma jo Arki obedo larem kabaka.
34Jo ma guleyo ka tyen Akitopel aye Yekoyada ma wod pa Benaya, ki Abiatar. Joab
aye ladit me mony pa kabaka.
1 Tekwaro 28
Daudi ociko Solomon pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa
1Daudi ocoko ludito pa jo Icrael ducu i Jerucalem, ludito ma loyo kaka ducu,
ludito ma loyo dul tic ducu ma gitiyo i te loc pa kabaka, ludito ma loyo buca mony
me jo alip, ki buca mony me jo miya, ludito ma gwoko jami ducu ki lim makwo
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
716
ducu pa kabaka ki pa awo bene, kacel ki ludito ma loyo gaŋ kai, ki jo ma twoni
oteka, ki jo ducu ma gunyebbe ki lweny.
2 Ci kabaka Daudi oa malo, ocuŋ, ocako waco ni, “Wuwiny an, wun utmega ki wun
lwakka. Yam abedo ki tam i cwinya me gero ot ka ma canduk me gicikke pa Rwot
biywe iye, ki ka ma gibiketo iye kom pa Lubaŋa me teno tyene; ci abedo ka yubo
kit me gerone ducu.
3Ento Lubaŋa ojuka kun wacca ni. ‘In pe ibigero ot mo pi nyina, pien in lalweny,
dok ityeko oyo lwak remo madwoŋ.’
4Kadi bed kumeno, ci Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael yam oyero an ki i kin doggola pa
kwarina ducu me bedo kabaka ma loyo jo Icrael matwal; pien yam oyero Juda
wek obed ladit, ki i ot pa Juda oyero ot pa wora, ki i kin litino awobe pa wora
cwinye okwanyo an me bedo kabaka ma loyo Icrael ducu.
5I kom litino awobena ducu, macalo Lubaŋa omiya litino awobe mapol, en oyero
iye woda Solomon me bedo i wi komker ma i te ker pa Rwot ma loyo Icrael.
6En rwacca ni, ‘Wodi Solomon aye bigerra ot ki dye kalle ducu, pien ayero en wek
obed woda, ki an bene abibedo wonne.
7Abimoko kerre bedo matwal, ka ce cwinye omoko matek me lubo cikka ki lok
ma aŋolo ducu kit ma en tye kwede i kare-ni.’
8Doŋ acikowu i nyim jo Icrael ducu, ki i nyim lwak pa Rwot ducu, ma kun Lubaŋa
bene winyo, wun wubed ka gwoko ki ka yenyo cik pa Rwot Lubaŋawu ducu, wek
wubed wegi lobo man maber-ri, ci wuwek obed ginaleya matwal bot likwayowu
ma gibilubo ŋewu.
9“In woda Solomon bene, ber iŋe Lubaŋa pa wora, iti ki en ki cwinyi ducu ki kero
komi ducu; pien Rwot ŋiyo cwiny dano ducu, dok ŋeyo gin ma cwiny dano yubo
ducu ki tamme ducu. Ka ce iyenyo en, ci in ibinoŋo kome; ento ka ce ibwoto en
woko, en bitenyi woko matwal.
10Ber igwokke matek, pien Rwot doŋ otyeko yero in pi gero ot me kabedo maleŋ;
bed laco, wek itim woko.”
11Ci Daudi omiyo bot wode Solomon cal kicika ot me donyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ma
yam gicoyo, ki cal odine ducu, ki cal odi kano lim, ki me kicika ma malo ducu, ki
me kicika odi matino ducu ma i iye, ki me kicika ma kom me kica bedo iye.
12Dok omiye cal ma nyuto dyekal me ot pa Rwot ducu kit ma yam cwinye otamo,
ki kicika odi matino ma orumo ot ducu, ki odi me kano lim ducu ma i ot pa
Lubaŋa, ki odi me kano lim me mot ma gidyero bot Rwot.
13Onyutte bene dul tic pa ajwagi ki Lulevi, ki kit kwa tic ducu ma gitiyo i ot pa
Rwot; ki kit kwa jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
717
14ki pek pa jabu ma mitte pi jami me jabu ma i dog tic acel acel, ki pek pa jami me
ryal pi dog tic acel acel,
15ki pek pa okar-mac me jabu, ki mac laputgi, pek me jabu ma mitte pi okar-mac
acel acel ki lwak laputte ducu, ki pek pa ryal ma mitte pi okar-mac acel acel ki
lwak laputte ducu, muporo kit tic pa okarmac acel acel ma gitiyo kwede,
16ki pek me jabu ma mitte pi meja acel acel me mugati me aketa i nyim Rwot, ki
pek me ryal ma mitte pi tiyo meja me ryal ducu,
17ki jabu ma giliyo maberre pi gin lacob riŋo, ki becen ducu, ki kikopo ducu; dok
pi atabo jabu ducu, ki pekgi acel acel; pi atabo ryal ducu ki pekgi acel acel;
18ki pi keno tyer me wano odok eceta ma gitiyo ki jabu ma giliyo maleŋŋe, ki
pekke. Ka doki onyutte cal gadigadi mejabu pa lukerubi ma giyaro bwomgi me
umo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot.
19Man ducu en onyuto ka maleŋ pi gin ma yam Rwot ocoyo pire ki ciŋe: tic ducu
myero giti ma lubo kit cal meno.
20Daudi dok owaco bot wode Solomon ni, “Bed laco ma cwinyi nwaŋ, wek itim
woko. Pe ilwor, pe cwinyi oryaŋŋe: pien Rwot Lubaŋa, ma en aye Lubaŋana, tye
kwedi. En pe bibwoti ata, dok pe bitenyi, nio ka tic ducu ma gitiyo i ot pa Rwot
bitum.
21Nen, it ye ki lwak dul pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi pi tiyo tic ducu me ot pa Lubaŋa; jo
ducu ma ludiro i kwa tic ducu, ma gitye ki miti, gibinywako tic kwedi; ki ludito ki
lwak ducu gibiwinyo dogi i lok ducu.”
1 Tekwaro 29
1 Kabaka Daudi dok owaco bot lwak ducu ma gucokke ni, “Latinna Solomon ma
Lubaŋa gire aye oyero en, pud tidi, peya tye ki ŋec mo, dok tic bene dit; pien gaŋ
kai man pe bibedo pa dano ento pa Rwot Lubaŋa.
2Pienno doŋ atyeko yubo jami ducu pi ot pa Lubaŋana kit munoŋo atwero, jabu pi
jami me jabu, ryal pi jami me ryal, mola pi jami me mola, nyonyo pi jami me
nyonyo, bao pi jami me bao, kun amedo iye lwak kidi onik mapol mada, ki litino
kidi me amwona i kom jabu, ki akuku-gu, ki godi ma raŋigi patpat, godi me wei
ma kitgi patpat, ki kidi matarre bene.
3Dok pien cwinya obedo yom i kom ot pa Lubaŋana, omiyo amiyo jami magi me
jabu ki me ryal mua i ciŋa pi ot pa Lubaŋana, kun amedo i kom lwak jami ducu
ma atyeko yubo pi ot maleŋ,
4gin ene: jabu ma pekke romo talanta adek, en aye jabu me Opir, ki ryal ma giliyo
maleŋŋe ma pekke romo talanta alip abiro pi mwono kom ot pa Rwot,
5ki pi tic ducu ma ludiro gibitiyo, jabu pi jami me jabu, ki ryal pi jami me ryal. Aŋa
ma bikelo jami ma cwinye opwoyo-ni, ma tin kwerre kene i nyim Rwot?”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
718
6Ci ludito kaka ma i odi pa kwarigi gucako tyero mot ma igi opwoyo, ki ludito ma
loyo kaka bene gumiyo kit meno, ki ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca
mony jo miya, ki ludito ma loyo tic pa kabaka.
7Gumiyo jami magi pi tic me ot pa Lubaŋa: jabu ma romo talanta alip abic ki darik
alip apar, ki ryal ma romo talanta alip apar, ki mola ma romo talanta alip aboro,
ki nyonyo ma romo talanta alip miya acel.
8Ki ŋat ma tye ki godi me wei omiyogi i ot kano lim ma i ot pa Rwot, ma Jekiel ma
jo pa Gercon aye gwoko.
9Cwiny lwak obedo yom pien jo magi gumiyo mot ma cwinygi opwoyo, pien
gutyero mot bot Rwot ki cwinygi ducu. Kabaka Daudi bene cwinye obedo yom
matek.
Daudi opwoyo Rwot
10Mumiyo Daudi opwoyo Rwot i nyim lwak mucokke ducu, kun wacci, “Gipwo in
Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa Icrael, nino ma pe tum.
11 Ai Rwot, dit ki tek ki deyo ki loc ki woro ducu meri, pien jami ducu ma tye i
polo ki ma tye i lobo ducu meri. Ker bene meri, ai Rwot, in gipilo wii pien iloyo
jami ducu.
12Lonyo ki deyo ducu a ki boti, dok in aye iloyogi ducu. Twero ki tek ducu tye i
ciŋi, dok ciŋi aye miyo dano dit dok miyo tek ki jo ducu.
13Wan doŋ wapwoyi, in Lubaŋawa, kun wapako nyiŋi me deyo matek.
14“Ento an aŋa, ki lwakka kono gin aŋo, niumiyo wabedo ki twero kit man me
miyo jamiwa kit ma iwa opwoyo-ni? Pien jami ducu a ki boti, dok wadwokki giri.
15Pien wan wawelo i nyimi, ki lubedo, kit ma yam kwarowa tye kwede; ninowa
me bedo i lobo Lokke calo tipo, kabedowa pe iye.
16Ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, lwak jami man ducu ma wamiyo pi gerri ot pi nyiŋi maleŋ
gua ki i ciŋi, ducu jamini giri.
17An aŋeyo, ai Lubaŋana, in itemo cwiny dano, ipwoyo dano ma cwinye atir; pi
cwinya ma tye atir omiya atyero boti mot me jami magi ducu; doŋ atyeko neno
lwakki ki waŋa, gin ma gitye kany-nyi, ka gityero jamigi boti kit ma cwinygi omito
ki yomcwiny madwoŋ.
18Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa Abraim ki Icaka ki Icrael, mi cwiny lwakki okem
tam ma kit ennu nakanaka, dok imi cwinygi okem boti keken.
19Dok mi bot woda Solomon gum me mako cikki ki cwinye ducu, ki lok ma ibolo,
ki lok ma iciko-gu, kun cobogi ducu; kun imiye gum me gero gaŋ kal ma doŋ
atyeko yubo jami pire-ni.”
Solomon oleyo ka tyen Daudi
(1 Luker 2.10-12)
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
719
20Lacen Daudi owaco bot lwak ducu mucokke ni, “Wupwo Rwot Lubaŋawu.”
Lwak mucokke ducu gucako pwoyo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, ci gukulo wigi piny,
guworo Rwot, dok gumiyo woro bot kabaka bene.
21Gutumo gitum bot Rwot, dok orwone bene gutyero gitum awaŋa bot Rwot,
twoni alip acel, nyogi romi alip acel ki litino romi alip acel, kacel ki gityer amata
ma otiko kit gityer acel acel, ki lwak gitum mukene mapol pi jo Icrael ducu.
22Gucamo dok gumato i nyim Rwot i nino meno ki yomcwiny madwoŋ twatwal.
Guketo Solomon wod pa Daudi me bedo kabaka tyen me aryone, kun giwire ki
moo me bedo laker pi Rwot, dok giwiro Jadok bene me bedo ajwaka pa Lubaŋa.
23 Lacen Solomon obedo kabaka i wi komker pa Rwot ma ka wonne Daudi; ci
obedo ki gumkom, kun jo Icrael giworo doge.
24Ci ludito ducu ki twoni oteka lweny ducu, kacel ki litino awobe pa kabaka Daudi
ducu, gucikke pi woro kabaka Solomon.
25Ci Lubaŋa omiyo Solomon yweka madit i nyim jo Icrael ducu, ci ocako onyo
deyo me loc i kome madwoŋ ma yam pe onen i kom kabaka me Icrael mo nia wa
con.
26Daudi wod pa Yece yam oloyo Icrael ducu kit meno.
27 Obedo ka loyo jo Icrael pi mwaka pyeraŋwen kulu; obedo ka loc i Kebron pi
mwaka abiro, ka dok i Jerucalem pi mwaka pyeradek wiye adek.
28Daudi oto ma doŋ oti woko likoŋ, i kare maber mupoŋ ki lonyo ki deyo; ci wode
Solomon oleyo ka tyene.
29Lok kom kabaka Daudi ducu nia i acakkine nio i agikkine gicoyogi i buk me
Tekwaro pa Camuel ma lanen ki i buk me Tekwaro pa lanebi Natan, ki i buk me
Tekwaro pa Gad ma lanen,
30kacel ki lok kom locce ducu, ki tekke ducu, ki lok ducu ma otimme i kome, ki i
kom Icrael ki i kom ker ducu ma i lobo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
720
2 Tekwaro
2 Tekwaro 1
Solomon olego ryeko
(1 Luker 3.3-15)
1Solomon wod pa Daudi omoko kerre matek, kun Rwot Lubaŋane bene onoŋo tye
kwede, ma omiyo en obedo madit twatwal.
2Solomon oloko ki jo Icrael ducu, bot ludito ma loyo buca mony me jo alip ki buca
mony me jo miya, ki bot luŋokop ki ludito ducu ma i Icrael ducu, ma gin aye
ludito wi kaka ki i odi pa kwarogi ducu.
3Solomon kacel ki lwak mucokke ducu gucito I kabedo me woro Lubaŋa i wi got
ma i Gibeon; pien kema me rwatte pa Lubaŋa, ma yam Moses latic pa Rwot otiyo
ki i tim, onoŋo pud bedo kunnu.
4 (Ento Daudi yam okwanyo canduk pa Lubaŋa ki i Kiriat-jearim, okelo i kabedo
ma ceŋ en oyubo pire, pien onoŋo oguro kema pire i Jerucalem,)
5 Onoŋo keno mola ma yam Bejalel wod pa Un, ma wod pa Kur otiyo-ni, pud tye
wa kunnu bene i nyim kema pa Rwot.
6Solomon ocito cok ki keno mola ma i nyim kema me rwatte, wa i nyim Rwot, ci
otyero iye gitum awaŋa alip acel kulu.
7I dyewor meno Lubaŋa onen Iye bot Solomon, owacce ni, “Peny gin ma abimiyo
boti.”
8Solomon ogamo doŋ Lubaŋa ni, “In yam myuto mar meri madwoŋ ma pe lokke
bot wora Daudi, dok iketo an adoko kabaka pi leyo ka Tyene.
9 Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, wek lok ma yam iciko bot wora Daudi tin doŋ ocobbe kakare,
pien iketo an adoko kabaka me loyo rok madit ma gipol ma rom ki apwa me ŋom.
10Ber tin imiya ryeko ki ŋeyo piny, wek aŋe kit me loyo rok man, pien aŋa ma
twero loyo lwakki man, madwoŋ ma rom manni?”
11Lubaŋa ogamo dog Solomon ni, “Ka meno aye gin ma tye i cwinyi, macalo in pe
ilego lim nyo lonyo nyo deyo, kadi pi jo ma gidagi ni myero ginekgi woko, pe bene
ilega, ni ami iri wi lobo nakanaka, ento ilego ryeko ki ŋeyo piny piri keni, wek ilo
lwakka ma aketo in ibedo kabakagi,
12ryeko ki ŋeyo piny doŋ amiyogi boti. Dok abimiyi lwak lonyo ki lim ki deyo, ma
pe tye ŋat acel mo i kin luker ma gukwoŋo nyimi ma yam olimo gin ma rom
meno, kadi wa kabaka mo ma bilubo kori pe bilimo kumeno.”
13Solomon ocako a woko ki i kabedo me woro Lubaŋa ma i wi got ma tye i
Gibeon, kun oa woko ki i nyim kema me rwatte, odok i Jerucalem, ci obedo ka
loyo jo Icrael.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
721
Solomon lacat aguragura ki gadigadi lweny
(1 Luker 10.26-29)
14 Solomon yam ocoko gadigadi lweny ki lulweny ma riŋo ki aguragura, Obedo ki
gadigadi lweny alip acel ki miya aŋwen, ki wegi aguragura alip apar wiye aryo,
Oketo mogo i kingi i gaŋi me gadigadi lweny, ki mukene gubedo bote i Jerucalem.
15Kabaka Solomon yam omiyo ryal odoko gin ma lam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i
Jerucalem, dok okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
16 En yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki Kuc; lucat-wil pa kabaka gamogi ki i
Kuc i wel lim ma onoŋo giyubo.
17Gadigadi ma gia ki i Ejipt welgi onoŋo romo cekel me ryal miya abicel, ki
aguragura acel welle cekel miya acel ki pyerabic; ka dok lucat-wil pa kabaka
catogi bot luker ducu pa jo Kit, ki bot luker me Ciria.
2 Tekwaro 2
Solomon ocikke ki kabaka Kuram
(1 Luker 5.1-18)
1Solomon otamo pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa pi nyiŋ Rwot, kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
2Solomon oyero jo alip pyerabiro me yweko yec, ki jo alip pyeraboro me muko
godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito ma loyo
lutic.
3Solomon dok ocwalo lok bot Kuram kabaka me Turo ni, “Kit ma yam ibedo ki
wora Daudi kun icwalle bao cedar me gero ode me bedone, ber ibed kweda bene
kit meno.
4Nen, ayubbe pi gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋana, ci abidyero bote pi waŋo iye
odok eceta ma ŋwece kur i nyime, ki pi tyero iye mugati me gitum awaŋa odiko ki
otyeno, ki i ceŋ cabit ducu, ki i por dwe, ki i nino madito ma Rwot Lubaŋawa
oketo, ma yam en ociko pi jo Icrael matwal.
5Ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit mada, pien Lubaŋawa du makato lubaŋa mukenegu
ducu.
6Ento aŋa ma twero gero ot pi Lubaŋa? Kadi polo kulu ma tye malo twal-li, pe
twero romo en bedo iye. An kono an aŋa ma atwero gero ot pire? Ento kono
atwero tiyo ot mo macalo kabedo me waŋo odok eceta i nyime keken.
7Pienno amito icwalla dano mo makwiri ma twero tic i kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola,
ki nyonyo, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki makwar ki ma bulu, ki dano ma gipwonyo
ki goro kom jami, wek oti ki lutic makwiri ma gitye kweda i Juda ki i Jerucalem,
ma yam wora Daudi oyubogi.
8Dok icwalla bao cedar, ki ciprec, ki bao algum ma gia i Lebanon, pien aŋeyo ni
luticci giŋeyo toŋo yadi ma i Lebanon. Dok luticca gibibedo ki luticci,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
722
9wek guyubba bao madwoŋ, pien ot ma abigero-ni bibedo dit dok me aura.
10Abimiyo bot joni ma gitiŋo bao ŋano ma nyige ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel,
ki cayiri ma romo guniya alip pyerabicel, ki koŋo vino ma romo debe alip
pyeraŋwen, ki moo jeituni bene debe alip pyeraŋwen, obed pi luticci me
acamagi.”
11Kuram kabaka me Turo odok iye ki waraga ma ocwalo bot Solomon ni, “Pien
Rwot maro jone omiyo oketo in ibedo kabaka ma loyogi.”
12Kuram dok owacci, “Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma con otiyo polo ki lobo,
ma omiyo ki Daudi wode maryek, ma tye ki niaŋ matut, ma bigero ot pi Rwot,
kacel ki gaŋ kalle kikome.
13“An doŋ acwalli dano ma ladiro ma tye ki ŋec matut, en Kuram-abi,
14ma wod pa dako ma anyira Dan, ma wonne dano me Turo, Gipwonyo en ki tic i
kom jabu, ki ryal, ki mola, ki nyonyo ki godi, ki bao, ki boŋo ma lamar lamar, ki
ma bulu ki makwar ki camanini maberre, En ŋeyo bene tic ducu me goro coc i
kom jami, ŋeyo lubo kit cal mo me tic ma gimiye, kun tiyo kacel ki ludironi, ki
ludiro pa rwoda Daudi ma woru.
15Pienno gin ma rwoda owaco-ni, doŋ ocwal ki luticce, ŋano ki cayiri, ki moo ki
koŋo vino;
16Ci wan wabitoŋo kit bao ducu ma imito ki i Lebanon, wabitweyogi ci gibikwan i
wi pii macalo bwoda nio wa i Jopa, wek in doŋ iom iter i Jerucalem.”
17Solomon dok ocako kwano wel jo ducu me rok mukene ma gibedo i lobo Icrael,
kit ma yam wonne Daudi koŋ okwanogi-ni. Ginoŋo ni welgi romo jo alip miya
acel ki pyerabic wiye adek ki miya abicel.
18En oyero jo alip pyerabiro ki i kingi me yweko yec ducu, ki jo alip pyeraboro me
muko godi i lobo ma obedo gotgot, ki jo alip adek ki miya abicel me bedo ludito
ma loyo lutic, pi cuko cwiny dano wek guti tic.
2 Tekwaro 3
Solomon ogero ot pa Lubaŋa
(1 Luker 6.1-38)
1 Solomon ocako gero ot pa Rwot i Jerucalem i wi got me Moria, ka ma yam Rwot
onyutte iye bot wonne Daudi, i kabedo ma yam Daudi oyero, i kom laro moyo pa
Oman ma jo Jebuc.
2En ocako gerone i dwe me aryo i mwaka me aŋwen me locce.
3Solomon opimo ot pa Lubaŋa ma en omito gerone-ni kit man: borre romo futi
pyeraboŋwen, ki lacce futi pyeradek.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
723
4Ki kicika ma i doggola me donyo ma i nyim kicika me ot lacce romo futi
pyeradek, ma roni ki lac me ot maditte; borre tuŋ malo roma futi miya acel ki
pyeraboro. Omwono iye woko ki jabu ma giliyo maber.
5Solomon oguro kor ot me kicika maditte ki bao ciprec, ci omwono kom bao
woko ki jabu maberre, ma gigoro iye cal yadi otit ki nyor.
6Odeyo i ot mamwonya mada ki godi matino me wel ma gimwono i kom jabu.
Jabune obedo jabu ma gikelo ki i Parvaim.
7Kit meno en omwono i ot ducu ki jabu, riine, rii doggolane, kor kicika ot ducu, ki
doggolane; ka dok ogoro cal lukerubi i kor kicika ot.
8 En dok otiyo kabedo maleŋ makato ducu; borre futi pyeradek, ma rom ki lac me
kicika ot maditte, ki lacce bene futi pyeradek. Omwono kome woko ki jabu
maberre ma romo talanta miya abicel.
9Pek me mucumar me jabu ma giguro kwede obedo cekel pyerabic. En dok
omwono kicika ma malo ducu ki jabu.
10 I kabedo maleŋ makato ducu en oketo iye cal lukerubi aryo me bao ma gipayo,
ci omwono komgi woko ki jabu.
11Bwom lukerubi ducu borre muyarre romo futi pyeradek. Bwomgi acel acel
borre romo futi abiro ki nucu. Wi bwom lakerubi acel ogudo kor ot, kun bwome
tuŋcel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu, wiye ogudo wi bwom lakerubi wadi;
12ki bwom lakerubi man bwome acel ma borre futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye bene
ogudo kicika ot, ki bwome mukene, ma romo futi abiro ki nucu-ni, wiye orwatte
ki bwom lakerubi mukwoŋo-ni.
13Bwom cal lukerubi magi borgi muyarre oromo futi pyeradek. Gucuŋ ki tyengi
ma gineno tuŋ kicika ot maditte.
14 Okwoyo boŋo kicika ki boŋo ma bulu ki ma lamar lamar ki makwarre, ki boŋo
camanini maberre, ma odero ki callukerubi.
Tic pa Kuram i ot pa Lubaŋa
(1 Luker 7.5-51)
15En dok otiyo wir aryo ma bocogi romo futi pyerabic wiye aryo, ki lalukana i
wigi ma bocogi romo futi abiro ki nucu, ci oketogi i nyim ot.
16Ka dok otiyo nyor macalo tiko ŋut, ci oketogi i wi wir aryo ducu, ka dok otimo
cal nyig okwer pomegranat miya acel, ci oketogi i kom nyor.
17Ocibo wir magi i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa, acel yo tuŋ acuc, ki mukene yo tuŋ acam.
Ocako nyiŋ ma yo tuŋ acuc-ci ni, Jakin, ki ma yo tuŋ acam-mi olwoŋo ni Boaj.
2 Tekwaro 4
Jami ma gitiyo pi ot pa Lubaŋa
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
724
(1 Luker 7.23-51)
1 Otiyo keno tyer me mola ma borre romo futi pyeradek, ki lacce bene futi
pyeradek; borre ma dok malo romo futi apar wiye abic.
2Ka dok otiyo nam me mola ma giliyo ma otwodde aduno, ma lacce romo futi
apar wiye abic, nia i doge tuŋcel nio i doge tuŋcel; borre tuŋ malo romo futi abiro
ki nucu. Gipimo doge ki tol ci oromo futi pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
3Ki i tere piny tye iye cal keno munyak ma orumo kom nam ducu, ma borre futi
pyeraŋwen wiye abic; cal keno magi giryeyogi latyeŋ aryo, I kare ma gitiyo nam,
gitiyo ki cal keno i kome lawanace!.
4Gicibo nam ocuŋ i wi cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo; giketo adek gineno yo tuŋ
acam, adek gineno yo tuŋ potoceŋ, adek gineno yo tuŋ acuc, ki adek gineno yo tuŋ
wokceŋ. Gicibo nam ocun i ŋe twoni-nu, kun ŋegi ducu odok tuŋ iye.
5Kome kinoŋ maromo incic adek; ki doge bene calo dog kikopo, ma, rom ki cal
ature leŋa, Piine romo debe makato alip abicel.
6 Ka dok otiyo otako apar me lwok, oketo abic yo tuŋ acuc, ki abic yo tuŋ acam.
Magi obedo me lako jami ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi pi gitum awaŋa: nam giketo me
lwok pa ajwagi.
7 Dok otiyo okar-mac me jabu apar kit ma giciko-ni, oketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa; oketo
abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ acam.
8 En dok otiyo meja apar, oketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa, abic yo tuŋ acuc ki abic yo tuŋ
acam. Dok otiyo becen me jabu miya acel.
9Ka dok oyubo dyekal pa ajwagi, ki dyekal maditte, ki kika me dyekal, omwono
kom ki ka ducu ki mola;
10ka oketo nam i twok ot i kin tuŋ acuc ki tuŋ wokceŋ.
11Kuram ocweyo agulu mapol bene, ki akwaya, ki becen-gu, Kit meno Kuram
otyeko tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa pi kabaka Solomon.
12Otiyo wir aryo, ki lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe macalo agulu ma giketo i wi wir, ki
obwo aryo me umo kom lalukana aryo ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir-ri.
13Dok otiyo cal okwer pomegranat miya aŋwen pi obwo aryo-nu, kun cal
pomegranat giryeyo latyeŋ aryo i kom obwo acel acel me umo kom lalukana aryo
ma oluŋŋe ma obedo i wi wir.
14Otiyo bene litino gadigadi apar, ki otakomola apar ma giluto i litino gadigadi,
15ki nam acel, ki cal twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo ma i te nam.
16Lwak agulu ki akwaya latokke-gu, ki gin lacob riŋo, ki jami ducu ma mitte pi tic
ki jami magi ma Kuram-abi otiyogi pi ot pa Rwot ki pi kabaka Solomon obedo me
mola ma gijwane maleŋ.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
725
17Kabaka omiyo giliyo mola meno i pwor kulu Jordan, ka ma lobo agulu tye iye, i
kin Cukot ki Jereda.
18Solomon otimo gin lwak jami-nu madwoŋ twatwal, ma pek pa molane pe
gikwano.
19Solomon otiyo jami ducu ma tye i ot pa Lubaŋa kit man: keno tyer me jabu, ki
lwak meja me caŋo mugati ma giketo i nyim Rwot,
20okar-mac ki lwak laputgi me jabu ma giliyo maber, ma myero gubed ka lyel i
kabedo maleŋ ma i tyelo, kit ma giciko-ni;
21ki lwak cal ature, ki laput-gu, ki boyi lakar mac, ducu me jabu ma giliyo maber
makato.
22Magac-gu, becen-gu, atabo me odok eceta, ki weer me waŋo mac otiyogi ki jabu
ma giliyo maber; ki pata me ot pa Lubaŋa ma giketo i kom kika me kabedo maleŋ
ma i tyelo, ki i kika me kicika maditte bene, gubedo me jabu.
2 Tekwaro 5
1 Tic ma Solomon otiyo i kom ot pa Rwot otum kit meno. Solomon okelo jami ma
yam wonne Daudi odyero ki Rwot-ti, ci okano ryal, ki jabu, ki jami tic-gu ducu i ot
kano lim ma i ot pa Lubaŋa.
Solomon okelo canduk pa Rwot i ot pa Lubaŋa
(1 Luker 8.1-11)
2 Solomon ocoko ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ki ludito wi kaka ducu, ma gin aye lutel wi
doggola pa kwarogi ma i kin jo Icrael, ci gubino i Jerucalem pi kwanyo canduk me
gicikke pa Rwot ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi, ma gilwoŋo ni Cion.
3Ci lwak jo Icrael ducu gucokke i nyim kabaka pi nino madito ma tye i dwe me
abiro-ni.
4Ludoŋo pa jo Icrael ducu gubino, ci Lulevi gucako tino canduk me gicikke.
5Gutero canduk ki kema me rwatte, kacel ki jami maleŋ ducu ma yam tye i kema;
ajwagi ki Lulevi gukelogi.
6Kabaka Solomon ki lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gucokke bote-ni, gubedo i nyim
canduk kun gitumo romi ki twoni-gu mapol ma welgi pe kwanne dok pe nene
bene.
7Kit meno ajwagi gucako kelo canduk me gicikke pa Rwot wa i kabedone ma i
tyelo me ot, en aye kabedo maleŋ makato ducu-ni, ci guketo piny i te bwom
lukerubi.
8Lukerubi guyaro bwomgi ka wi kabedo me canduk wek lukerubi guum wi
canduk woko kacel ki tal latiŋŋe ducu.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
726
9Dok tal latiŋŋe yam wigi nen ki i kabedo maleŋ ma i nyim kabedo maleŋ ma i
tyelo-ni; ento pe gitwero nenogi ki woko; pud gitye kunnu nio wa onyoo.
10 Gin mo onoŋo pe tye i canduk, kono kidi aryo ma apada keken ma yam Moses
oketo i iye ki i Koreb, ka ma yam Rwot oketo iye gicikke ki jo Icrael, i kare ma gia
ki i lobo Ejipt.
11Ajwagi gukato woko ki i kabedo maleŋ, pien ajwagi ducu ma onoŋo gitye-ni doŋ
gutyeko lonnye kekengi, ma pe giparo pi dul ticgi;
12ci Lulevi ducu ma gin luwer, Acap ki Eman, ki Jedutun, ki awobegi, ki utmegigi,
onoŋo gurukke ki boŋŋi camanini mabecone, ci gimako atego agoya, ki naŋa ki
opuk. Kacel kwedgi obedo ajwagi ma giromo miya acel ki pyeraryo ma gin lukut
tumo
13 Tic pa lukut tum ki luwer en aye me ribo dwangi kacel ka pako ki ka pwoyo
Rwot, ki dwangi ma winnye maloŋo. I kare ma gucako wer, kacel ki tum ki atego
agoya ki jami mukene ducu me wer, pi pako Rwot kun giwero ni, “Pien en ber,
mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka,” ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot woko, en ot
pa Rwot.
14Pienno omiyo ajwagi pe gitwero cuŋ ka tiyo ticgi, pi pol meno, pien deyo pa
Rwot noŋo opoŋo i ot pa Lubaŋa woko.
2 Tekwaro 6
Kwero ot pa Lubaŋa pi tic maleŋ
(1 Luker 8.12-66)
1I nino meno Solomon owacci, “Rwot otyeko wacci en ebibedo i pol macollicuc.
2Agerri doŋ ot ma ocudo malo, wek obed kabedoni ma ibedo iye matwal.”
3Ka dok kabaka olokke, ci olamo gum i kom lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu, kun
jo Icrael ma gucokke-ni gucuŋ mot.
4 En ocako lamo gum ni, “Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma doŋ ciŋe otyeko cobo
gin ma am oloko ki doge bot wora Daudi-ni, kun wacci,
5‘Nia wa i kare ma akwanyo ki jona jo Icrael ki i Ejipt, peya ayero gaŋ mo ma i
kaka ma i Icrael pi gero iye ot mo, wek nyina obed iye. Dok pe ayero laker mo me
loyo jona jo Icrael;
6ento doŋ atyeko yero Jerucalem wek nyina obed kenyo, ka dok ayero Daudi me
bedo lalo lwakka jo Icrael.’
7I kare-nu onoŋo wora Daudi obedo ki tam i cwinye me gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot,
Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
8Ento Rwot aye owaco bot wora Daudi ni, ‘Kit macalo onoŋo doŋ tam tye i cwinyi
me gero ot pi nyina, itimo ber pi keto lok meno i cwinyi.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
727
9Ento pe in aye dok ibigerra ot, ento wodi ma ibinywalo aye bigero ot pi nyiŋa.’
10I kare-ni Rwot doŋ otyeko cobo gin ma en ociko i cikkene; pien an doŋ atyeko
leyo ka tyen wora Daudi, doŋ atyeko bedo i wi komker pa Icrael, kit ma yam
Rwot ociko-ni, dok atyeko gero ot pi nyiŋ Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
11Doŋ atyeko keto iye kabedo pa canduk pa Rwot, ma tye iye gicikke ma Rwot
con oketo ki jo Icrael.”
12Solomon dok ocuŋ i nyim keno tyer pa Rwot ki i nyim lwak jo Icrael ma
gucokke ducu, ocako taŋo ciŋe aryo ducu malo.
13Solomon onoŋo otiyo abam mola ma borre futi abiro ki nucu, ki acee futi abiro
ki nucu, ki borre nia piny dok malo futi aŋwen ki nucu, ocibo i dyekal; en ocuŋ i
wiye. Ka dok orumo coŋe piny i nyim lwak jo Icrael ducu ma gucokke, ka ocako
taŋo ciŋe aryo ducu malo okemo polo,
14kun wacci, “Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pe tye Lubaŋa mo macalo in, kadi malo i
polo nyo piny i wi lobo, ma tye ka gwoko gicikkene macalo in, ma inyuto mar
meri ma pe lokke bot luticci ma bedo ka lubi ki cwinygi ducu.
15Ibedo ka lubo kit gin ma yam itito bot wora Daudi, iyo, gin ma yam iloko ki dogi,
icako doŋ tiyo i kare man ki ciŋi, ci ico bo ducu maber.
16 Kombeddi ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, doŋ ilub gin ma yam iciko ki laticci wora
Daudi, kun iwacci, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo i nyima ma bibedo i wi komker
pa Icrael, tekke awobeni gugwoko kitgi maber, kun gilubo cikka kit macalo ibedo
kwede i nyimani.’
17Ai Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, kombeddi mi lokki doŋ omok matek, kit ma cen iloko
ki wora Daudi ma laticci.
18 “Ento Lubaŋa bibedo i wi lobo-ni kacel ki dano ada? Nen, kadi oolo bene kutu
ma malone twatwal-li pe romo in me bedo iye, ci ot ma agero-ni tidine rom mene
kono!
19Dok in pud iciko iti ka winyo legana, an laticci, ki kit ma abako kwede doga, ai
Rwot Lubaŋana, doŋ iwiny koko ki lega ma atye ka lego i nyimi tin;
20 wek waŋi obed twolo onen ot man dyeceŋ ki dyewor, en aye kabedo ma yam
iwaco pire ni ibiketo iye nyiŋi, wek ibed ka winyo legana ma akelo boti kun
alokke akemo kabedo man atir.
21Dok iwiny bako dog laticci ki pa joni jo Icrael, i kare ma walego wakemo kabedo
man atir; iyo, in doŋ ibed ka winyone ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni; ci ka doŋ ityeko
winyone, doŋ iwek balwa.
22“Ka ce dano mo otimo bal i kom wadi mo, ci gimiye okwono kwon mo pire, ka
obino ce okwoŋo kwoŋŋe ki i nyim keno tyerri ma i ot man,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
728
23ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo, iket i tic; ŋol kop pa laticci-ni, imi kop olo dano
mutiŋo alii, kun iketo gin ma en otimo i wiye kene, dok imi dano ma pe obalo olo
kop, kun itime ber muporo leŋcwinye.
24“Ka ce mony pa lumerok guloyo jonijo Icrael pi balgi ma gutimo i komi, ka ce
guŋut gudwogo boti, ci gucako tuco nyiŋi, ma gilego in ka gibako doggi boti ki i ot
man,
25ci iwinygi ki polo, iwek bal pa joni jo Icrael, ka dok idwokgi cen wa i lobo ma
yam i miyo bot kwarogi.
26“Ka ce polo ocegge woko, ma kot mo pe ocwer pi lakit balgi mo i komi, ka ce
lwakki gucako lega kun gukemo kabedo man, kun gituco nyiŋi, ka guŋut ci
gubwoto balgi, ki i kare ma iketo can i komgi-ni,
27ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo, iwek bal pa luticci, gin joni jo Icrael, dok ipwonygi
ki yo maber ma myero gulubi; ci doŋ imi kot ocwer i loboni-ni ma yam imiyo bot
lwakki obed megi.
28“Ka ce kec opoto i lobo, ka two gemo opoto, nyo ka bel obwarre nyo odoko
ocone, nyo ka bonyo opoto nyo okwil obino, ka ce merokgi orumogi i gaŋigi mogo
nyo kadi bed kit gemo aŋo, nyo kit two mo-ni,
29ka ce lwakki gucako lega nyo bako doggi, kadi bed dano acel kok boti, nyo joni
jo Icrael ducu, kun dano acel acel ŋeyo kit atwomme kene, ki cwercwinye bene,
ka ce otaŋo ciŋe okemo ki ot man;
30ci in Lubaŋa iwinygi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, iwek balgi. Tim dano acel acel
kit ma iŋeyo kwede cwinye, ma rwatte ki kit kwone ducu, pien in aye, in keni,
iŋeyo kit cwiny pa dano ducu;
31meno bimiyo gibedo ka lworo in kun gilubo yo meri nino ducu ma gibedo, iye i
lobo ma yam imiyo bot kwarowa.
32“Obed kit meno bene ka ce larok mo, ma pe joni jo Icrael, obino kany ma oa ki i
lobo mo mabor, ma obino pi nyiŋi madit-ti, ki badi matek-ki, ki ciŋi ma iryeyo, ka
ce larok obino ce ocako lega ma okemo ot man,
33ci in Lubaŋa iwiny ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, itim kit gin ducu ma larok-ki
okok kwede i nyimi, wek rok ma wi lobo ducu guŋe nyiŋi, gucak lwori, kit ma I
wakki jo Icrael gilwori-ni, dok wek guŋe maber ni, ot man ma agero-ni, gilwoŋo
ki nyiŋi keken.
34“Ka ce lwakki gucito ka lwenyo i kom lumerokgi i kabedo mo ducu ma icwalogi
iye, ka ce gukelo legagi boti ma gukemo gaŋ man ma in iyero, ki ot man ma agero
pi nyiŋi-ni,
35ci in iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo, ci ikony korgi macalo ineno ni lokgi tye
atir.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
729
36“Ka ce gutimo bal i komi, pien pe tye dano mo ma pe balo, ka ce kiniga omaki i
komgi, ci imiyogi i ciŋ lamerok mo, ma oyakogi ci oterogi i opii wa i lobo mo ka
mabor nyo ka ma cok;
37ento ka cwinygi otamo lok ki i lobo ma giterogi iye i opii-ni, ce guŋut ci gubako
doggi boti ki i lobo ma gitye iye i opii, kun gikok ni, ‘Wabalo, watyeko ŋak woko
ata, watiyo lwak bal-gu mapol’,
38ka ce gutyeko ŋut Ici tamgi ducu ki cwinygi ducu, ki i lobo ka ma giterogi iye i
opii-ni, kun doŋ gilego i nyimi ma gukemo lobogi, ma yam imiyo bot kwarogi-ni,
ki gaŋ ma nene iyero, ki ot ma atyeko gerone pi nyiŋi,
39in Lubaŋa iwiny legagi ki bako doggi ki i polo ka ma ibedo iye-ni, ci iye konyo
korgi ka ce ineno ni lokgi tye atir, dok iwek bal pa joni ma gubalo i komi.
40Ai Lubaŋa, kombeddi doŋ wek waŋi obed twolo ci icik iti iwiny lega ma gilego i
kabedo man.
41 “A malo, ai Rwot Lubaŋa, ci idony i kabedo me yweyoni, in ki canduk me tekki.
Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, wek ajwagini gurukke ki larre, wek joni maleŋ cwinygi obed
yom pi berri.
42Ai Rwot Lubaŋa, pe ikwer lega pa lakerri ma giwiro! Po pi mar meri ma pe
lokke i kom laticci Daudi.”
2 Tekwaro 7
1 Ka Solomon doŋ otyeko legane, ci mac obino piny ma a ki i polo, owaŋo gitum
awaŋa ki gitum mu kene ducu, ci deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot pa Lubaŋa woko.
2Ajwagi doŋ pe gitwero donyo i ot pa Rwot, pien deyo pa Rwot opoŋo i ot pa
Rwot woko.
3 Ka jo Icrael ducu guneno mac obino piny, ki deyo pa Rwot oboyo kom ot pa
Lubaŋa woko, gukulo wigi piny aryeba ic i dyekal ma gipeto iye godi, gumiyo
woro ki pwoc bo! Rwot, kun giwacci, “Pien en ber, mar mere ma pe lokke bedo
nakanaka.”
4Ka dok kabaka ki jo Icrael ducu gucako tyero gitum i nyim Rwot.
5Kabaka Solomon otyero gityer ma romo twoni dyaŋi alip pyeraryo wiye aryo, ki
romi alip miya acel ki pyeraryo. Kabaka ki jo Icrael ducu gukwero ot pa Lubaŋa
kit meno.
6Ajwagi gucuŋ i kabedogi, kacel ki Lulevi ma gumako jami me wer megi me pako
Rwot, kit ma yam kabaka Daudi oyubo pi miyo pwoc bot Rwot, ni, pien mar mere
ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka. Meno timme i kare ducu ma yam Daudi pako iye
Lubaŋa, kun gin gikonye ki jami wergi. Ki jo ma gucuŋ ma gukemogi gin ajwagi
ma gikuto tum, kun noŋo jo Icrael ducu gucuŋ mot.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
730
7Solomon dok ocako kwero kabedo ma i cwiny dyekal ma tye i nyim ot pa Rwot-
ti. En otyero kunnu gitum awaŋa, ki moo dwolo-gu me gityer lakwecwiny, pien
keno tyer me mola ma Solomon otiyo-ni onoŋo tidi twatwal, pe romo keto iye
gitum awaŋa kacel ki gityer me moko kwon ki dwolo-gu.
8I kare meno Solomon okwero nino madito pi nino abiro kulu, kacel ki jo Icrael
ducu. Onoŋo lwak gucokke madwoŋ, kun gua wa i yo ma donyo i Kamat nio wa i
nota ora me Ejipt.
9I nino me aborone gubedo ki cokke madit; pien gubedo ki lega me kwero keno
tyer nino abiro kulu, ki nino madito mukene bene nino abiro.
10I kom nino dwe pyeraryo wiye adek i dwe me abiro en aye Solomon ocwalo
lwak gudok woko tugi. Lwak gudok i pacogi ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, ma igi okwe
pi gin ducu mabeco ma Rwot otimo pi Daudi ki pi Solomon ki pi lwakke jo Icrael.
Rwot onyutte bot Solomon tyen me aryo
(1 Luker 9.1-9)
11Kit meno Solomon otyeko gero ot pa Rwot ki ode en kabaka bene; tic ducu ma
yam en oyubo me atiya i ot pa Rwot ki i ode en ocobo maber twatwal.
12Ci Rwot onen bot Solomon i dyewor kun wacce ni, “Atyeko winyo legani, doŋ
atyeko yero kabedo man obed mera me bedo ot ka ma gibityero iye gitum bota.
13Ka ce acego polo ma kot doŋ pe cwer, nyo ka ce aciko ni bonyo ocam cam ma i
lobo otyek woko, nyo ka ce acwalo two gemo opoto i kom lwakka,
14ka ce lwakka ma gilwoŋogi ki nyiŋa-ni gumwolle woko, ce gulego ma gimito an
kikoma, ka guweko kit timgi maraco, ci dok abiwinyogi ki i polo, ci abikwanyo gin
ma tye ka balo lo bogi, ka dok abiweko balgi.
15Cakke tin waŋa bibedo twolo, dok abiciko ita ka winyo lega ma gibilego i
kabedo man.
16Pien tin an doŋ atyeko yero ot man, dok atyeko lonyone odoko maleŋ, wek
nyiŋa obed iye matwal; dok waŋa ki cwinya bikemo kunnu matwal.
17Ki ma tuŋ boti, ka ce ibibedo ki kit kwo i nyima ma yam woru Daudi obedo
kwede-ni, ce ka itiyo gin ma aciko ducu, kun igwoko cik ma aketo, ki gin ma doŋ
aŋolo,
18 ci an Lubaŋani abimoko komkerri me loyo Icrael matwal, kit ma yam aciko bot
woru Daudi kun awacce ni, ‘Pe ibibedo laboŋo danoni mo ma biloyo jo Icrael.’
19“Ento ka ce wuŋak woko, ma wubwoto lubo cikka ki mako lok ma aciko ma
aketogi i nyimwu, ce wukobo woko ka tiyo bot lubaŋa mogo mukene kun
wuworogi,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
731
20ci miyo abiputowu woko ki i lobo ma yam amiyowu-ni; dok abikwanyo waŋa
woko, pe dok neno kom ot man ma atyeko lonyo odoko maleŋ pi nyiŋa-ni; miyo
nyiŋ Icrael bi doko carolok ki lok aboka i kin rok ducu.
21Jo ducu ma bikato ki ka ŋet ot man madit twatwal-li gibiuro ki jwat kun
giwacci; ‘Kit lok aŋo mumiyo Rwot otimo lobo-ni ki ot man ki tim macalo man?’
22Ka dok gibiwacci, ‘Pien gubwoto Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarogi ma yam okwanyogi
ki, i lobo Ejipt, ci gukobo bot lubaŋa mogo mukene, dok gubedo ka worogi ma
kun gitiyo botgi bene; en aye lok mumiyo Rwot omiyo can opoto i komgi magwa-
ni.’ ”
2 Tekwaro 8
Tic mukene ma Solomon otiyo
(1 Luker 9.10-28)
1Gero odi aryo-ni ma Solomon ogero, gin aye ot pa Rwot ki ot pa kabaka, otero
mwaka pyeraryo kulu.
2Solomon dok ogero gaŋi odoco ma yam Kuram omiyogi bote, ci omiyo jo Icrael
gubedo i igi.
3Solomon dok ocito i Kamat-joba, ci omako woko.
4En ogero Tadmor ma i tim, ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma ogerogi i Kamat.
5Dok en ogero Bet-koron Mamalo ki Bet-koron Mapiny orumo gaŋi magi ki cel
gogo, oketo iye doggola ma gicego ki rii.
6Ogero Baalat bene, ki gaŋi ducu me kano cam ma yam Solomon tye kwedgi, ki
gaŋi me keto gadigadi mony, ki gaŋi pa lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura, ki kit
gedo ducu ma yam Solomon omito gerogi i Jerucalem, ki i Lebanon, ki i lobo ma
en loyo ducu.
7Jo ducu ma yam gubwot ci gudoŋ ki i kom jo Kit, jo Amor, jo Periji, jo Kiv ki jo
Jebuc, ma pe gin jo Icrael,
8gin aye Solomon oketo tic muroni i wigi, kit macalo tye-ni nio wa onyoo.
9Ento Solomon pe odiyo jo Icrael i tic me opii; gin gubedo askari, ki luditone, ki
ludito me gadigadi monnye, ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragurane.
10Jo magi gin aye ludito tic pa Kabaka Solomon ma giloyo dog tic ducu; giromo
miya aryo ki pyerabic, gin aye giloyo lwak.
11Solomon okelo nya pa Parao nia ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi otero i ot ma en ogero
pire, pien owacci, “Dakona pe bibedo i ot pa Daudi kabaka me Icrael, pien kabedo
ducu ma doŋ canduk pa Rwot obino iye-ni odoko kabedo maleŋ.”
12Dok Solomon obedo ka tyero gitum awaŋa i wi keno tyer pa Rwot ma yam en
ocano i nyim kicika ot ma i doggola me ot pa Rwot.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
732
13 En obedo ka miyo gityer kit ma tic me nino acel acel mito kwede, kun lubo cik
pa Moses i cen cabit ducu, ki i por dwe, ki i nino madito adek me mwaka ki
mwaka-ni, ma gin aye nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye, nino madit me
kwero Agikki Cabit Abiro, ki nino madito me Bolo.
14Kit macalo yam wonne Daudi ociko, en oketo lwak dul pa ajwagi ki dog ticgi, ki
Lulevi gi dog ticgi me pako Lubaŋa ki me tic i nyim ajwagi, muporo tic me nino
acel acel. Opoko bene tic pi lugwok doggola ducu ki dulgi i doggola acel acel, kit
ma Daudi ma dano pa Lubaŋa yam ociko.
15Gin gubedo ka lubo cik ma kabaka ociko ki ajwagi ki Lulevi, pe guweko gin mo
ma mako lok ducu, ki ma mako kano lim.
16Solomon otyeko ticce ducu kit meno, cakke i nino ma giketo iye guti me te ot pa
Rwot nio ka otum, Ot pa Rwot otum kit meno.
17Solomon dok ocito wa i Ejiongeber ki i Elot ma i dog nam, ma i lobo Edom.
18Kuram yam ocwalo luticce ki mel bot Solomon; en ocwalo luticce ma guŋiyo ki
nam, ci gucito wa i Opir kacel ki lutic pa Solomon, guomo jabu ma romo talanta
miya aŋwen ki pyerabic ki kunnu, gukelo bot kabaka Solomon.
2 Tekwaro 9
Kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba olimo Solomon
(1 Luker 10.1-13)
1 I kare ma kabaka ma dako me lobo Ceba owinyo pi yweka pa Solomon, en obino
bote i Jerucalem ka temo iye ki peny matego, Obino ki lwak jo madito mapol ma
gicom i kore, kacel ki lwak kinaga-gu ma giyweyo aŋwece, ki jabu madwoŋ
twatwal, ki litino godi me wel-gu. Ka obino bot Solomon, ci ocako titte lok ducu
ma onoŋo tye i cwinye.
2Solomon odok iye i pennye ducu; pe onoŋo tye lok mo wacel ma okanne ki bot
Solomon ma pe romo tucone bot dako-nu.
3Ka kabaka ma dako me Ceba oneno ryeko pa Solomon ducu, ki ot ma en ogero,
4ki cam ma i wi mejane, ki kit kabedo pa luditone, ki tic pa luticce, ki boŋŋime
arukagi, ki lutiŋ kikopo-gu, ci tam otum woko ki i cwinye.
5Owaco bot kabaka ni, “Lok ducu ma i komi ma yam gitero bota ki i lobona, ki lok
i kom ryekoni bene, onoŋo lokke tye kakare,
6ento yam pe aye lok ma gitero bota ducu, nio ka abino aneno ki waŋa. Ci nen,
kadi wa nucu ryekoni maditte onoŋo pe gititta kulu, pien ryekoni ki lonyoni kato
lok dog ma giterra awinyo-ni.
7Monni gitye ki yomcwiny kuman! Luticci magi ducu gitye ki yomcwiny ma rom
mene, ma gibedo ka cuŋ i nyimi jwijwi ka winyo lok me ryekoni!
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
733
8Gipwo Rwot Lubaŋani ma cwinye opwoyo in ci oketi i wi komker me bedo
kabaka pi Rwot Lubaŋani! Pien Lubaŋani omaro jo Icrael matwal, dok omito
mokogi gubed matek, en aye omiyo en oketi ibedo kabaka ma loyogi, wek ibed ka
ŋolo kop atir dok kakare.”
9En omiyo bot Solomon jabu madwoŋ ma romo talanta miya acel ki pyeraryo, ki
lwak aŋwece mapatpat madwoŋ twatwal, ki lwak litino godi me wel, I kare ca
onoŋo pe tye aŋwece mukene macalo meno ma kabaka me Ceba omiyo bot
Solomon-ni.
10Ka dok lutic pa Kuram ki lutic pa Solomon ma onoŋo gukelo jabu nia ki i Opir,
gukelo wa ki bao yat algum ki lwak godi matino me wel.
11Kabaka otiyo ki bao yat algum pi jeŋo kor ot pa Rwot ki kor ot pa kabaka. Otiyo
kwede opuk bene ki naŋa pa luwer. Kit jami macalo meno onoŋo peya yam onen
kulu i lobo Juda.
12Kabaka Solomon omiyo bot kabaka ma dako me Ceba jami ducu ma cwinye
omito, omiye gin ducu ma openyo, ma pe giribo iye jami ma onoŋo en okelo bot
kabaka. Kit meno kabaka me Ceba ocako wot me dok wa i lobone kikome, kacel ki
luticce ducu.
Lonyo pa Solomon ki ywekane
(1 Luker 10.14-29)
13Lwak jabu ma obino bot Solomon i mwaka acel acel pekke oromo talanta miya
abicel ki pyerabicel wiye abicel
14ma pe giribo iye ma lucat-wil gukelo; luker pa jo Arabia, ki ludito ma loyo lobo
bene gukelo jabu ki ryal bot Solomon.
15Kabaka Solomon otiyo lwak kwodi madoŋo miya aryo me jabu, ma gitetogi ki
nyol; i kom kwot acel acel odonyo iye jabu ma pekke romo cekel miya abicel.
16Dok otiyo kwodi matinone miya adek me jabu ma gitetogi ki nyol, kun kwot
acel acel giteto ki jabu ma pekke cok romo ratili apar, Kabaka oketogi i ot ma
gilwoŋo ni, Buŋa me Lebanon.
17Kabaka dok otiyo komker madit me lak lyec, ci omwono kome woko ki jabu ma
giliyo maber.
18Komker meno onoŋo tye ki rwomme abicel ki kom me jabu me teno tyen, ma
gikubogi i kom komker. Ka ŋete tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi giketo iye ka teno ciŋ dano, ki
labwor aryo gucuŋ ka ŋet bad kom me teno ciŋ,
19kun tye bene lwak labwor apar wiye aryo ma gucuŋ i agikki rwom abicel-li,
tuŋŋi ki tuŋŋi. Pe tye kom mo ma gitiyo ma cal ki meno i te ker ducu.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
734
20Jami ducu ma yam kabaka Solomon mato kwede onoŋo me jabu keken, wa jami
ducu ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot Buŋa me Lebanon yam gitiyogi ki jabu ma giliyo
maber; i kare pa Solomon pe tye ŋatti mo ma tamo pi ryal.
21Onoŋo kabaka tye ki lwak mel ma giwoto Tarcic kacel ki mel pa Kuram, Mel me
Tarcic yam dwogo cen ka mwaka okato adek adek kun gikelo lwak jabu ki ryal ki
lak lyec-gu, ki ayom-gu ki gunya-gu.
22Kabaka Solomon obedo dit makato lwak luker ma wi lobo ducu pi lonyone ki pi
ryekone.
23Lwak luker ducu me wi lobo gubedo ka yenyo kit yo me neno waŋ Solomon ki
pi winyo kit ryekone-gu ma Lubaŋa oketo i cwinyeni.
24Dano acel acel yam tero motte bote, kun gitero jami me ryal ki me jabu-gu, ki
ginaruka-gu, ki odok murra, ki aŋwece, ki aguragura-gu, ki kana-gu, mwaka ki
mwaka.
25 Solomon tye ki loc aguragura alip aŋwen pi aguragura ki gadigadi lwennye, ki
lulweny ma giriŋo ki aguragura alip apar wiye aryo, En yam oketo mogo i gaŋi
me gadigadi lweny ki mukene gubedo bot kabaka i Jerucalem.
26 En oloyo luker ducu cakke wa i kulu Euprate nio kwede i lobo pa jo Piliciti, ki i
wan lobo me Ejipt.
27Kabaka yam omiyo ryal odoko gin ma lam ma rom ki gweŋ-gu i Jerucalem, dok
okelo yadi cedar mapol ata ma rom ki olam ma i bar Cepela.
28 Solomon yam limo aguragura ma a ki i Ejipt ki i lobo ducu.
To pa Solomon
(1 Luker 11.41-43)
29Lok kom Solomon mudoŋŋe ducu, nia i acakki nio i agikkine, gityeko coyone i
buk me Tekwaro ma lanebi Natan ocoyo, ki i kin lok pa Lubaŋa ma Akija ma jo
Cilo otito, ka dok i buk me lok kom gin ma Iddo ma lanen oneno ma okemo kom
Jeroboam wod pa Nebat.
30Kare ma Solomon oloyo kwede jo Icrael kun bedo i Jerucalem oromo mwaka
pyeraŋwen.
31Solomon oto ci oywe kacel ki kwarine, ka giyike i gaŋ kai pa wonne Daudi.
Rekoboam ma wode aye oleyo ka tyene.
2 Tekwaro 10
Jemo pa jo Icrael i kom Rekoboam
(1 Luker 12.1-24)
1Rekoboam ocito i Cekem, pien onoŋo jo Icrael gumol gucito i Cekem ka keto en
me bedo kabaka.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
735
2Ka Jeroboam wod pa Nebat owinyo pire, ci oa ki i Ejipt odok cen; pien onoŋo
Jeroboam yam pud tye i Ejipt ka ma yam oriŋo iye kabaka Solomon.
3Gicwalo lukwena ka lwoŋe, ci Jeroboam ki lwak jo Icrael ma gucokke ducu
guwaco bot Rekoboam ni,
4“Woru oketo yec mapek i komwa. In doŋ ilok tic matego ma woru omiyowa, ki
yec mapek ma en oketo i komwa-ni, obed mayot, ci wan wabibedo luticci.”
5En ogamo ni, “Wudwog bota kany i ŋe nino adek.” Ci lwak gudok cen.
6Kabaka Rekoboam ocako yubo lok ki ludoŋo muteggi, ma yam gicuŋ i nyim
wonne Solomon i kare ma en pud kwo, ci openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo
wek adok iye ki lwak man?”
7Gin guwacce ni, “Ka ce kica bimaki i kom lwak man, ma ikweyo cwinygi, kun
iloko botgi lok ducu mabeco, ci gin bene gibibedo Luticci matwal.”
8Ento en obwoto tam pa ludoŋo muteggi woko, ocako dok yubo lok ki awobe ma
yalwakke, ma gicuŋ i nyime.
9Openyogi ni, “Wun wumiya kit tam aŋo wek adok iye ki lwak man ma gupenya
ni, ‘Wek yec ma woru oketo i komwa mapek-ki obed yot’?”
10Ci awobe ma yalwakke guwacce ni, “Ibidok iye ki lwak ma gupenyi kit man ni,
‘Woru yam omiyo yecwa odoko pek, ento in imi obed yot botwa’; in ibidok iye ki
gin kit man ni, ‘Nyig ciŋa kinoŋ makato pyer wora.
11Doŋ abitiyo kit man: wora yam oketo yec mapek i komwu, an dok abimedone
bedo mapek. Wora yam opwodowu ki del anino, an abipwodowu ki yib oton.’ ”
12Jeroboam ki lwak ducu gubino bot Rekoboam i kom nino me adekke, kit ma
yam kabaka ociko ni, “Wudwog cen bota i nino me adekke.”
13Kabaka ocako dok i peny pa lwak ki gero, pien oweko tam ma ludoŋo muteggi
gumiye.
14Kabaka Rekoboam oloko ki lwak kit ma awobe guyubo kun wacci, “Wora yam
omiyo yecwu odoko pek, ento an abimedone bedo mapek; wora yam pwodowu ki
del anino, an abipwodowu ki yib oton.”
15Kabaka pe owinyo lok pa lwak; pien Rwot aye omiyo okwero, wek lokke
ocobbe kakare ma, yam en oloko bot Jeroboam wod pa Nebat kun ocwalo Akija
ma jo Cilo ocito otitte-ni.
16 Ka jo Icrael ducu guneno ni kabaka pe owinyogi, ci lwak gudok iye ki kaba ka
ni, “Wan watye ki waŋ pokwa aŋo i kom Daudi? Pe watye ki dul mo i kom latin pa
Yece. Wun jo Icrael wudok i kemawu! In Daudi, doŋ inen odi keni.” Ci jo Icrael
gucako pokke woko, gudok i pacogi.
17Ento Rekoboam pud loyo jo Icrael ma gibedo i gaŋi ma i Juda.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
736
18Kabaka Rekoboam ocwalo Adoram, ladit ma loyo tic muroni, ci jo Icrael ducu
gucako cele ki got, guneke woko, Kabaka Rekoboam orune oito i wi gadigadi
lwennye, ci oriŋo kwede woko wa i Jerucalem.
19Kit meno jo Icrael gucako jemo woko i kom ot pa Daudi nio kwede wa onyoo.
2 Tekwaro 11
Lok ma lanebi Cemaya otito
(1 Luker 12.21-24)
1Ka Rekoboam odwogo cen i Jerucalem, ci ocoko jo ma giyero ki i ot pa Juda ki i
kin jo Benjamin, twoni lweny alip miya acel ki pyeraboro, pi lweny i kom jo Icrael
wek gidwok ker bot Rekoboam.
2Ento lok pa Rwot obino bot dano pa Lubaŋa ma nyiŋe Cemaya, kun wacci,
3“Wac ki Rekoboam wod pa Solomon ma kabaka me Juda, ki bot jo ducu me ot pa
Juda ki jo Benjamin ni,
4‘Rwot owaco kuman ni, Wun pe wubicito ka lweny i kom lutuwu ma gin jo
Icrael. Wek dano acel acel odok cen i pacone, pien lok man oa ki bota.’ ” Gin ducu
guwinyo lok pa Rwot, ci gudok cen i pacogi, pe dok gucito ka lweny i kom
Jeroboam.
Lonyo pa Rekoboam
5Rekoboam obedo i Jerucalem, ogero gaŋi gogo me mony i Juda.
6Ogero Beterekem, Etam, Tekoa,
7Bet-jur, Coko, Adulam,
8Gat, Mareca, Jip,
9Adoraim, Lakic, Ajeka,
10Jora, Aijalon, ki Kebron, gin ducu gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma gitye i Juda ki i
Benjamin.
11En oyubo cel gogo ducu obedo matek, oketo ludito mony i igi, okano iye cam, ki
moo ki koŋo vino.
12Ka dok oketo kwodi ki toŋi i gaŋi ducu, ci omiyogi gubedo matek mada. Kit
meno Juda ki Benjamin gudoŋ i te locce.
13Ajwagi ducu pa Lubaŋa ki Lulevi ma yam gitye i lobo Icrael gua ki i kabedogi
ducu, gubino ka bedo i ŋete.
14Lulevi gubwoto lobo ma gibedo iye gudok wa i Juda ki i Jerucalem, pien
Jeroboam ki likwayone gukwero woko ni pe doŋ guti tic macalo ajwagi pa Rwot.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
737
15 Jeroboam oketo ajwagine ma en oyero me tic i wan jogi ma i wi godi, ki bot jogi
ma calo nyogi dyegi, ki bot cal litino twoni ma en otiyo.
16Jo ma yam guketo cwinygi ka cito bot Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael gulubo kor ajwagi
pa Rwot ki Lulevi, nia ki i kaka pa jo Icrael ducu, guwoto Jerucalem ka tyero
gitum bot Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarogi.
17Gujiŋo ker pa Juda matek, gumiyo Rekoboam wod pa Solomon obedo matek pi
mwaka adek, pien gubedo ka lubo kit pa Daudi ki Solomon pi mwaka adek.
18Rekoboam onyomo Makalat nya pa Jerimot wod pa Daudi, Min Makalat obedo
Abikail nya pa Eliab ma wod pa Yece.
19Makalat onywalo ki Rekoboam litino awobe magi, Jeuc, Cemaria ki Jakam.
20Ka dok ki i ŋeye en onyomo Maaka nya pa Abcalom ci onywalo kwede Abija,
Atai, Jija, ki Celomit.
21Rekoboam omaro Maaka nya pa Abcalom makato monne ducu ki mon aŋecane-
gu. En yam onyomo mon apar wiye aboro ci obedo ki mon aŋecane pyerabicel
kulu; onywalo awobe pyeraryo wiye aboro ki anyira pyerabicel.
22Rekoboam oketo wode Abija latin pa Maaka me bedo ladit ma loyo wi omegine,
pien yam onoŋo omito keto en me bedo kabaka.
23Rehoboain obedo ka tic ki ryeko, opoko awobene mogo i dul lobo ducu ma i
Juda ki Benjamin, oketogi i gaŋi me cel gogo ducu, opoko botgi cam madwoŋ, dok
bene onyomo botgi mon.
2 Tekwaro 12
Cicak omonyo jo Juda
(1 Luker 14.21-31)
1Ka ker pa Rekoboam doŋ omoko maber, kun medde ki cuŋ matek, en kacel ki jo
Icrael ducu gucako bwoto cik pa Rwot.
2I mwaka me loc pa Rekoboam me abicce, en aye Cicak kabaka me Ejipt obino
kwede ka lweny i kom jo Jerucalem, pien gubwoto Rwot woko.
3Gubino ki gadigadi lweny alip acel ki miya aryo, ki lulweny ma giriŋo ki
aguragura alip pyerabicel. Lwakjo ma welgi pe kwanne gubino kwede ma gua ki i
Ejipt, jo Libya, jo Cukiim, ki jo Etiopia.
4Ci omako gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo ma i Juda ducu nio kwede wa i Jerucalem.
5Cemaya ma lanebi ocito bot Rekoboam ki bot rwodi me Juda, ma onoŋo gucokke
i Jerucalem pi Cicak owaco botgi ni, “Rwot owaco kuman ni, ‘Wun wuryeko
bwoto an woko, pi meno an bene atyeko miyowu i ciŋ Cicak.’ “
6Rwodi me Icrael kacel ki kabaka gumwolle woko, omiyo guwacci, “Rwot lokke
tye kakare.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
738
7Ka Rwot oneno ni gumwolle kengi, lok pa Rwot obino bot Cemaya ma wacci,
“Gin gumwolle kengi; pe doŋ abityekogi woko, ento doŋ abilarogi, pe doŋ abitoyo
akemona i kom Jerucalem ki cin Cicak.
8Ento gibibedo luticce, ka wek guŋe tic kweda ki dok me tic ki luloc me lobo
mukene bene.”
9 Kit meno Cicak kabaka me Ejipt ocako bino ka lweny i kom Jerucalem, ci oyako
jami ma gikano i ot lim pa Rwot, ki jami ma gikano i ot lim pa kabaka. En oyako
woko ducu, dok oyako lwak kwodi me jabu ma yam Solomon otiyogi.
10Kabaka Rekoboam dok otiyo lwak kwodi mukene; otiyo kwodi mola, ci omiyogi
i ciŋ ludito pa lugwok kabaka ma gigwoko doggola ot pa kabaka.
11I kare ducu ma noŋo kabaka cito i ot pa Rwot, lugwok en yam gimako kwodi, ka
dok gidwoko kakagi i ot kicika pa lugwok kabaka.
12Ka doŋ en omwolle kene ci akemo pa Rwot oa woko i kome, ci pe miyo
gityekogi woko liweŋ, dok piny onoŋo ber i Juda.
13Kit meno Rekoboam omoko ker mere matek i Jerucalem dok obedo ka loc bene,
Rekoboam ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte romo pyeraŋwen wiye acel, obedo ka
loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye abiro, Jerucalem ma en aye gaŋ ma yam Rwot
oyero ki i kin kaka ducu me lerael pi keto iye nyiŋe. Nyiŋ minne Naama ma anyira
Ammon.
14En con obedo ka tiyo gin marac, pien pe oketo cwinye ka yenyo Rwot.
15Lok kom Rekoboam mudoŋŋe ducu, nia i acakki nio i agikkine, gityeko coyone i
buk me Tekwaro ma lanebi Cemaya ocoyo, ki i buk pa Iddo ma lanen, Lweny yam
obedo tye i kin Rekobo am ki Jeroboam pi kare ducu ma pe gik.
16Rekoboam oto, oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyiko kacel ki kwarine i gaŋ kai pa
Daudi; wode Abija aye oleyo ka tyene.
2 Tekwaro 13
Loc pa Abija
(1 Luker 15.1-8)
1I mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa kabaka Jeroboam, en aye Abija ocako
loyo iye jo Juda.
2Obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi mwaka adek, Nyiŋ minne Mikaya ma nya pa Uriel me
Gibea. Lweny obedo tye i kin Abija ki Jeroboam.
3Abija yam ocito ka lweny kun woto ki monnye ma gin oteka lweny, ma giromo
alip miya aŋwen ma giyerogi ayera, Ci Jeroboam orwayo monnye cok ka lweny i
ko me ki jo ma giyerogi matego alip miya aboro, ma gin twoni lweny.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
739
4Abija ocuŋ i wi got Jemaraim ma tye i lobo gotgot ma i lobo Epraim, kun wacci,
“Winy lokka, in Jeroboam ki wun jo Icrael ducu!”
5Pe wuŋeyo mono ni Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael omiyo ker bot Daudi ki likwaye i
gicikke ma gimoko ki kado, me loyo Icrael matwal?
6Jeroboam wod pa Nebat, ma latic pa Solomon wod pa Daudi, pud dok ojemo
woko i kom rwode.
7Jo mogo ma konygi pe ma kitgi obedo atata gucokke bote, ci gubalo Rekoboam
wod pa Solomon woko. Pien onoŋo Rekoboam pud t idi ma timme bene pud woto
atata, dok pe otwero kwero tamgi.
8“Nen kombeddi wumito kwanyo ker pa Rwot woko ki i cin likwayo pa Daudi,
pien wun wutye lwak madwoŋ, dok wutye bene ki cal litino twoni me jabu ma
Jeroboam otiyo me bedo lubaŋawu.
9Wun pe doŋ wuryemo ajwagi pa Rwot woko, ma gin likwayo pa Aron, ki Lulevi,
ka dok wuketo ajwagi piwu kenwu macalo jo ma i lobo mukene-ni? Ka ŋat mo
obino, tekke okwero ko me kekene ki wod twon nyo nyogi romi abiro, ci tugi
doko ajwaka cut pi jogiwu ma pe gin Lubaŋa kikome.
10Ento ki tun botwa, Rwot en aye Lubaŋawa, peya wabwoto en, Wan watye ki
ajwagi ma gitiyo ki Rwot ma gin aye likwayo pa Aron, ki Lulevi ma gikonyogi ki
tic.
11Odiko odiko ki otyeno otyeno, giwaŋo gitum awaŋa ki odok eceta ma ŋwece
kur, gicano mugati i nyim Rwot i wi meja me jabu ma giliyo maber, dok gigwoko
okar mac me jabu wek macce obed ka lyel otyeno otyeno; wan watye ka gwoko
cik ma mako tic pa Rwot Lubaŋawa, ento wun wutyeko bwoto en woko.
12Nen, Lubaŋa tye kwedwa, tye ka telo wiwa, ki ajwagine gitye ki tum ma gikuto
me ywayo mony me lweny i komwu, Aa wun awobe pa Icrael, pe wulweny i kom
Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwariwu: pien pe wutwero loyo mony.”
13Jeroboam onoŋo ocwalo dul mony gukanne woko me bino i komgi ki yo ŋegi;
kit meno onoŋo monnye tye i nyim jo Juda, ki jo mubuto gurumo piny woko tye
yo tuŋ ŋegi.
14Ka jo Juda guneno, gunoŋo ni mony tye i nyimgi ki i ŋegi bene; ci gucako kok
bot Rwot, kun ajwagi gikuto tum.
15Jo Juda gucako wayo me lweny. I kare ma jo Juda gudaŋŋe, Lubaŋa oloyo
Jeroboam woko, omiyo jo Icrael ducu guriŋo woko i nyim Abija ki jo Juda.
16Jo Icrael guriŋo woko, ci Lubaŋa omiyogi i ciŋ Abija.
17Abija ki jone gunekogi ki nek malit twatwal; jo ma guto giromo alip miya abic ki
i kom jo ma giyerogi ayera ki i kin jo Icrael.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
740
18Giloyo jo Icrael kit meno, pien jo Juda ma oloyogi onoŋo gujeŋŋe i kom Rwot
Lubaŋa pa kwarigi.
19Abija olubo kor Jeroboam ci omayo gaŋi mogo pa jo Icrael woko ki bote, Betel
ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, Jecana ki gaŋi matino ma i ŋete, ki Epron ki gaŋi matino
ma i ŋete.
20Jeroboam pe dok olimo tek mo wacel i kare pa Abija; dok Rwot opwode, ci oto
woko.
21Ento Abija omedde odoko tek, Onyomo mon apar wiye aŋwen, onywalo kwedgi
litino awobe pyeraryo wiye aryo ki anyira apar wiye abicel.
22Lok kom Abija mudoŋŋe ducu, ma nyuto kite ma yam oloko, gityeko coyone i
lok pa lanebi Iddo.
2 Tekwaro 14
Loc pa Aca
(1 Luker 15.9-12)
1Abija oywe kacel ki kwarine, ci giyike i gaŋ kal pa Daudi; wode Aca aye oleyo ka
tyene. I karene lobo oywe mot ki kuc pi mwaka apar.
2Aca yam obedo ka tiyo gin maber dok ma nen atir i wan Rwot Lubaŋane.
3En okwanyo keno tyer ki waŋ jogi ma i wi godi pa lurok woko, omuko wir jogigi
bene, ka dok otoŋo yadi ma gicomo pi woro lok ma dako ma gilwoŋo Acera ducu
oreto woko piny,
4ka dok ociko jo Juda ni gubin bot Rwot, ma Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, dok gugwok
cikke ki gin ma en ociko.
5En bene yam omuko waŋ jogi ma i gaŋi ducu ma i Juda, okwanyo keno tyer me
waŋo odok eceta ducu, Ker okwe mot i karene.
6Ogero gaŋi ma girumo ki cel gogo i Juda, pien lobo onoŋo okwe mot. Pe obedo ki
lweny i lwak mwaka-nu ducu, pien Rwot omiyo kuc.
7En owaco bot jo Juda ni, “Wageru gaŋi magi, warumogi woko ki cel ma wagero i
kome odi matego ma ocudo malo, waket bene doggola iye ma gicego ki rii; lobo
doŋ pud mewa, pien wabedo ka bino bot Rwot Lubaŋawa, wabedo ka bino bote ci
en omiyowa kuc i kabedo ducu.” Gugedo dok gubedo ki lonyo madwoŋ.
8Aca obedo ki lumony ma gua ki i Juda ma giromo alip miya adek, ma gitye ki
kwodi ki toŋi, ki lumony ma gua ki i Benjamin ma giromo alip miya aryo ki
pyeraboro ma gutiŋo kwodi, ma gin bene lucel atum; gin ducu twoni oteka lweny
ma gitego.
9Jera ma Laetiopia obino ka lweny i komgi ki mony ma romo jo milion acel ki
gadigadi miya adek; gubino guo cok ki Mareca.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
741
10Ci Aca ocito ka rwatte kwede, kun monygi oryeyo i nota Jepata i Mareca.
11Aca okok bot Rwot Lubaŋane ni, “Ai Rwot, pe tye lakony mo macalo in, ma
koriyo jo magoro ka lweny i kom jo matego, Konywa, ai Rwot Lubaŋawa, pien
wageno in, wabino ka lweny i kom lwak man madwoŋ-ŋi pi nyiŋi. Ai Rwot, in aye
Lubaŋawa; pe iye dano mo oloyi.”
12Kit meno omiyo Rwot oryemo jo Etiopia woko ki i nyim Aca ki i nyim jo Juda,
omiyo jo Etiopia guriŋo woko.
13Aca ki monnye guryemo korgi nio wa i Gerar, ci guneko jo Etiopia matek ma
dano mo acel pe obwot makwo; pien guket woko ata ki i nyim Rwot ki monnye.
Jo Juda gutiŋo lwak jami madwoŋ ma guyako gucito kwede.
14Guturo gaŋi ducu ma gurumo Gerar, pien Rwot omiyo lworo opoto i komgi.
Guyako gaŋi ducu, pien onoŋo jami me ayaka dwoŋ i igi twatwal.
15Guputo kema pa jo ma yam wegi dyaŋi, guyako romi madwoŋ twatwal ki
kinaga-gu, Gudok kwede cen i Jerucalem.
2 Tekwaro 15
Aca odwoko cwiny jone i kom Rwot
(1 Luker 15.13-15)
1Cwiny pa Lubaŋa obino i kom Ajaria wod pa Oded,
2omiyo en ocito orwatte ki Aca, ci otitte ni, “Winy an, Aca, ki jo Juda ki Benjamin
