6Kit meno doŋ wunek litino romi me Kato (Paska), wulonnye kenwu, wuyub gin
ma mitte pi utmegiwu, wek gulub lok pa Rwot ma Moses ociko.”
7Yocia omiyo litino romi ki litino dyegi alip pyeradek, ki twoni alip adek, bot lwak
pi gityer me Kato (Paska) pi lwak jo ducu ma onoŋo gitye kenyo. Jami magi ducu
jami ma oa i kom jami pa kabaka.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
778
8Ki rwodi bene gumiyo gin ma cwinygi opwoyo bot lwak, bot ajwagi ki bot Lulevi.
Ilkia, Jekaria ki Jekiel, ma gin ludito ma giloyo tic ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, gumiyo bot
ajwagi litino romi ki dyegi alip aryo ki miya abicel ki twoni miya adek me gityer
me Kato (Paska).
9Konania ki omegine, ki Cemaya ki Netanel, ki Kacabia, Jeyel ki. Jojabad, ma gin
ludito pa Lulevi, gumiyo litino romi ki dyegi alip abic, ki twoni miya abic, bot
Lulevi me gityer me Kato (Paska).
10I kare ma doŋ giyubo jami ducu kakare, ajwagi gucako cuŋ i kabedogi, ki Lulevi
bene gucuŋ i dul ki dul i dog ticgi kun gin ducu gilubo gin ma kabaka ociko.
11Guneko litino romi me Kato (Paska), ci ajwagi ticgi obedo me coro remo ma
gigamo ki bot Lulevi ina gitye ka yaŋo riŋo.
12I kare ma gitimo man giketo dul mukene me gitum awaŋa cen, ma gibipoko i
kin lwak kun gilubo dog odi pa kwarigi, wek gutyer bot Rwot, macalo gicoyo i
buk pa Moses. Ci gutiyo ki twoni bene kit meno.
13 Gubulo litino romi me Kato (Paska) ki mac kun gilubo cik ma yam giciko; ento
jami me gityer maleŋ gutedo ateda ki otako ki agulu, ki cupuriya, ka gucako
tiŋone gutyero bot lwak oyotoyot.
14I ne meno gubedo ka yubo jami pigi kengi ki pi ajwagi, pien ajwagi ma gin
likwayo pa Aron onoŋo gitye ki tic madwoŋ twatwal me waŋo gitum awaŋa-gu ki
moo dwolo-gu nio wa i wor, Kit meno Lulevi guyubo jami pigi kengi ki pi ajwagi
bene ma gin likwayo pa Aron.
15 Likwayo pa Acap ma gin luwer, gubedo i kabedogi macalo Daudi, Acap, Keman,
ki Jedutun ma lanen pa kabaka onoŋo guciko; ki lugwok doggola ot pa Rwot ducu
gubedo i doggola acel acel. Pe gumito weko ticgi pien guniaŋ ni utmegigi ma
Lulevi gubedo ka yubbe pigi bene.
16Meno aye kit ma giyubo ki tic pa Rwot i nino-nu, pi kwero nino madit me Kato
(Paska) ki pi tyero gitum awaŋa i kom keno tyer pa Rwot, kun gilubo lok ma
kabaka Yocia ociko.
17 Jo Icrael ducu ma onoŋo gitye kunnu gukwero nino madit me Kato (Paska) i
kare meno, ki dok gukwero bene nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye pi nino
abiro.
18Pe tye nino mo madit me Kato (Paska) ma gikwero kit man i Icrael nia i kare pa
lanebi Camuel. Dok pe tye laker mo i kin luker me Icrael ma yam okwero nino me
Kato (Paska) macalo Yocia okwero, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi, jo Juda ki jo
Jerucalem ducu ma onoŋo gubedo tye, ki jo ducu ma gibedo i Jerucalem.
19I mwaka me apar wiye aboro me loc pa Yocia en aye gikwero iye nino man
madit me Kato (Paska).
To pa Yocia
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
779
(2 Luker 23.28-30)
20I ŋe man ducu, ma doŋ Yocia otyeko yubo ot pa Lubaŋa, Neko kabaka me Ejipt
ocito ka lweny i Karkemic ma cok ki kulu Euprate, ki Yociaa bene ocrto ka lweny i
kome cut.
21Ento Neko ocwalo kwena bot Yocia ma guwacci, “Imito, watimme niŋniŋ: kaba
ka me Juda? Tin an pe abino ka lweny i komi, ento abino ka lwenyo i kom jo ma
atye ka lweny i komgi; dok Lubaŋa ociko me tiyo man oyotoyot. Wek pyem ki
Lubaŋa ma tye kweda-ni miyo neki woko.”
22Ento Yocia pe oloko ŋeye ki kabaka Neko, ci orukke macalo dano mo ata wek
elweny kwede. Yocia pe owinyo lok pa Neko ma oa ki i dog Lubaŋa kadi ki acel
ento ocerre ocito ka lweny kwede iba; Megido.
23Cutcut gutugi celo kabaka Yocia woko; ci kabaka owaco bot luticce ni,
“Wukwanya woko ki i wan lweny, pien doŋ gutyeko keto ret marac twatwal, i,
koma.”
24Ci luticce gukwanye woko ki I gadigadine gukete i gadigadine me aryone ka
gutere i Jerucalem. Yocia oto, ci giyike i lyel pa kwarine. Jo Juda ki jo Jerucalem
ducu gukumo matek pi Yocia.
25Jeremia bene okok matek pi Yocia; co kacel ki mon ma gubedo ka wer guloko pi
Yocia i kokogi cakke i kare ca nio wa onyoo. Guketo man odoko cik i Icrael ducu:
nen gityeko coyone i buk me Koko.
26Lok kom Yocia mudoŋŋe ducu, ki tic mabeco ma en otiyo ducu kit ma gicoyo
kwede i buk me cik pa Rwot,
27gin ma yam en otiyo ducu, nia i acakkine nio i agikkine, nen, gityeko coyone I
buk pa Luker me Icrael ki me Juda.
2 Tekwaro 36
Loc pa Yekoakaj ki tur me kerre
(2 Luker 23.31-35)
1Lwak ma gin wegi lobo gukwa nyo Yekoakaj wod pa Yocia, ci guketo en kabaka
me leyo ka tyen wonne i Jerucalem.
2Yekoakaj ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye adek, ci obedo ka loc i
Jerucalem pi dwe adek.
3Lacen Kabaka me Ejipt oryemo Yekoakaj woko ki i ker ka oketo wel ajog mapek
i kom jo Juda i wel me kilo alip abic me ryal ki kile pyerabic me jabu.
4 Kabaka me Ejipt oketo Eliakim omin Yekoakaj obedo kabaka me Juda ki me
Jerucalem ci ocako loko nyiŋe Yekoyakim; ento Neko okwanyo Yekoakaj otero
woko i Ejipt.
Loc pa Yekoyakim
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
780
(2 Luker 23.36–24.7)
5 Yekoyakim ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye abic, ci obedo ka loc i
Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye acel. Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot
Lubaŋane.
6 Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon obino ka lweny i kome, CI omake otweye ki
nyor ka otere kwede woko i Babilon.
7Nebukadnejar bene okwanyo jami mogo ki i kin jami ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa
Rwot oterogi i Babilon, ci oketogi i gaŋ kalle i Babilon.
8Lok kom Yekoyakim mudoŋŋe ducu, ki tim me kipyeda ducu ma yam otiyo, kacel
ici lok ma ginoŋo i kome, nen, gityeko coyone i buk pa Luker me Icrael ki me Juda,
Wode Yekoyakin aye oleyo ka tyene.
Gitero Yekoyakin i Babilon i opii
(2 Luker 24.8-17)
9Yekoyakin ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte aboro, ci obedo ka loc i Jerucalem pi
dwe adek ki nino apar. Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i wan Rwot.
10 I dog oro en aye Nebukadnejar ocwalo luticce ka ome ci gutere wa i Babilon.
Otero wa jami mabeco ma gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot. Ci oketo ominne Jedekia
obedo kabaka me loyo jo Juda ki Jerucalem.
Loc pa Jedekia
(2 Luker 24.18-20)
11 Jedekia ocamo ker ma mwaka me ditte pyeraryo wiye acel, ci obedo ka loc i
Jerucalem pi mwaka apar wiye acel.
12Obedo ka tiyo gin ma nen marac i waŋ Rwot Lubaŋane. En pe omwolle i nyim
lanebi Jeremia, ma oloko kwede lok ma oa ki bot Rwot.
13 Jedekia bene ojemo i kom kabaka Nebukadnejar ma yam omiyo en ekwono
kwon ki nyiŋ Lubaŋa; omiyo cwinye obedo nwaŋ ma pe mito lokke bot Rwot,
Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
14Ajwagi ma gin lutel kacel ki lwak mukene-gu ducu pe gugeno Rwot matwal,
gubedo ka lubo gin me kwer pa rok mukene, omiyo gubalo kwede ot pa Rwot wo
ko ma yam Rwot otyeko lonyo obedo leŋ i Jerucalem.
15Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarigi, obedo ka cwalo lok botgi teretere kun oro lukwenane
me tito botgi, pien kica omako en i kom lwakke ki pi kabedo mere;
16ento gin gubedo ka ŋalo lukwena pa Lubaŋa, ma gicayo lokke-gu, dok gijwiyo
lunebine bene, nio ka akemo omako Rwot i kom lwakke, ma gin mo ma romo
jukone doŋ pe.
Gitero jo Juda i opii
(2 Luker 25.8-21; Jer 39.8-10;52.13-30)
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
781
17 Rwot ocako kela kabaka pa jo Kaldaya ka lweny i komgi, ci oneko awobe ki
pala lucwan ki i kabedo maleŋ ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, pe obedo ki kica i kom awobi
nyo nyako, jo muteggi nyo jo muti; magi ducu Lubaŋa omiyogi woko i ciŋe.
18Ki jami ducu ma yam gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa, jami madito ki matinone, ki
lonyo ma gikano i ot pa Rwot, ki lonyo ma kabaka okano ki pa rwodine ducu,
kabaka pa jo Kaldaya otero woko ducu i Babilon.
19Giwaŋo ot pa Lubaŋa woko, ka dok gimuko cel murumo Jerucalem, ci giwaŋo
odi ma gibedo iye woko ducu ki mac, kun gibalo bene wa jami ma pigi tego.
20En otero jo ma guloyo ki i lak to i Babilon, ci gudoko opiine ki pa litinone nio ka
ker me Percia ocuŋ matek.
21 Man obedo pi cobo lok pa Rwot ma yam oloko ki i dog Jeremia, nio wan ma
lobo otyeko kwero cabitte ducu. Pi kare ducu ma lobo giweko ata noŋo tye ka
kwero karene me yweyo mot macalo i ceŋ cabit, nio ka wel mwaka ocobo kakare
ma oromo pyerabiro.
Ciro ociko ni jo Icrael gudok cen
(Ejira 1.1-3)
22I mwaka mukwoŋo me loc pa Ciro kabaka me Percia, wek lok pa Rwot ma yam
oloko ki i dog Jeremia ocobbe kakare, cutcut Rwot otugo cwiny Ciro kabaka me
Percia omiyo en otito lok oromo i lobo ma i te kerre ducu. En ocoyo lok man bene
ki waraga ni,
23“Ciro kabaka me Percia owaco kuman ni, ‘Rwot, ma en Lubaŋa me polo, otyeko
miyo ker ducu ma i wi lobo i ciŋa, dok ocika ni ager ot pire i Jerucalem, ma tye i
Juda. Bot ŋat mo keken ma i kinwu ma i kom lwakke ducu awaco ni, Rwot
Lubaŋane myero obed kwede. Wek en oa ociti.’ ”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
782
Ejira
Ejira 1
Ciro otito lok
(2 Tek 36.22-23)
1 I mwaka mukwoŋo me loc pa Ciro kabaka me Percia, wek lok pa Rwot ma yam
oloko ki i dog Jeremia ocobbe kakare, cutcut Rwot otugo cwiny Ciro kabaka me
Percia omiyo en otito lok oromo i lobo ma i te kerre ducu. En ocoyo lok man bene
ki waraga ni,
2 “Ciro kabaka me Percia owaco kuman ni, Rwot, ma en Lubaŋa me polo, otyeko
miyo ker ducu ma i wi lobo i ciŋa, dok ocika ni ager ot pire i Jerucalem ma tye i
Juda.
3Bot ŋat mo keken ma i kinwu ma i kom lwakke ducu awaco ni, Lubaŋane myero
obed kwede. Wek en oa ocit i Jerucalem, ma tye i Juda, ka gero ot pa Rwot,
Lubaŋa pa Icrael, en Lubaŋa ma gaŋ kalle Jerucalem.
4Pienno dano acel acel ma pud odoŋ i kabedo mo ma en bedo iye, wek jo ma i
kabedo meno gumiye kony me ryal ki jabu, kacel ki jami-gu ki lim makwo, kun
gimedo i kom gityer ma igi opwoyo ma gimiyo pi ot pa Lubaŋa ma tye i
Jerucalem.”
Jo ma giterogi i opii gudwogo cen i Jerucalem
5Ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma tye i kaka pa Juda ki Benjamin, kacel ki
ajwagi ki Lulevi ma Lubaŋa otugo cwinygi, gucako yubbe me cito ka gero ot pa
Rwot ma tye Jerucalem odoco.
6Jo ducu murumogi gumiyogi kony me jami me ryal, jabu, ki lwak jami mapatpat,
kacel ki lim makwo-gu, ki mot ma welgi doŋo, medo i kom lim ducu ma dano
gutyero ma cwinygi opwoyo me miyone.
7Kabaka Ciro bene okwanyo jami ma yam gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Rwot woko ma
yam Nebukadnejar oyako ki i Jerucalem ci otero oketo i ot jok pa lwak lubaŋane.
8Ciro kaba ka me Percia okelogi ci omiyogi i cin Mitredat ma lakan lim, en ma
okwano lwak jami meno ducu i nyim Cecbajar ma en rwot me Juda.
9Wel jami onoŋo yam tye kit man: Becen me jabu alip acel, becen me ryal alip
acel, ata bo weer me waŋo odok eceta pyeraryo wiye aboŋwen,
10atabo me jabu pyeradek, atabo me ryal alip aryo ki miya aŋwen ki apar, ki jami
mukene alip acel;
11jami me jabu ki me ryal ducu oromo alip abic ki miya aŋwen ki pyerabicel wiye
aboŋwen, Jami magi ducu Cecbajar odwokogi i Jerucalem i kare ma jo ma yam
giterogi i opii i Babilon gidwokogi kwede cen i Jerucalem.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
783
Ejira 2
Wel dano ma gudwogo cen ki i opii
(Nek 7.5-73)
1Magi gin aye jo me dul lobo Juda ma yam giyakogi ci giterogi i opii i lobo Babilon
ma Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon con otweyogi kunnu: ci gudwogo i
Jerucalem ki i Juda, kun dano acel acel dok i gaŋŋe kikome.
2Gin gudwogo kacel ki Jerubabel, ki Yecwa, ki Nekemia, ki Ceraya, ki Rcelaya, ki
Mordekai, ki Bilcan, ki Micpar, ki Bigvai, ki Rekum, ki Baana. Man aye wel co ma i
kin jo Icrael:
3Likwayo pa Paroc, alip aryo ki miya acel ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
4Likwayo pa Cepatia, miya adek ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
5Likwayo pa Ara, miya abiro ki pyerabiro wiye abic.
6Likwayo pa Pakat-moab, ma gin aye likwayo pa Yecwa ki Joab, alip aryo ki miya
aboro ki apar wiye aryo.
7Ki likwayo pa Elam, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
8Likwayo pa Jatu, miya aboŋwen ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
9Likwayo pa Jakaj, miya abiro ki pyerabicel.
10Likwayo pa Bani, miya abicel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
11Likwayo pa Bebai, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
12Likwayo pa Ajgad, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
13Likwayo pa Adonikam, miya abicel ki pyerabicel wiye abicel.
14Likwayo pa Bigvai, alip aryo ki pyerabic wiye abicel.
15Likwayo pa Adin, miya aŋwen ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
16Likwayo pa Ater, ma en aye likwayo pa Kejekia, pyeraboŋwen wiye aboro.
17Likwayo pa Bejai, miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
18Likwayo pa Jora, miya acel ki apar wiye aryo.
19Likwayo pa Kacum, miya aryo ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
20Likwayo pa Gibar, pyeraboŋwen wiye abic.
21Jo Beterekem, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
22Jo Netopa, pyerabic wiye abicel.
23Jo Anatot, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
24Jo Ajimavet, pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
784
25Jo Kiriatarim, jo Kepira, ki jo Beerot, miya abiro ki pyeraŋwen wiye adek.
26Jo Rama ki jo Geba, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye acel.
27Jo Mikmac, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
28Jo Betel ki Ai, miya aryo ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
29Jo Nebo, pyerabic wiye aryo.
30Jo Magbie, miya acel ki pyerabicel wiye abicel.
31Jo Elam mukene-ne, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
32Jo Karim, miya adek ki pyeraryo.
33Jo Lod, jo Kadid, ki jo Ono, miya abiro ki pyeraryo wiye abic.
34Jo Jeriko, miya adek ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
35Jo Cenaa alip adek ki miya abicel ki pyeradek.
36Man aye wel ajwagi: likwayo pa Jedaya, ma i dog ot pa Yecwa, miya aboŋwen ki
pyerabiro wiye adek.
37Likwayo pa Imer, alip acel ki pyerabic wiye aryo.
38Likwayo pa Packur, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abiro.
39Likwayo pa Karim, alip acel ki apar wiye abiro.
40Man aye wel Lulevi: Likwayo pa Yecwa ki Kadmiel, ma i kin likwayo pa
Kodavia, pyerabiro wiye aŋwen.
41Luwer ma likwayo pa Acap, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
42Likwayo pa lugwok-doggola ma gin likwayo pa Calum, likwayo pa Ater, likwayo
pa Talmon, likwayo pa Akub, likwayo pa Katita, ki likwayo pa Cobai, gin ducu
onoŋo giromo miya acel ki pyeradek wiye aboŋwen.
43Magi aye lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa: likwayo pa Jika, likwayo pa Kacupa, likwayo pa
Tabaot,
44likwayo pa Keroc, likwayo pa Ciaka, likwayo pa Padon,
45likwayo pa Lebana, likwayo pa Agaba, likwayo pa Akub,
46likwayo pa Kagab, likwayo pa Camlai, likwayo pa Kanan,
47likwayo pa Gidel, likwayo pa Gakar, likwayo pa Re-aya,
48likwayo pa Rejin, likwayo pa Nekoda, likwayo pa Gajam,
49likwayo pa Uja, likwayo pa Pacea, likwayo pa Becai,
50likwayo pa Acna, likwayo pa Meunim, likwayo pa Nepicim,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
785
51likwayo pa Bakbuk, likwayo pa Akupa, likwayo pa Arur,
52likwayo pa Bajlut, likwayo pa Mekida, likwayo pa Arca,
53likwayo pa Barkoc, likwayo pa Cicera, likwayo pa Tema,
54likwayo pa Nejia, ki likwayo pa Atipa.
55Likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon gin ene: likwayo pa Cotai, likwayo pa Kaeoperet,
likwayo pa Peruda,
56likwayo pa Jaala, likwayo pa Darkon, likwayo pa Gidel,
57likwayo pa Cepatia, likwayo pa Katil, likwayo pa Poceret-kajebaim, ki likwayo
pa Ami.
58Jo ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ki likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon onoŋo welgi romo
miya adek ki pyeraboŋwen wiye aryo.
59Magi aye jo ma gubino ma gua ki i Tel-mela, Tel-karca, Kerub, Adan ki Imer,
kadi bed pe gitwero nyuto dog odi pa kwarogi, ka onoŋo yam gin jo Icrael:
60gin likwayo pa Delaya, likwayo pa Tobia, ki likwayo pa Nekoda, gin ducu miya
abicel ki pyerabic wiye aryo.
61Dok jo magi gitye i kin likwayo pa ajwagi: likwayo pa Kabaya likwayo pa Kakoj,
ki likwayo pa Barjilai. En yam onyomo dakone ki kin anyira pa Barjilai ma jo
Gilead; yam gilwoŋo en ki nyiŋgi.
62Gin gubedo ka yenyo nyiŋgi i kin lwak nyiŋ ma gicoyogi i buk me tekwaro, ento
pe gunoŋo iye nyiŋgi, omiyo gikwanyogi woko ki i kin ajwagi calo jo ma komgi ki
keni.
63 Laloyo otito botgi ni gin pe gunywak camo cam maleŋ maka to, nio wan ma
ajwaka binen ma bipenyo dog Rwot ki Urim ki Tumim.
64Lwak ma gucokke ducu welgi romo alip pyeraŋwen wiye aryo ki miya adek ki
pyerabicel,
65ma pe gikwano iye lwak luticgi ki aŋecagi ma welgi romo alip abiro ki miya
adek ki pyeradek wiye abiro. Onoŋo gitye bene ki luwer ma co ki ma mon miya
aryo.
66Aguraguragi yam tye miya abiro ki pyeradek wiye abicel, ki kanagi maditone mi
ya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic,
67kinagagi romo miya aŋwen ki pyeradek wiye abic, ki kanagi romo alip abicel ki
miya abiro ki pyeraryo.
68I kare ma jo mogo ma i kin ludito wi kaka, gubino i ot pa Rwot ma tye i
Jerucalem, gutyero gityer ma cwinygi opwoyo pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa, i kabedone
macon kikome.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
786
69Gumiyo lim i ot kano lim me tic kit macalo gitwero, darik me jabu alip
pyerabicel wiye acel, mina me ryal alip abic, ki boŋŋi aruka pa ajwagi miya acel.
70 Ajwagi ki Lulevi ki jo mogo mukene gubedo i Jerucalem ki i kabedo ma cok
kwede; luwer, lugwok-doggola, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa i gaŋigi, ki jo Icrael ducu
bene gubedo i gaŋigi.
Ejira 3
Gicako woro Rwot i Jerucalem odoco
1Ka dwe me abiro oromo, onoŋo doŋ jo Icrael gubedo mot i gaŋigi, ci lwak
gucokke i Jerucalem ki cwiny acel.
2 Cutcut Yecwa wod pa Jojadak kacel ki ajwagi luwote, ki Jerubabel wod pa
Cealtiel ki lutugi, gucako caŋo keno tyer pa Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pi tyero iye gitum
awaŋa, kit macalo yam gicoyo i cik pa Moses ma dano pa Lubaŋa-ni.
3Gucano keno tyer i kabedone kikome, kadi bed lworo omakogi pi lwak jo
mukene ma gitye i lobo-nu, ci gutyero iye gitum awaŋa bot Rwot, kun giwaŋo
gitum odiko ki otyeno.
4Ka gukwero nino madito me Bolo, kit ma con gicoyo, kun gityero gitum awaŋa
nino ducu kun welle lubo cik ma mitte pi nino acel acel.
5 Ka doŋ i ne meno gimedde ki tyero gitum awaŋa nino ducu, gityer me por dwe
ki me nino madito ma Rwot ociko ducu, ki gityer ma dano acel acel miyo bot
Rwot kit ma iye opwoyo.
6Cakke i kom nino dwe mukwoŋo me dwe me abiro en aye gucako tyero iye
gitum awaŋa bot Rwot, Ento guti me te ot pa Rwot onoŋo pud peya giketo.
7Pienno gumiyo lim bot lupa-godi ki bot lupac. Dok gumiyo cam ki ginamata-gu,
ki moo bot jo Cidon ki jo Turo wek gukel yadi cedar ki i Lebanon wa i dog nam, i
Jopa, pi twero ma Ciro kabaka me Percia omiyo botgi.
Gicako gero ot pa Lubaŋa odoco
8I mwaka me aryone ma lubo dwogogi i Jerucalem i ot pa Lubaŋa, i dwe me aryo,
en aye Jerubabel wod pa Cealtiel ki Yecwa wod pa Jojadak gucako kwede tic,
kacel ki utmegigi mukene, kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi ki jo ducu ma yam gudok i
Jerucalem ma gua ki i lobo ka ma giterogi iye i opii. Guyero Lulevi, ma mwaka me
ditogi romo pyeraryo ki makato pi ketogi me bedo ludito ma giloyo tic i kom ot
pa Rwot.
9Yecwa ki awobene ki lutugi, ki Kadmiel ki awo bene ma likwayo pa Juda, gin
ducu guloyo lutic ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, kacel ki awobe pa Kenadad ki Lulevi, ki
litinogi kacel ki lutugi.
10 Ka doŋ lugedo guketo guti me te ot pa Rwot, ajwagi guruko ginaruka me tic
megi gukato kwede anyim ma gumako tumgi; ki Lulevi ma likwayo pa Acap
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
787
onoŋo gitye ki atego agoya-gu me pako Rwot, kit ma yam Daudi kabaka me Icrael
ociko.
11 Guwero wer kun gileyo aleya, ma gipako Rwot dok gimiyo pwoc bote, kun
giwero ni, “Pien en ber, mar mere ma pe lokke bedo nakanaka bot jo Icrael.”
Lwak ducu gudaŋŋe ki woo madwoŋ, ka gipako Rwot, pien doŋ giketo guti me te
ot pa Rwot.
12Ento lwak jo mapol ki i kin ajwagi ki Lulevi ki ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa
kwarogi, jo muteggi ma yam guneno ot pa Rwot mukwono ca, gukok matek ki
dwan maloŋo i kare ma guneno ka gitye ka keto guti me te ot man, kadi ka jo
mapol onoŋo gubedo ka daŋŋe ki yomcwiny;
13mumiyo dano pe gutwero poko kin dwan ma jo gidaŋŋe kwede pi yomcwiny ki
dwan me daŋŋe ma jo gikok kwede akoka-ni, pien onoŋo lwak gubedo ka daŋŋe
matek twatwal, dok dwangi bene owinnye wa ka mabor.
Ejira 4
Lumerok gujuko tic me ot pa Lubaŋa
1Ka lumerok pa jo Juda ki jo pa Benjamin guwinyo ni jo ma gudwo go ki i opii i
rok gitye ka gero ot pa Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael,
2 ci cut gubino bot Jerubabel ki ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi kun giwaco
botgi ni, “Wuwek waribbe kwedwu i gedo man, pien wan bene waworo
Lubaŋawu-ni macalo wun, dok wan bene wabedo ka tyero gitum bote cakke wa i
kare pa Ecar-kadon kabaka me Aciria ma yam okelowa kany-nyi.”
3Ento Jerubabel, ki Yecwa, ki ludito mukene ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma i
Icrael gugamo doggi ni, “Wun pe wutwero ribbe kwedwa me gero ot mo pi
Lubaŋawa; wan kenwa watwero gero ot pi Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael, macalo
kabaka Ciro kabaka me Percia yam ociko ki wan.”
4Ka dok lwak jo mukene ma gitye i lobo-nu gucako balo cwiny jo Juda woko,
omiyo gubedo ki lworo me gedo.
5Jo meno guwilo lumi-tam pa kabaka mogo me balo ticgi woko, i kare pa Ciro
kabaka me Percia, nio kwede wa i kare me loc pa Dario kabaka me Percia.
6 I kare me loc pa Akacwero, i acakki me locce, gucoyo lok me adot i kom jo ma
gibedo i Juda ki i Jerucalem.
7I kare me loc pa Aritakcec, jo magi Biclam ki Mitredat ki Tabcel ki ludito wadgi
ducu, gucoyo waraga bot Aritakcec kabaka me Percia; yam gicoyo ki leb Aram ka
giloko.
8Rekum ma en ladit me mony ki Cimcai ma karan gucoyo waraga bot kabaka
Aritakcec ma tito lok i kom Jerucalem kit man ni.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
788
9Rekum ma ladit me mony, ki Cimcai ma karan gucoyo waraga man kacel ki
ludito wadgi ducu, luŋolkop, ki luloc me lobo, ki ludito, pa jo Percia ki jo Erek, ki
jo Babilon, ki jo Cuca, ma gin aye jo Elam,
10kacel ki lwak rok mukene ducu ma yam laker madit me awora Ocnapar okobogi
woko omiyo gubedo i gaŋi ma i lobo Camaria ki i kabedo mukene mapatpat ma i
dul lobo ma gilwoŋo Loka Kulu Euprate.
11Man aye kopi me waraga ma gucwalo bote-ni, lokke kwanne kit man, “Bot
kabaka Aritakcec: Wan luticci ma wabedo i lobo me Loka Kulu, wacwalo motwa
boti.
12Wek kabaka oŋe ni Lujudaya ma gua ki boti gudwogo botwa, koni gutyeko cito
woko i Jerucalem, Gitye ka gero gaŋ pa jo ma lujemo ma gin jo maraco-ni odoco;
gicok doŋ ka tyeko tic i kom cel murumo gaŋ dok gitye ka yubo te gutine.
13Myero kabaka oŋe lok man ni, ka ce gaŋ man gigero odoco, ka gigero cel otum,
ci pe doŋ gibimiyo ajog dok pe gibiculo kit mucoro mo. Dok lim ma gibicwalo bot
kabaka bene bijwik woko.
14Kit macalo wan lutic i gaŋ kal pa kabaka, pe bedo ber ka waweko gituro twero
pa kabaka woko ma kun wan waneno anena, mumiyo wacwalo lok man pi titone
boti in kabaka,
15wek koŋ ginen dok giyeny lok i buk ma gicoyo iye lok mutimme i kom
kwarowu. Ibinoŋo i lok ma gicoyo i buk me lok mutimme ma bimiyo iniaŋ atir ni
gaŋ man kara gaŋ me jemo ada, ma miyo can ki arem i kom luker ki luloc me
lobo, pi atubegi ma ocakke magwa i gaŋ meno nia wa con. Meno aye gin mumiyo
yam gimuko gaŋ man woko.
16Wamito kabaka oŋe ni, ka ce gaŋ man gigero odoco, ki cel bene otum, in doŋ pe
ibibedo ki twero mo i lobo ma i Loka Kulu.”
17Kabaka ocwalo botgi lagam me waraga kit man, “Bot Rekum ladit me mony ki
Cimcai karan, ki lwak ducu ma gin ludito wadiwu ma gibedo i Camaria ki i lobo
ducu me Loka Kulu, amotowu.
18Doŋ amito wuŋe ni waraga ma wucwalo botwa kany gikwano ducu maber i
nyima.
19Ci doŋ amiyo twero, kun bene giŋiyo ma giyenyo i buk, ci ginoŋo ada ni gaŋ
man nia wa i kare macon obedo ka jemo woko i kom luker ducu, dok ni jemo
kacel ki atube obedo ka timme iye.
20Ki luker matego yam gubedo ka loyo Jerucalem, ma guloyo bene wa ki lobo
ducu me Loka Kulu, ma lwak gubedo ka culo ajog ki mucoro ducu botgi.
21Pienno myero wuket cik wek gijuk jo meno woko, wek gaŋ man pe dok giger
odoco, nio wan ma an kikoma aketo cik.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
789
22Wuket cwinywu i kom lok meno, pe wubed ata ma pe wuŋeyo ticwu, Piŋo
wumito weko lim pa kabaka ki twer mere balle woko ata?”
23I kare ma doŋ gikwano waraga pa kabaka Aritakcec i nyim Rekum ki Cimcai ma
karan ki bot ludito wadgi ducu, gucako cito oyotoyot bot Lujudaya ma onoŋo
gitye i Jerucalem ci gujukogi woko ki tek.
24 Tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa ma tye i Jerucalem ocun woko; ticce ocun nio wa i
mwaka me aryo me loc pa Dario kabaka me Percia.
Ejira 5
Gityeko gero ot pa Lubaŋa odoco
1I kare meno, lunebi magi, Aggai ki Jekaria wod pa Iddo, gutito lok bot Lujudaya
ma gitye i Juda ki i Jerucalem, i nyiŋ Lubaŋa pa Icrael ma en aye loyogi-ni.
2 Ka dok Jerubabel wod pa Cealtiel ki Yecwa wod pa Jojadak gucako gero ot pa
Lubaŋa ma tye i Jerucalem odoco; onoŋo lunebi pa Lubaŋa bene tye kacel kwedgi
ma konyogi ki tic.
3I kare meno kikome en aye Tatenai ma laloc me dul lobo me Loka Kulu ki Cetar-
bojenai ki ludito wadgi gubino botgi ci guloko kwedgi kit man ni, “Aŋa
mumiyowu twero me gero ot man ki me tyeko gedo man?”
4Gin bene gupenyogi kit man ni, “Lugedo ma gitye ka gedo-ni nyiŋgi aŋagi?”
5Ento wan Lubaŋa yam tye ka neno ludoŋo pa Lujudaya, omiyo pe gijuko ticgi nio
wan ma lok ma gicwalo-ni oo bot Dario, ma kun gikuro lagam me waraga ma
gibidwoko pi lok meno.
6Man aye lok ma i waraga ma Tatenai ma en laloc me dul lobo ma tye Loka Kulu
ki Cetar-bojenai ki ludito wadgi ducu gucoyo ci gucwalo bot Dario;
7gucwalle lok ma gicoyo kit man ni, “Bot kabaka Dario, kuc obed boti.
8Myero kabaka oŋe ni wan wacito i lobo Juda, wao wa i ot pa Lubaŋa madit. Gitye
ka gerone ki godi apaya madoŋo, ki dok giguro bao bene me umo kom ot nia ki i
dye ot piny nio kwede wa i kwori me dan ot ducu; tic man tye ka wot mot maber
twatwal dok ticce ye ciŋgi maber.
9Wan wapenyo ludoŋo ma kunnu ka waloko botgi kit man ni, ‘Aŋa mumiyowu
twero me gero ot man ki me tyeko cel murumo ducu?’
10Ka dok wapenyo wa nyiŋgi bene, wek watit boti, ka wacoyo nyiŋ ludito ma
gitelo wigi.
11Gin gugamo dogwa kit man ni, ‘Wan lutic pa Lubaŋa me polo ki lobo, wan watye
ka gero ot man odoco, en ot ma yam gigero i lwak mwaka mapol mukato anec, ma
con kabaka madit pa jo Icrael ogero nio ka otyeko.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
790
12 Ento ka kwarowa yam gumiyo kiniga omako Lubaŋa me polo i komgi, ci
omiyogi i ciŋ Nebukadnejar ma Lakaldaya, kabaka me Babilon, ma obalo ot man
woko ka oterogi wa I lobo Babilon.
13Ento i mwaka mukwono me loc pa Ciro kabaka me Babilon, Ciro oketo cik ma
miyo twero ni ot pa Lubaŋa man myero giger odoco.
14Dok bene jami me jabu ki me ryal ma yam gitiyo kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa, ma yam
Nebukadnejar oyako ki i ot pa Lubaŋa ma yam tye i Jerucalem ci oterogi oketogi i
ot pa lubaŋa ma i Babilon, jami magi ducu kabaka Ciro acel-lu aye yam
okwanyogi woko ki i ot pa lubaŋa ma tye i Babilon, ka omiyogi bot dano ma nyiŋe
Cecbajar, ma yam Ciro oketo obedo laloc;
15ka dok ocike ni, “Kwany jami magi itergi iciketgi i ot pa Lubaŋa ma tye i
Jerucalem, ka dok iwek giger ot pa Lubaŋa odoco i kabedone kikome.”
16Cecbajar man yam obino ci oketo te guti me ot pa Rwot Lubaŋa ma i Jerucalem;
cakke wa i kare ca nio wa koni gubedo ka gerone, ma pud bene peya otum.’
17Ka ce kabaka oneno ni tye atir, wek koŋ giyeny lokke i ot kano lok ma gicoyo
ma tye i Babilon, wek ginen atir ka yam kabaka Ciro oketo cik ma omiyo twero
me gero ot pa Lubaŋa man ma i Jerucalem-mi odoco. Koŋ kabaka onen kit ma en
ŋolo kwede lokke ci ocwal botwa.”
Ejira 6
1Kabaka Dario omiyo twero, ci giyenyo lokke i Babilon ki i ot me kano lok ka ma
gigwoko iye buk me lok ma yam gicoyo.
2Ginoŋo buk ma yam gicoyo iye lok i Ekbatana gaŋ kai me loko Media, ma gicoyo
iye ni, “Lok mutimme:
3I mwaka mukwoŋo me loc pa kabaka Ciro, kabaka Ciro omiyo twero ni, lok ma
mako gedo ot pa Lubaŋa ma i Jerucalem, wuwek ot meno giger odoco, en aye
kabedo ka ma gityero iye gitum ki ka ma gityero iye gitum awaŋa-ni, borre obed
futi pyeraboŋwen
4ki lacce futi pyeraboŋwen bene, ki godi apaya madoŋo, latyeŋ adek ma gurumo
ot woko ducu ki bao tyen acel. Lim ma gibiculo pi tic bia ki i kom lim pa kabaka.
5Dok bene wuwek jami me jabu ki me ryal me ot pa Lubaŋa, ma yam
Nebukadnejar oyakogi ki i ot pa Lubaŋa ma tye i Jerucalem ci okelogi i Babiloni-
ni, gidwokgi cen wek giketgi i ot pa Lubaŋa ma tye i Jerucalem, kun jami acel acel
giketo i kabedone kikome; ibiketogi i ot pa Lubaŋa.”
6“Pi meno in Tatenai, laloc me lobo me Loka Kulu, ki Cetar-bojenai, ki ludito
wadwu luloc mukene ma gitye i lobo me Loka Kulu, wunyik woko cen ki i ot pa
Lubaŋa:
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
791
7wuwek tic me ot pa Lubaŋa owot anyim kit ma mitte. Wuwek laloc pa Lujudaya
ki ludoŋo pa Lujudaya guger ot pa Lubaŋa odoco i kom kabedone macon kikome.
8Dok acikowu me konyo ludoŋo magi pa Lujudaya pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa odoco;
myero gicul lim ma mitte bot jo magi laboŋo galle, kun gikwanyo limme ki i kom
lim me ker ma gijogo, mua ki i lobo me Loka Kulu.
9Ka ce gimito litino twoni, ki nyogi romi, nyo romi me gitum awaŋa me atyera bot
Lubaŋa me polo, nyo ŋano, kado, ki koŋo vino, nyo moo, macalo ajwagi pa Lubaŋa
ma gitye i Jerucalem gimito, myero wumi gin meno botgi nino ducu ma pe wuken.
10Wubitimo kir man wek gutyer gityer ma Lubaŋa me polo bipwoyo, ki lego pi
kwo pa kabaka ki litinone.
11Dok amiyo twero ni ka ce dano mo oturo cik man, ci rii wi ot mere gibiwoto
woko, gipayo girobe kwede, ode bi doko odur yugi.
12Ka kabaka mo nyo rok mo oette otemo loko cik man, nyo obalo ot pa Lubaŋa
man ma tye i Jerucalem, Lubaŋa ma yam oyero kabedo meno wek eket iye nyiŋe
myero otur twerogi woko. An Dario amiyo twero; giwek tic otine kakare ki
mitkom kun gilubo cik man maber.”
Gikwero ot pa Lubaŋa pi ticce
13Ka kabaka Dario ocwalo kop, ci Tatenai, ma laloc me dul lobo me Loka Kulu, ki
Cetar-bojenai, ki ludito wadgi, gutiyo tic ki mitkom kit ma kabaka Dario ociko.
14 Ludoŋo pa Lujudaya gugedo gedo ma tic bene omedde owoto anyim maber, pi
lok me cuko cwiny ma lanebi Aggai ki Jekaria wod pa Iddo gutito. Gutyeko tic me
gedo kit macalo ceŋ Lubaŋa pa Icrael ocikogi kwede ki pi cik pa Ciro, Dario ki pa
Aritakcec kabaka me Percia.
15Gutyeko tic me gedo me ot pa Lubaŋa man i nino dwe adek me dwe me Adar, i
mwaka me abicel me loc pa kabaka Dario.
16Lacen jo Icrael, ajwagi ki Lulevi, kacel ki jo mu kene ma yam gudwogo cen ki i
opii i rok, gukwero ot pa Lubaŋa ki yomcwiny.
17I nino me kwero ot pa Lubaŋa kikome gutyero twoni miya acel, ki nyogi romi
miya aryo, litino romi miya aŋwen, ki nyogi dyegi apar wiye aryo, ma oporo wel
kaka pa jo Icrael pi gitum me bal pi jo Icrael ducu.
18Gipoko ajwagi ki Lulevi i dul, pi tic pa Lubaŋa i Jerucalem, kun gilubo gin ma
gicoyo i buk pa Moses.
Nino me Kato (Paska)
19 Jo ma gudwogo cen ki i opii gukwero nino madit me Kato (Paska) i nino dwe
apar wiye aŋwen me dwe mukwoŋo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
792
20Onoŋo ajwagi ducu kacel ki Lulevi doŋ gutyeko lonnye kekengi; gin ducu
gudoko leŋ. Omiyo guneko litino romi me gitum pi jo ducu ma yam gudwogo gua
ki i opii, ki pi ajwagi luwotgi, ki pigi kengi.
21Jo Icrael ma gudwogo ma gua ki i opii i rok aye gubedo ka camone, kacel ki jo
ducu ma doŋ guweko kwo me kafiri ma gupokke woko ki i kin lwak ma gin wegi
lobo, gubino ka woro Rwot, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
22Ka dok gukwero nino madito me Mugati ma Tobi Pe Iye ki yomcwiny pi nino
abiro; pien Rwot omiyogi yomcwiny, dok oloko cwiny kabaka me Aciria i komgi,
wek okonygi ki tic me gero ot pa Lubaŋa, Lubaŋa pa Icrael.
Ejira 7
Ejira ki lwakke guo i Jerucalem
1Lacen ki i ne lok man, ma onoŋo Aritakcec kabaka me Percia aye loyo lobo, Ejira
yam oa ki i lobo Babilon ocito i Jerucalem. En yam obedo wod pa Ceraya, wod pa
Ajaria, wod pa Ilkia,
2wod pa Calum, wod pa Jadok, wod pa. Akitub,
3wod pa Amaria, wod pa Ajaria, wod pa Merayot,
4wod pa Jerakia, wod pa Uji, wod pa Buki,
5wod pa Abicua, wod pa Finekaci, wod pa Eleajar, wod pa Aron ajwaka madit.
6En aye Ejira ma yam obedo karan dok laryeko i cik pa Moses ma con Rwot
Lubaŋa pa Icrael omiyo ki Moses; kabaka omiye jami ducu ma yam en olego, pien
Rwot Lubaŋane onoŋo tye ka konye.
7Jo ma gucito kwede i Jerucalem bene i mwaka me abiro me loc pa Aritakcec,
obedo ajwagi ki Lulevi, luwer, lugwok-doggola, ki lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa.
8En oo i Jerucalem i dwe me abic, me mwaka me abiro me loc pa kabaka.
9Gua woko ki i lobo Babilon i nino dwe acel me dwe me acel bene, ci guo i
Jerucalem i dwe me abic ninone acel, pien Rwot Lubaŋane onoŋo tye ka konye.
10Ejira yam oketo cwinye ka kwano ki niaŋ cik pa Rwot, kun tiyo, lubo, dok
pwonyo cikke ki gin ma en ociko ducu bot jo Icrael.
Lok ma kabaka Aritakcec ocwalo bot Ejira
11Man aye kopi me waraga ma kabaka Aritakcec yam omiyo bot ajwaka Ejira, ma
lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa, dano ma opwonnye i tyen lok me cik pa Rwot ki cik ma
en ociko pi jo Icrael:
12ni, “An Aritakcec kabaka ma loyo luker ducu, amiyo waraga man bot ajwaka
Ejira, ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa me polo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
793
13An kombeddi amiyo twero ni dano mo keken ki i kom jo Icrael nyo ajwagigi nyo
Lulevigi ma gitye i te locca ma oye mine kene me cito i Jerucalem, myero ocit
kacel kwedi.
14An kabaka kacel ki lumi-tam ma mera abiro aye wacwalli wek icipeny lok ma
tye i Juda ki i Jerucalem, me neno kit macalo cik pa Lubaŋawu, ma yam omiyo i
ciŋini, gitye ka lubone kwede.
15Myero iter ryal ki jabu ma an kacel ki lumitamma wamiyo ki yomcwiny me
atyera bot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, ma ode tye i Jerucalem.
16Dok bene myero iter ryal ki jabu ma in icoko ki i lobo Babilon ducu, ki gityer ma
ic opwoyo ma jo Icrael kacel ki ajwagi gumiyo, ma gukwoŋo kwoŋ me miyo gin
mo kit macalo cwiny dano acel acel omito pi ot pa Lubaŋagi ma tye i Jerucalem.
17Doŋ myero igwokke iti ki lim man maber me wilo twoni dyaŋi, nyogi romi, ki
gityer me moko kwon ki koŋo vino, ka icak tyerogi i kom keno tyer ma i ot pa
Lubaŋawu ma tye i Jerucalem.
18Dok in ki utmegi wutwero tic ki ryal ki jabu mogo ma odon kit macalo wuneno
ni ber, kun wulubo cik pa Lubaŋawu.
19Dok myero iter lwak jami tic ma gimiyo boti me tic kwedgi i ot pa Lubaŋa-ni,
ibiterogi ducu i nyim Lubaŋa me Jerucalem.
20Ka tye gin mo mukene ma mitte pi ot pa Lubaŋawu, ma myero in inoŋ, ci itwero
wilone ki lim ma gikwanyo ki i ot kano lim pa kabaka.
21“An kabaka Aritakcec, amiyo twero bot lukan lim ducu ma gitye i lobo me Loka
Kulu ni, Gin ducu ma ajwaka Ejira, ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa me polo, bimito ki
botwu, myero wumi bote oyotoyot ki mitkom,
22ma welle pe kato talanta me ryal miya acel, guniya ŋano miya adek, ki koŋo
vino debe miya aryo, ki debe me moo miya aryo, ki kado ma welle pe ginyuto.
23Gin ducu ma Lubaŋa me polo ociko, wuti kakare kikore i tic i kom ot pa Lubaŋa
me poto, wek akemo pe omake i koma ki i kom jo ma bibedo i loc i anyim ki i
ŋeya.
24Dok bene wagenowu ni pe myero wujog lim me mucoro mo ki bot ajwagi,
Lulevi, luwer, lugwok-doggola, ki lutic ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa, nyo lutic mukene
ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa.
25“In, Ejira, ti ki ryeko ma Lubaŋani omiyi, ket luŋolkop madito ki luŋolkop
matino wek gubed ka ŋolo kop pa lwak ducu ma gibedo i lobo me Loka Kulu;
myero gubed jo ma ŋeyo cik pa Lubaŋawu. Jo ma pe giŋeyo cik pa Lubaŋawu, in
ipwonygi wek guŋe.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
794
26Ka ce ŋat mo pe bilubo cik pa Lubaŋawu kacel ki cik me lobona, myero gimiye
pwod magwar, macalo kop me to, nyo kop me ryeme woko ki i lobo-ni, nyo me
yako jamine woko, nyo pi tweyo en i mabuc.”
Ejira opako Lubaŋa
27Gipwo Rwot, Lubaŋa pa kwarowa! En aye muketo gin maca lo man i cwiny
kabaka, pi deyo ot pa Rwot ma i Jerucalem maber.
28Dok onyuto bota mar mere ma pe lokke i nyim kabaka kacel ki lumi-tamme
ducu, ki i nyim ludito ma gin twoni oteka pa kabaka. Abedo ki tekcwiny pien
Rwot Lubaŋana onoŋo tye ka konya dok abito ludito wi kaka pa jo Icrael adwogo
kacel kwedgi.
Ejira 8
Jo ma yam giterogi i opii ma gudwogo i Jerucalem
1Magi aye nyiŋ ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi, ma gudwogo kacel kweda ki
i lobo Babilon, i kare me loc pa kabaka Aritakcec:
2ma gicoyo nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi: Gercom, ki i kin likwayo pa Finekaci.
Daniel, ki i kin likwayo pa Itamar. Katuc, ki i kin likwayo pa Daudi,
3ma i kin likwayo pa Cekania. Jekaria, ki i kin likwayo pa Paroc, kacel jo megi ma
gicoyo nyiŋgi giromo miya acel ki pyerabic.
4Eliekoenai wod pa Jerakia, ki i kin likwayo pa Pakat-moab, kacel ki jone ma
welgi oromo miya aryo.
5Cekania wod pa Jakajiel, ki i kin likwayo pa Jatu, kacel ki jone miya adek.
6Ebed wod pa Yonacan, ki i kin likwayo pa Adin, kacel ki jone pyerabic.
7Jecaya wod pa Atalia, ki i kin likwayo pa Elam, kacel ki jone pyerabiro.
8Jebadia wod pa Mikael, ki i kin likwayo pa Cepatia, kacel ki jone pyeraboro.
9Obadia wod pa Jekiel, ki i kin likwayo pa Joab, kacel ki jone miya aryo ki apar
wiye aboro.
10Celomit wod pa Jocipia, ki i kin likwayo pa Bani, kacel ki jone miya acel ki
pyerabicel.
11Jekaria, wod pa Bebai, ki i kin likwayo pa Bebai, kacel ki jone pyeraryo wiye
aboro.
12Yokanan wod pa Kakatan, ki i kin likwayo pa Ajgad, kacel kijone miya acel ki
apar.
13Elipelet, Jeuel, ki Cemaya, ki i kin likwayo pa Adonikam, jo ma gucito lacen,
kacel ki jo megi pyerabicel.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
795
14Utai ki Jakur, ki i kin likwayo pa Bigvai, kacel ki jo megi pyerabiro.
Ejira onoŋo Lulevi pi tic i ot pa Lubaŋa
15An yam acokogi kacel i dog kulu ma mol dok yo tuŋ Akava, wagony iye wabedo
kunnu pi nino adek. Ka abedo ka ŋiyo dano anoŋo ni ajwagi gitye, ento Lulevi pe
gitye kadi ki acel mo.
16Ka dok acwalo kwena me lwoŋo jo magi, Eliejer, Ariel, Cemaya, Elnatan, Jarib,
Elnatan, Natan, Jekaria, ki Meculam, gin aye ludito wi lwakgi dok alwoŋo Joyarib
ki Elnatan ma yam gin jo ma tye ki niaŋ matut,
17ka acwalogi bot Iddo, ma en ladit ma loyo kabedo me Kacipia, kun atito botgi
lok ducu ma myero gin gucilok bot Iddo ki utmegine ma gin lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa
ma i kabedo me Kacipia, me cwalo botwa dano ma gibitic i ot pa Lubaŋawa.
18Pi Rwot Lubaŋawa ma onoŋo tye ka konyowa omiyo gucwalo botwa Cerebia
dano ma ŋeyo piny, ma en tye i kin likwayo pa Makali ma en lakwar pa Levi dok
lakwar Icrael bene; en obino ki litinone kacel ki utmegine, gin ducu apar wiye
aboro;
19ka dok gucwalo Kacabia ki Jecaya ma gitye i kin likwayo pa Merari, kacel ki
utmegigi, ki litinogi gin ducu pyeraryo.
20Doŋ medo i kom lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa miya aryo ki pyeraryo, ma con Daudi ki
luditone guketo pi tic bot Lulevi, gin ducu gicoyo nyiŋgi woko piny kikore.
Ejira otelo wi lwak i kare me ri kec ki lega
21An dok aciko pi ri kec kunnu, ki i dog kulu Akava, wek wamwolle kenwa i nyim
Lubaŋawa, wek waleg en omiwa wawot maber, wan kikomwa, litinowa, kacel ki
jamiwa ducu.
22Kono nene apenyo kabaka ni omiya lwak askari ki wegi aguragura me
gwokowa i kom lumerokwa ma iyo, lewic onoŋo twero maka; pien onoŋo doŋ
watito bot kabaka woko ni, “Lubaŋawa bibedo ki jo ma giyenye pi konyogi, ki tek
me akemone bedo i kom jo ducu ma gibwoto en woko.”
23Wari kec kun walego Lubaŋawa ni ogwokwa, ci en owinyo legawa bene.
Mot pi ot pa Lubaŋa
24Ka dok aketo ludito magi apar wiye aryo ma giloyo ajwagi: Cerebia, Kacabia, ki
jo apar mukene ma gin utmegigi kacel kwedgi.
25Ci apimo botgi ryal ki jabu ki jami me tic, amiyogi gityer me ot pa Lubaŋawa ma
con kabaka ki lumi-tamme ki luditone ki jo Icrael ducu ma gitye i kare-nu
gumiyo.
26Apimo ryal ma romo talanta miya abicel ki pyerabic, ki jami mukene ma romo
talanta miya acel, ki jabu ma romo talanta miya acel,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
796
27ki atabo jabu pyeraryo ma acel acel peke romo darik alip acel, ki atabo mola
aryo ma giliyo maber ma rom ki jami me jabu.
28Awaco botgi ni, “Wun dano maleŋ i nyim Rwot, ki jami ducu bene leŋ; ryal ki
jabu ducu gin aye mot me gityer ma cwiny dano opwoyo me miyone bot Rwot,
Lubaŋa pa kwarowu.
29Wugwokgi, wunengi maber nio ka wupimogi i nyim ajwagi madito ki Lulevi
kacel ki ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma i Jerucalem, kun wupimo ki i
kicika ma i ot pa Rwot.”
30Ajwagi ki Lulevi gutiŋo ryal ki jabu ma gupimo kacel ki jami mukene ducu,
guterogi guketo i ot pa Lubaŋawa i Jerucalem.
Wot me dok i Jerucalem
31Lacen wacako wot ki i dog kulu Akaya i nino me apar wiye aryo me dwe me
acel, me cito i Jerucalem; Lubaŋawa aye obedo ka konyowa, dok ogwokowa ki i
ciŋ lumerok ki i ciŋ luli bo ma gubuto ka kiyowa iyo.
32Ka wao i Jerucalem, ci wabedo kunnu pi nino adek.
33I nino me aŋwenne, wacito i ot pa Lubaŋawa, wacako pimo iye ryal ki jabu ki
jami tic ducu wamiyogi i ciŋ ajwaka Meremot, ma wod pa Uria. Onoŋo en tye
kacel ki Eleajar wod pa Finekaci, kacel ki Lulevi ma gitye kwedgi, ma gin aye
Jojabad wod pa Yecwa ki Noadia wod pa Binui.
34Gikwano jami woko liweŋ, dok gipimogi bene ka gicoyo pekgi i buk i cawa
meno.
35I kare meno jo ma yam gudwogo ki i opii i rok, gucako tyero gitum awaŋa bot
Lubaŋa pa Icrael. Gutyero twoni dyaŋi apar wiye aryo pi jo Icrael ducu, ki nyogi
romi pyeraboŋwen wiye abicel, ki litino nyogi romi pyerabiro wiye abiro, ki
nyogi dyegi apar wiye aryo pi gitum me bal; meno ducu obedo gitum awaŋa bot
Rwot.
36Gin gumiyo cik pa kabaka bot rwodi ki bot luloc ma gitye i lobo me Loka Kulu;
gin bene gukonyo dano kacel ki ot pa Lubaŋa.
Ejira 9
Ejira owinyo pi nyomo anyira rok ma pe gin Lujudaya
1I kare ma gin meno gityeko timone, ludito gubino bota gutitta ni, “Jo Icrael,
ajwagi, kacel ki Lulevi, pud peya gupokke woko ki i kom jo mukene ma gibedo i
lobo-nu me bedo kengi ki pi tim me kipyedagi jo Kanaan, jo Kit, jo Periji, jo Jebuc,
jo Ammon, jo Moab, jo Ejipt, ki jo Amor.
2Co ma gin Lujudaya gubedo ka nyomo anyiragi mogo gubedo mongi kikomgi ki
mon pa litinogi; omiyo kwa jo maleŋ pa Lubaŋa guribbe woko kacel ki jo mukene
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
797
ma gibedo i lobo-nu ma gin jo maraco. Ludito ma giloyo lwak kacel ki rwodi aye
gubedo lubal madoŋo i lok man.”
3Ka awinyo lok meno, ci ayeco ginarukana woko, ka aputo yer wiya ki i wiya ki
dok aputo yer tika ki i tika bene, acako bedo ma piny orem kweda woko.
4Lacen jo ducu ma komgi omyel ka guwinyo lok pa Lubaŋa pa Icrael, pi ŋayo waŋ
Lubaŋa ma jo ma gudwogo ki i opii gubedo kwede, ci gucako gurre guruma woko
dyere ma abedo ma piny orem kweda woko nio wa i kare ma gityero gitum me
otyeno.
5I kare meno ma gityero gitum me otyeno en aye aa woko kwede ki ka ma onoŋo
abedo ka ri kec iye-ni, ma ginarukana ducu guyec woko, ka arumo coŋa piny ma
ataŋo ciŋa bot Rwot Lubaŋana,
6kun awacce ni, “Ai Lubaŋa, lewic maka mada me ilo wiya ka atye i nyimi, ai
Lubaŋana, pien bal ma wan watimo odurre madit lipim ma kato wiwa woko, ki
alii mewa otorre madit lipim malo oo wa i polo.
7Cakke i kare pa kwarowa nio wa kombeddi wan ki lwakki wabedo ka timo lwak
bal mapol, Doŋ pi balwa, omiyo wan ki lukerwa, ki ajwagiwa yam gimiyowa i Ciŋ
luker ma i lobo pa lurok, ginekowa ki pala lucwan, ki i rok kunnu giyakowa, dok
gitimowa ki tim me lewic, macalo watye i kare man.
8Ento pi kare manok keken Rwot Lubaŋawa, kica omaki i komwa, ci imiyo jo
mukene ki i kinwa gubwot dok gubedo i kabedo maleŋ-ŋi mot maber. Lubaŋawa
iweko wabwot ki i opii dok imiyowa kwo manyen.
9Onoŋo wan opii, ento in Lubaŋawa pe yam iwekowa ata i kare ma watye i opii,
Dok inyuto mar meri ma pe lokke i nyim luker me Percia, omiyo guwekowa
makwo dok guye ni wager ot pa Lubaŋawa odoco, ki yubo jami muballe i oburre,
gumiyo gigwokowa bene maber i Judaya ki i Jerucalem.
10“Kombeddi ai Lubaŋawa, wan dok wawaco aao ki i ŋe lok man mutyeko timme-
ni? Doŋ wabwoto lubo cikki woko ducu,
11gin cik ma yam iciko dok imiyo owok ki i dog luticci ma lunebi, kun iwacci,
‘Lobo ma wubidonyo iye ka camone me bedo mewu matwal-li, en aye lobo pa jo
ma komgi ki keni, pien jo ma gibedo iye gupoŋo lobo meno woko ki tim me
kipyeda nia tuŋcel nio kwede i agik lobo tuŋcel dok gubedo jo ma komgi ki keni.
12 Mumiyo wun pe wumi litinogi gunyom anyirawu, ki litinowu bene pe gunyom
anyiragi, wun pe myero wuyeny kuc ki lonyogi ma gitye kwede; wek wubed jo
matego, ki dok wucam gin maber ma i lobo, ma wubiweko bene bot litinowu me
bedo ginaleyagi matwal.’
13Lacen i ŋe lok magi ducu ma opoto i komwa pi balwa ma watimogi ki pi alii
madit ma watiŋo, kadi bed in, ai Lubaŋawa ineno maber, ci doŋ iketo can i
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
798
komwa manok ma pe oporo lwak bal ma watimo, dok ikonyowa omiyo wabwot
watye makwo-ni.
14Wan dok pud wabituro cikki aye kun wamedde ki nyom i kinwa ki jo ma gitiyo
bal kipyeda-ni? Ka watimo meno, kiniga pe bimaki i komwa matek nio ka
Ityekowa ducu, ma dano mo acel i kinwa pe bibwot?
15Ai Rwot Lubaŋa pa Icrael, in iporre, pien imiyo wabwot ki i lak to. Nen, watuco
bal aliiwa boti, pe watye ki kit twero mo me cuŋ i nyimi pi bal man.”
Ejira 10
Yub me giko nyom i kin lurok ki jo Icrael
1I kare ma Ejira tye i ot ka lega kun tuco bal, kun kok, poto kwede piny, dok Lwak
jo Icrael mapol, co, mon ki litinogi gucokke gukok matek twatwal.
2Cutcut Cekania wod pa Jekiel, ma i kin likwayo pa Elam, owaco bot Ejira ni,
“Waŋayo waŋ Lubaŋawa woko pi nyomo mon ma gin lurok ma gitye i lobo-ni,
ento kadi bed kumeno jo Icrael pud gitye ki gen i kom Lubaŋa kadi lok meno
otimme.
3Wan koŋ doŋ waketu gicikke ki Lubaŋawa me ryemo mon magi woko ducu
kacel ki litinogi. Wabitiyo gin ma in kacel ki jo mukene ma giworo cik pa
Lubaŋawa wutito botwa ni wati; wabitiyo gin ducu ma cik pa Lubaŋa mito.
4In ia malo, pien man ticci, wan bene wacuŋ i ŋeyi; myero ibed tek dok itim
kumeno.”
5Ka Ejira oa malo ci omiyo lutel pa ajwagi ki pa Lulevi ki pa jo Icrael ducu
gukwoŋo kwoŋ ni gibitiyo gin ma Cekania doŋ oyubo ni giti. Kit meno gucako
kwoŋo kwoŋ.
6Ejira oa woko ki i nyim ot pa Lubaŋa, odonyo i kicika pa Yekokanan wod pa
Eliacib, obuto kunnu nino acel, kun pe camo gin mo kadi wa mato pii bene. Dok
obedo ka kumo pi jo ma gua ki i opii ma guŋayo waŋ Lubaŋa woko.
7Ka doŋ gitito lok oromo i lobo Juda ki Jerucalem ki bot jo ducu ma cen gudwogo
ki i opii ni gin ducu myero gucokke i Jerucalem.
8Giciko ni ka dano mo pe obino i kin nino adek-ki, ludito ma giloyo lwak ki
ludoŋo guwacci jamine ducu myero giyak gidyer ki Lubaŋa, ki en kikome bene
myero giryeme oa woko ki i kin lwak ma gudwogo ki i opii.
9Cutcut jo Juda ki jo Benjamin ducu gucokke i Jerucalem i kin nino adek-ki, i nino
dwe pyeraryo me dwe me aboŋwen, Lwak ducu gubedo i dyekal ma i nyim ot pa
Lubaŋa. Onoŋo kot obedo ka cwer matek; pi lok man ma pire tek ki pi ŋico, omiyo
kom dano acel acel obedo ka myel amyela.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
799
10Ajwaka Ejira oa Ocuŋ owaco bot lwak ni, “Wun wuturo cik pa Lubaŋa omiyo
wukelo alit wumedo i kom bal alii pa jo Icrael pi nyomo mon ma gin lurok.
11Wutuc balwu kombeddi i nyim Rwot Lubaŋa pa kwarowu, kun wutiyo gin ma
en mito; dok myero wupokke woko pat ki i kom jo ma gibedo i lobo-ni, wuryem
monwu ma gin lurok-ki bene woko.”
12Lwak ducu gugamo ki dwan maloŋo ni, “Obed kit meno, wabitiyo gin ducu ma
doŋ iwaco-ni.”
13Gin gumedde guwacce ni, “Lwak tye dwoŋ mada dok bene obedo kare ma kot
cwer iye madwoŋ; pe watwero cuŋ i dyekal ata kit man. Man pe gin ma gitwero
tiyo nino acel nyo aryo keken, pien wan watyeko timo bal madit twatwal i lok
man.
14Wek ludito ma giloyowa aye gucuŋ pi nyiŋ lwak ducu ma gucokke; wek gicik jo
ducu ma gibedo i gaŋiwa ma gunyomo mon ma gin lurok gubin i nino mo ma
giciko, kacel ki ludoŋo ma loyogi ki luŋolkop ma i gaŋi ducu, nio waŋ ma
gikwanyo kiniga pa Lubaŋa mager ki i komwa pi lok man.”
15Ŋat mo onoŋo pe okwero yub man, ento kono Yonacan wod pa Acakel ki
Jakijeya wod pa Tikva keken aye gukwero, dok Meculam ki Cabetai ma gin Lulevi
bene gukonyo korgi iye.
16Jo ma gudwogo ki i opii gutimo kit meno. Ajwaka Ejira oyero dano, ludito ma
loyo dog odi pa kwarogi, dano acel acel ma giyero en ocoyo nyiŋe woko piny, kun
lubo dog odi pa kwarogi. I kom nino dwe acel me dwe me apar en aye gubedo iye
piny ka neno lok meno;
17i nino dwe acel me dwe me acel onoŋo doŋ gutyeko yenyo lok i kom co ducu ma
yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok.
18Magi aye nyiŋ co ma yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok ma gitye i kin likwayo pa
ajwagi, gin aye Maceya, Eliejer, Jarib, ki Gedalia, ma gitye i kin likwayo pa Yecwa
wod pa Jojadak kacel ki utmegine.
19Gin gucikke pigi kengi me ryemo mongi woko, ki dok gutyero gitum pi tiŋo
aliigi ma obedo nyok romo ma gukwanyo ki i kom romigi pi tino aliigi.
20Ki i kin likwayo pa Imer gin aye Kanani ki Jebadia.
21Ki i kin likwayo pa Karim: gin aye Maceya, Elija, Cemaya, Jekiel, ki Ujia.
22Ki i kin likwayo pa Packur gin aye Elioenai, Maceya, Icmael, Natanel, ki Elaca.
23Jo ma i kin likwayo pa Lulevi: gin aye Jojabad, Cimei, Kelaya ma gilwoŋo bene
ni, Kelita, ki Petakia, Juda, ki Eliejer.
24Ki i dul pa luwer gin aye Eliacib. Ki i dul pa lugwokdoggola gin aye Calum,
Telem, ki Uri.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
800
25Ki i kom likwayo pa jo Icrael: Ki i kin likwayo pa Paroc gin aye Ramia, Ijia,
Malkija, Mijamin, Eleajar, Kacabia, ki Benaya.
26Ki i kin likwayo pa Elam gin aye Matania, Jekaria, Jekiel, Abdi, Jeremot, ki Elija.
27Ki i kin likwayo pa Jatu gin aye Elioenai, Eliacib, Matania, Jeremot, Jabad, ki
Ajija.
28Ki i kin likwayo pa. Bebai gin aye Yekokanan, Anania, Jabai, ki Atlai.
29Ki i kin likwayo pa Bani gin aye Meculam, Maluk, Adaya, Jacub, Ceal, ki Jeremot.
30Ki i kin likwayo pa Pakatmoab: gin aye Adna, Celal, Benaya, Maceya, Matania,
Bejalel, Binui, ki Manace.
31Ki i kin likwayo pa Karim gin aye Eliejer, Icija, Malkija, Cemaya, Cimeon.
32Benjamin, Maluk, ki Cemaria.
33Ki i kin likwayo pa Kacum gin aye Matenai, Matata, Jabad, Elipelet, Jeremai,
Manace, ki Cimei.
34Ki i kin likwayo pa Bani gin aye Madai, Amram, Uel,
35Benaya, Bedeya, Keluki,
36Vania, Meremot, Eliacib,
37Matania, Matenai, ki Jacu.
38Ki i kin likwayo pa Binui gin aye Cimei,
39Celemia, Natan, Adaya,
40Maknadebai, Cacai, Carai,
41Ajarel, Celemia, Cemaria,
42Calum, Amaria, ki Yucepu.
43Ki i kin likwayo pa Nebo gin aye Jeyel, Matitia, Jabad, Jebina, Jadai, Joel, ki
Benaya.
44Jo magi ducu onoŋo yam gunyomo mon ma gin lurok, ci guryemogi woko kacel
ki litinogi ducu.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
801
Nekemia
Nekemia 1
Nekemia olego pi Jerucalem
1Man lok pa Nekemia wod pa Kakalia. I dwe me Kiclev, i mwaka me pyeraryo me
loc pa kabaka Aritakcec, an Nekemia onoŋo atye i gaŋ madit me Cuca,
2ci Kanani, ma ŋat acel ma i kom utmegina, obino bota kacel ki jo mogo ma gua ki
i Juda. An apenyogi lok i kom Jerucalem ki i kom jo ma gubwot, ma yam giterogi i
opii ci gudok cen kunnu.
3Gm guwacca ni, “Jo ma gitye i lobowa kunnu ma gubwot ma yam giterogi i opii
gitye ki peko madit ma jo mukene cayogi bene; ki dogcel me Jerucalem gimuko
opoto woko piny, dok dog gaŋŋe ducu giwaŋo woko ki mac.”
4Ka awinyo lok meno ducu, ci abedo piny akok matek. Abedo ka kumo pi nino
mapol; kun ari kec ma pe acamo cam ento abedo ka lego Lubaŋa me polo.
5Alego kun awacci, “Ai Rwot Lubaŋa me polo, in idit, dok wabedo ki lworo i
nyimi. In Lubaŋa me ada dok igwoko gicikkeni ki mar meri ma pe lokke pi jo ma
gimari dok ma gilubo cik meri.
6Rwot, nen an, dok iwiny legana, ma atye ka legone dyeceŋ ki dyewor pi luticci,
lwak me Icrael. Atuco balwa i nyimi ni, wan jo Icrael, watyeko timo bal i nyimi.
Iyo, an ki jo me doggola pa kwara watimo bal.
7Wan watimo gin marac mada nyimi, pe wabedo ka tiyo gin ma iciko, pe walubo
cik meri ma yam imiyo botwa kun wok ki bot laticci Moses.
8 Po i kom lok ma yam iciko ki laticci Moses, kun iwacci, ‘Ka pe wulubo cikka; ci
abikeyowu woko ata i kin lurok;
9 ento ka wulokke wudwogo bota kun wulubo cikka, kadi bed gikeyowu giketowu
woko ata nio wa i agikki piny, an abicokowu adwokowu cen wa i kabedo ma doŋ
atyeko yerone pi nyiŋa wek wuwora iye.’
10Rwot, jo man gin luticci, dok gin lwakki ma yam ilarogi ki tweroni madwoŋ dok
ki tekki.
11Ai Rwot, kombeddi winy legana ki lega pa luticci mukene-gu ma gitye ki cwiny
me woro in, Mina gum tin, imi kica omak kabaka i koma.”
Nekemia ocito Jerucalem
I kare meno onoŋo an abedo ladit ma loyo lok i kom kono yino ma kabaka mato.
Nekemia 2
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
802
1I dwe me Nican, i mwaka me pyeraryo meloc pa kabaka Aritak cec, ma onoŋo
kabaka tye ka cam, akwanyo koŋo vino atero bote. Onoŋo yam peya abedo ki
cwercwiny mo i nyime.
2Kabaka ocako penya ni, “Piŋo waŋi nen ki can, inen calo komi yot do? Man can
mo aye tye i cwinyi.” Cutcut lworo ocako maka woko marac.
3 Ci agamo dog kabaka ni, “Kabaka obed kwo nakanaka! Waŋa pe twero nen ki
can piŋo, ma kun kono gaŋ kal ka ma giyiko iye kwarowa ducu doŋ odoko obur,
ma dog gaŋŋe giwaŋo woko liweŋ ki mac?”
4Kabaka dok openya ni, “Doŋ imito gin aŋo kono?” Cutcut alego Lubaŋa me polo.
5Ka doŋ agamo dog kabaka ni, “Ka ce ineno ni ber, laditta kabaka, ka itwero ye
legana, wek acit i lobo me Juda i gaŋ kal ka ma kwarowa giyikogi iye, wek aciyub
gaŋ meno odoco.”
6Kabaka odokka iye ma onoŋo daker mere obedo ka ŋete, owacci, “Wot meno
biteri kare ma rom mene, dok ibidwogo awene?” Ci atitte bene nino ma abia iye
kikome; kabaka oye pi citona kunnu.
7Ka dok awaco bot kabaka ni, “Ka ce ineno ni ber, myero gico waraga ci imiya
ater bot luloc ma i lobo ma tye Loka Kulu, ma tito botgi ni myero guye akat acit i
Juda.
8Dok apenyo kabaka bene ni myero oco waraga omiya ater bot Acap, ma lagwok
buŋa pa kabaka, wek omiya yadi wek giti ki bao pi dogcel me gogo ma gwoko ot
pa Lubaŋa, ki pi cel ma orumo gaŋ, ki pi ot ma an abibedo iye.” Kabaka oye ci
omiya gin ducu ma alege pire, pien Lubaŋa onoŋo tye ka konya.
9Kabaka ocwalo an kacel ki ludito me mony ki dul pa wegi aguragura, ci acito i
lobo ma tye Loka Kulu tuŋ potoceŋ, ci amiyo waraga pa kabaka bot luloc me lobo.
10Ento Canbalat ma jo Bet-koron, ki Tobia ma en jo Ammon, ka guwinyo lok man,
ci gubedo ki keco i cwinygi matek pien guŋeyo ni dano mo obino pi konyo kor jo
Icrael.
Nekemia ocuko cwiny lwak me gero cel odoco
11Acito i Jerucalem ci ari kunnu pi nino adek,
12ma pe atito bot ŋat mo tam ma Lubaŋa otyeko keto i cwinya ma myero ati
kwede pi Jerucalem. Cutcut i cwiny dyewor aa malo wacako wot kacel ki lurema
mogo. Pe onoŋo watye ki lee mo mukene kono kana ma abedo i wiye-ni keken.
13Akato acito woko i dyewor kun awok i dogcel me cito i nota nio kwede i waŋ It
pa Too ki i dogcel ma cito wi odur, ci acako ŋiyo cel me Jerucalem ducu ma yam
gimuko opoto woko piny, kacel ki dogcel ducu ma yam giwaŋo woko liweŋ ki
mac-ci.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
803
14Ka dok alokke acito i Dogcel me Wan It ki i Kut pa Kabaka. Kana ma abedo i
wiye-ni onoŋo pe twero noŋo yo mo ma myero ekat ki iye.
15Kit meno aa i dyewor acito ka ŋiyo cel kun awok ki i nota; ka adok cen i gaŋ ki i
dogcel ma ci to i nota, ki yo ma acito kwede.
16Pe tye ŋat mo i kin ludito ma giloyo lwak ma oŋeyo ka ma acito iye ki gin ma
abedo ka tiyone. Onoŋo peya atito gin mo bot Lujudaya, ajwagi, ludito ma giloyo
lwak ducu, kadi ki bot jo mukene ma onoŋo myero guti tic meno.
17Ka doŋ awaco botgi ni, “Wunen kit ayela ma watye kwede kombeddi, wunen
Jerucalem doŋ odoko obur, wa dog celle ducu giwaŋo woko. Wubin wacaku gero
cel me Jerucalem odoco, wek lewic pe obed ka makowa.”
18Ka dok atitogi kit macalo Lubaŋa obedo kweda dok okonya maber, kacel ki lok
ducu ma cen kabaka owacca. Gin gugamo ni, “Wacaku gerone odoco.” Ci guyubbe
me cako tic cut, gujiŋo badgi me tiyo tic maber.
19Ento ka Canbalat ma jo Bet-koron, Tobia ma latic, ma jo Ammon, ki Gecem ma
Laarab guwinyo pi gin ma watye ka tiyone, gucako nywarowa kun gicayowa bene
ma giwacci, “Man gin aŋo ma wutye ka tiyone-rii? Wun wumito jemo i kom
kabaka?”
20An adok iye botgi ni, “Lubaŋa me polo aye bikonyowa, wan luticce, wabicako
gedo. Ento pe tye dul mo ma gipoko ki wun i Jerucalem, kadi wa twero mo,
nyiŋwu bene pe gipo pire.”
Nekemia 3
Kit ma gipoko kwede cel me gag i kin lutic
1Eliacib ma ajwaka madit, ki ajwagi ma gin utmegine, gugero Dogcel me Romo,
Gukwero wek obed maleŋ dok guketo kikane. Gugero nio wa i lubele me Miya ki
Lubele ma gilwoŋo Kananel.
2Jo Jeriko gugero dul mukene ma cok kwede ki Jakur wod pa Imri ogero bene dul
ma lubo enno.
3Likwayo pa Acena gugero dogcel me Rec; guriyo baone ka guketo kikane, bolti,
ki rii me doggola me lorone.
4Dano ma olubogi obedo Meremot wod pa Uria, ma wod pa Kakoj, ma oyubo dul
ma i ŋete. Dano ma oyubo dul ma i ŋete obedo Meculam wod pa Berekia ma wod
pa Mecejabel. Dano mukene ma oyu bo dul ma i ŋete obedo Jadok wod pa Baana.
5Jo ma guyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete malubo gin aye jo Tekoa, ento luditogi me
awora pe guye tiyo tic mapek ma jo ma loyogi gumiyogi.
6Ka dok Joyada wod pa Pacea, ki Meculam wod pa Beeodeya guyubo Dogcel
Macon: guriyo baone ka guketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
804
7Jo ma guyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete obedo Melatia jo Gibeon, ki Jadon jo
Meronot kacel ki jo ma i gaŋi me Gibeon ki Mijpa, ma gitye i te loc pa laloc me
lobo ma Loka Kulu.
8Ujiel wod pa Karaya ma en latet jabu bene oyubo dul mukene ma i ŋete. Ŋat
mukene ma olube obedo Anarua ma layub moo ma ŋwece kur, oyubo dul
mukene; ci guroco Jerucalem odwogo kakare nio kwede wa i kom cel malacce.
9Ŋat mukene ma olubogi en aye Repaya wod pa Kur, ma en loyo nucu lobo ma
orumo Jerucalem, en bene oyu bo dul nukene.
10Ŋat mukene ma olubo obedo Jedaya wod pa Karumap, en oyubo mere dul ma
okemo ode; ki ŋat ma olube obedo Katuc wod pa Kacabneya, en oyubo dul
mukene.
11Ki Malkija wod pa Karim ki Kacub wod pa Pakat-moab guyubo dul mukene ki
cel Gogo me Keno me tedo mugati ducu.
12Ŋat mukene ma olubo obedo Calum wod pa Kalokeci, ma loyo nucu lobo ma
orumo Jerucalem, en oyu bo dul mukene ki anyirane bene gukonye.
13Kanun ki jo ma gibedo i Janoa guyubo dogcel ma cito i nota. Guroco cel odok
kakare ka guketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone, ka guyubo cel gogo
ma borre romo yadi miya abic, nio kwede wa i dogcel ma cito wi odur.
14Malkija wod pa Recab, ma laloc me lobo ma orumo Bet-akerem, oyubo dogcel
ma cito wi odur; ogero odoco ka oketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me
lorone ducu.
15Calum wod pa Kolkoje, laloc me lobo Mijpa, oyubo Dogcel me Waŋ It; ogero
odoco dok oumo wiye ka oketo kikane, ki bolti ki rii me doggola me lorone ducu;
ka dok en ogero cel orumo Kut Cela ma cok ki po to pa kabaka, nio kwede wa i
rwom ma lor piny nia ki i gaŋ kal pa Daudi.
16Ŋat ma olubo en obedo Nekemia wod pa Ajbuk, ma laloc me nucu lobo Bet-jur;
en oyubo ka ma okemme ki Lyel pa Daudi, ma cok ki kut ma gikwinyo akwinya ki
ciŋ, yo tuŋ odi pa twoni oteka lweny.
Lulevi ma gubedo ka tiyo tic i kom cel
17Jo ma olubo en obedo Lulevi magi: Rekum wod pa Bani, ki ŋat ma olube obedo
Kacabia, ma laloc me nucu lobo ma orumo Keila; guyubo pi nyiŋ lobone.
18Lacen utmegigi bene guyubo, gin ene: Bavai wod pa Kenadad, ma laloc me nucu
lobo ma orumo Keila.
19Ŋat ma lubo en obedo Ejer wod pa Yecwa, ma laloc me Mijpa; en oyubo dulle
me aryone mukene mukemme ki ot kano jami lweny me mony ma i twok cel.
20Dano ma olubo en obedo Baruk wod pa Jabai; en oyubo dulle mukene nia ki i
twokke ma yo tuŋ doggola me ot pa Eliacib ajwaka madit.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
805
21Dano ma olubo en obedo Meremot wod pa Uria, ma wod pa Kakoj; oyubo dul ot
mukene nia ki i doggola me ot pa Eliacib nio wa i agikki ot.
Ajwagi ma gutiyo tic i kom cel
22Jo ma gulube obedo ajwagi, jo ma gibedo i lobo bar; guyubo dul mukene.
23Jo ma olubogi obedo Benjamin ki Kacub; guyubo dul mukemo ot megi. Ŋat ma
olubogi obedo Ajaria wod pa Maceya, ma wod pa Anania ma oyubo mere ki yo
tuŋ ode kikome.
24Dano ma olubo en obedo Binui wod pa Kenadad; en oyubo dul mukene, nia ki i
kom ot pa Ajaria nio kwede i twok cel
25nio kwede ka ma ogonne. Ka Palal wod pa Ujai oyu bo gulle ma i iye, kacel ki cel
ma ocudo malo mukemo ot pa kabaka ma i dyekal pa: lukur-piny, Dano ma olubo
en obedo Pedaya wod pa Paroc.
26Lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ma gibedo i kom Opel, guyubo dulle mu kene mukemo
Dogcel me Pii tuŋ wokceŋ, mukemo dul cel ma ocudo malo
Lugedo mukene
27Jo ma gulubo en obedo jo Tekoa; guyubo dul mukene mukemo cel gogo madit
ma wiye ocudo malo likuŋ nio kwede wa i kom cel ma cok ki Opel.
28Ajwagi guyubo ka wi Dogcel me Aguragura, kun ŋat acel acel yu bo mukemo
tuŋ ode kikome.
29Ŋat ma olubogi obedo Jadok wod pa Imer ma oyubo mere ka ma okemo ode
kikome. Ŋat ma olubo en obedo Cemaya wod pa Cekania, ma lagwok dogcel ma
tuŋ wokceŋ: en oyubo bene dul mu kene.
30Jo ma gulube obedo Anania wod pa Celemia, ki Kanun wod pa Jalap me abicelle;
guyubo dul mukene, ŋat ma olubo en obedo Meculam wod pa Berekia ma oyubo
ka ma okemo kicikane.
31Ŋat mulubo en obedo Malkija, ŋat acel i kom lutet jabu; en oyubo dul mu kene
nia ki i ot pa lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa ki pa lucat-wil, ma okemo dogcel me coyo nyiŋ jo
nio kwede wa i kicika ma malo ma i twoke.
32I kin kicika ma malo ma i twoke ki Dogcel me Romo, jo ma giliyo jabu, ki
lucatwil aye guyubo dul mukene.
Nekemia 4
Lurok gutemo balo tic pa Nekemia
1I kare-nu ka Canbalat owinyo ni wan Lujudaya watye ka gero cel me Jerucalem
odoco, ci kiniga ki akemo madwoŋ omake, ocako cayowa.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
806
2Ki kinigane-ni en ocako nywarowa ki i nyim luwote ki i nyim mony me Camaria
kun waco ni, “Man Lujudaya ma gigoro-ni gitye ka tiyo aŋo kaa? Gitamo ni
gitwero gero gaŋ man odoco? Gibityero gitum mo? Gitwero tyeko tic man i nino
acel keken? Gitwero payo godi me gedo ducu ki i kom godi ma gudurre i wi odur
yugi ma giwaŋo-ni?”
3Tobia ma Laammon onoŋo ocun ka ŋete, owacci, “Kit cel aŋo ma gin twero
gerone? Kadi too mamwa-ni ka owoto ki i wiye, ci muko cel gotgi-ni reto woko
piny!”
4Ai Lubaŋawa, winy ka gicayowa ba; lok cac ma gicayo ki wan odok i wigi, imi
giyak jamigi woko ducu dok gimakgi gitergi i opii i lobo pa lurok.
5Pe iwek bal megi, dok wii pe myero owil i kom balgi, pien guyetowa wan ma
watye ka gedo-ni.
6Kit meno wan wamedde ki gero cel; ci watyeko gero cel woko oyotoyot oo wa
malo i nucu me borre ma yam con ca, Man otimme pien lwak onoŋo gitye ki
cwiny me tic kikome.
7Ento i kare ma Canbalat ki Tobia ki jo Arab, jo Ammon ki jo Acidod guwinyo ni
watye ka wot anyim ki tic me yubo cel me Jerucalem ki dok ni wacako culo ka ma
twolone woko ducu, ci kiniga omakogi matek.
8Ci gucokke kacel ka piro lok me cito ka lweny i kom Jerucalem, ki kelo
anyobanyoba bot dano ma gitye kunnu.
9Ento wan wamedde ki lego Lubaŋawa, dok waketo co me kuro piny me
gwokowa dyeceŋ ki dyewor ki i komgi.
10Ento jo Juda gubedo ka wacci, “Kero kom luywek godi doŋ otum woko; dok yugi
bene odurre iye lipim; pe doŋ watwero gero cel.”
11Lukworwa gutamo ni wan pe wabitwero nenogi dok pe wabitwero ŋeyo gin ma
tye ka timme, nio ka gibio wa botwa kany, ci ginekowa dok gigiko ticwa woko.
12Lujudaya ma gibedo i kin lumerokwa gubedo ka bino botwa kare ki kare kun
gitito botwa tyen ma romo apar kulu yub ma lumerokwa gitye kwede i komwa;
kun gibino ma gia ki i kabedo ducu ka ma gibedo iye.
13Oyotoyot acako poko jami lweny magi bot lwak, pala lucwan, toŋi ki atum, ci
aketogi gubedo i kabedo mo ma i ŋe cel kun lubo doggolagi, ka ma pud odoŋ
twolo.
14Aneno gin ma tye ka timme, ci aa malo awaco bot ludito ma gin lutel wic, ki
ludito ma giloyo lwak, ki bot lwak ducu ni, “Pe wubed ki lworo mo i kom
lukworwa. Wupo ni Rwot dit dok gilworo; pienno wun wulweny matek pi jo me
lobowu, pi litinowu, pi monwu, ki pi pacowu.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
807
15Ka lumerokwa guwinyo ni lok me yubgi otyeko winnye botwa ci guniaŋ ni
Lubaŋa oturo yubgi woko, ci wan ducu wacako dok cen ka tic i kom cel, dano acel
acel odok i dog ticce.
16Cakke i kare meno nucu pa lwakka gubedo ka gedo, ki nucugi mukene gumako
toŋi, kwodi, ki atum-gu, ka guruko koti me nyonyo pi lweny, kun ludoŋo pa lwak
gucwako jo me ot pa Juda ducu,
17ma onoŋo gitye ka gero cel odoco. Jo ma gin lutiŋ yec bene gabedo ka tic kit
man, dano acel acel tiŋo jami ma mitte pi gedo ki ciŋe acel, ki jami lwennye noŋo
omako i ciŋe tuŋ cel.
18Ka dok dano acel acel i kinjo ma gin lugedo bedo ki pala lucwanne ma otweyo
woko i pyere kun noŋo tye kwede ka gedo. Dano ma en lakut tum onoŋo bedo
mere cok ka ŋeta.
19Atito ki rwodi kacel ki ludito ma giloyo lwak i dog tic ni, “Tic doŋ onya odoko
dwoŋ twatwal, omiyo kinwa odon malac ki kinwa opokke woko ki i kom cel, kin
dano odoko bor ki lawote.
20I kabedo ma wuwinyo tum okok iye, myero wucokke botwa kunnu. Lubaŋawa
bilweny piwa.”
21Kit meno nino ducu cakke okogweno nio i dyewor ka lakalatwe otuc wabedo ka
tic i kom cel, ma noŋo nucu pa lwakwa mukene gucuŋ ki toŋi i ciŋgi gikuro piny.
22An dok awaco ki lwak i kare-nu ni, “Wek dano acel acel ki laticce gudoŋ gubut i
Jerucalem, ci gubed ka kuro piny piwa i dyewor ka dok guti tic i dyeceŋ.”
23Pe tye dano mo i kinwa, kadi an kikoma nyo utmegina nyo lukur-piny ma
gulubo kora ma olunyo boŋŋine. Dano acel acel obedo ki jami lwennye i ciŋe.
Nekemia 5
Nekemia ojuko culo lim me magoba woko
1Lacen jo mapol, co kacel ki mongi, gucako ŋur i kom Lujudaya wadigi.
2Jo mogo guwacci, “Wan kacel ki litino awobewa ki anyirawa doŋ wadoko dwoŋ;
wamito kal me acama wek wabed kwo.”
3Jo mukene bene guwacci, “Wan wajeŋo pottiwa, potti olokwa, kacel ki odiwa
ducu, wek wanoŋ kal wacam, pien kec tye marac.”
4Dok jo mukene bene guwacci, “Wan doŋ watyeko deno lim me culo mucoro pa
kabaka kun wajeŋo pottiwa ki potti olokwa pire.
5Wan mono pe wamito jami ma rom aroma ki jami ma Lujudaya wadiwa gimito?
Litinowa kono pe giber ma rom ki litinogi? Ento watye ka miyo litinowa gibedo
opii. Doŋ watyeko cato anyirawa mukene woko macalo opii. Wan pe watye ki
twer mo, pien doŋ gityeko kwanyo pottiwa ki potti olokwa woko ducu ki botwa.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
808
6I kare ma an Nekemia awinyo koko megi kacel ki lok pa lwak,
7 kiniga omaka matek, abedo ka lwodo lok ki i cwinya kekena, acako laro lok ki
rwodi kacel ki ludito ma giloyo lobo, kun awaccigi ni, “Wun wutye ka noŋo
magoba i kom omegiwu.” Alwoŋo cokke madit me neno lok i komgi,
8kun awaco botgi ni, “Wabedo ka koko omegiwa ma gin Lujudaya ki lim kit
macalo watwero, ma yam gicatogi woko bot lurok. Ento wun wutye ka cato
omegiwu kikome ni wan Lujudaya wadigi aye dok wawilgi!” Ludito guliŋ aliŋa
litik, ma pe gitwero noŋo lok mo ma myero guwaci.
9Ka dok awaccigi ni, “Gin ma wutye ka tiyone-ni pe ber. Wun pe myero wulwor
Lubaŋawa i timwu ducu? Ka pe wulworo Lubaŋawa, ci miyo lumerokwa
gicayowa.
10Ento an kacel ki utmegina ki luticca ducu wamiyo gideno lim ki kai ki botwa.
Wan waweku tam ducu me limo magoba-ni obedi.
11Tin wudwok pottigi odok i ciŋgi, potti olokgi, potti jeitunigi kacel ki odigi ducu,
Dok wuŋol banya ma gitye kwede botwu macalo me lim ryalgi, kai, kono vino,
nyo moogu ma wubedo ka jogone ki botgi-ni.”
12Ludito gugamo ni. “Wan wabitiyo kit ma iwaco-ni, wabidwoko jami magi ducu
botgi, dok pe wabipenyogi ni gucul banyawa.” Alwoŋo ajwagi, ci amiyo ludito
gukwoŋo kwoŋ ma moko ni gibigwoko cikkegi.
13Acako yeŋo kitambara ki i pyera kun adoŋo taca ma awacci, “Man aye kit ma
Lubaŋa biyeŋo kwede dano mo ma i kinwu ma pe bicobo kwoŋ kun gwoko cikke.
Ci Lubaŋa biyeŋo odiwu ki jami ducu ma wutye kwede, biweko wudoŋ noŋo
laboŋo gin mo.” Jo ducu ma onoŋo gitye i cokke gugamo ni, “Amen” dok gupako
Rwot. Lwak gutiyo kit macalo gucikke kwede.
14Pi mwaka apar wiye aryo ma onoŋo an laloc me lobo Juda, cakke i mwaka me
pyeraryo nio kwede i mwaka pyeradek wiye aryo me loc pa kabaka Aritakcec, pe
tye utmegina mo kadi ki an mucamo kit cam ma giyubo ni gimi bota macalo laloc
me lobo.
15Luloc ma yam gubedo i loc ma gutelo nyima guketo peko madwoŋ i kom lwak
pi jogo lim me ryal pyeraŋwen, ki koŋo vino, ki cam. Luticgi guloko lwak gudoko
opiigi, guketo peko madwoŋ bene i kom lwak. Ento an pe atimo kumeno, pien an
abedo ka lworo Lubaŋa.
16An aketo tekona ducu ka tero cel meno odoco, pe alimo dullobo mo me bedona.
Dok luticca ducu gucokke kunnu gubedo megi ka tiyo tic me gedo.
17Dok onoŋo atye ki jo ma romo miya acel ki pyerabic, ma gin Lujudaya ki ludito
ma loyo lwak, ma wabedo kwedgi dok ma wacamo kwedgi cam kacel i wi me
jana, medo i kom jo ma gubino bota ma gua ki i kin lurok ma gurumowa.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
809
18Nino acel acel onoŋo aneko twon acel, ki romi mabeco abicel, ki dok gineko
gweni mapol pira kit meno dok pi nino apar apar aonyo koŋo vino manyen. Ento
i kom jami magi ducu ma atiyo pe abedo ki miti mo ni gim iya dul cam mo ma
giciko ni laloc myero onoŋ, pien onoŋo lwak doŋ gitye ki peko madwoŋ atika ma
obwoyo komgi woko.
19Alegi, ai Lubaŋana, po pi gin ducu ma atiyo pi lwak man, wek anoŋ pwoc pire.
Nekemia 6
Piro lok i kom Nekemia
1Ka Canbalat, Tobia, Gecem, kacel ki jo ducu ma gin lukworwa guwinyo ni atyeko
gero cel woko, dok ni ka mo ma omuk ma twolone doŋ pe, i kare meno onoŋo
pud peya aketo rii me doggola me loro dog gaŋ ducu,
2ci Canbalat ki Gecem gucwalo lok bota, kun giwacci, “Bin wek wabed kacel i gaŋ
mo ma i bar me Ono.” Ento gin onoŋo gimito timma marac.
3An acwalo kwena botgi kun awaccigi ni, “An atye ka tiyo tic mo ma pire dit
mada, pe atwero bino kunnu ka rwatte kwedwu. Pe atwero weko tic man cuŋ pi
bino me nenowu keken.”
4Gubedo ka cwalo kwena bota ma rom kit meno tyen aŋwen kulu, an bene
adwoko botgi lagam lakite acel.
5Dok Canbalat ocwalo laticce bota ki waraga i ciŋe ma pe gimwono doge lakite
acel-lu pi tyen me abicce.
6Lok ma gicoyo iye tye kit man ni, “Gecem otitta ni cwinyo lok tye ka wot i kin
lwak ma gicok kwedwa ni meno, in kacel ki lwak pa Lujudaya wumito jemo;
meno aye gin mumiyo wutye ka gero cel odoco-ni. Lok man tito bene ni in ikette
keni me bedo kabakagi.
7Dok bene lok man otittiwa ni in doŋ ityeko keto lunebi me tuco lok atyer i
Jerucalem i komi ni, ‘Kabaka doŋ tye i Juda.’ Lok meno doŋ gibitito bot kabaka,
Pienno ber ibin warib tam wayub lokke kacel kwedi.”
8An dok adwoko lok bote, kun awacce ni, “Pe tye gin mo macalo meno ma
otimme, lok meno wun wunwaro ki wiwu.”
9Onoŋogutemme me burowa wek wagik tic, kun gitamo ni, “Komgi bidoko nyap i
tic, ci bimiyo tic doŋ pe bitine.” Ento kombeddi, ai Lubaŋa, doŋ imiya abed matek.
10Ka acito wa i ot pa Cemaya wod pa Delaya, ma wod pa Meketabel, ma pe twero
weko ode, ci cut an acito ka Lime. En owacca ni, “Wek wacit kwedi kacel i kabedo
maleŋ ma i ot pa Lubaŋa, ci walor doggola me ot pa Lubaŋa woko; pien gin bibino
ka neki woko. I dyewor mo keken gibibino gineki woko.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
810
11Ento an agamo doge ni, “An pe acal ki dano ma riŋo lawote ci kanne woko. In
itamo ni abitemo laro kwana ki kanne i ot pa Lubaŋa? Pe atwero cito.”
12Ka abedo ka tamo lok man, lacen, ci aniaŋ atir ni Lubaŋa onoŋo pe oloko kwede,
ento onoŋo Tobia ki Canbalat aye kara guwile ki lim wek otit lok macalo meno
me bito an.
13Guwile ki lim wek obur an abed ki lworo apot i bal, wek gicak balo nyiŋa kun
gicaya kwede-gu.
14Ai Lubaŋana, po i kom Tobia ki Canbalat, pi gin ma gubedo ka timone i koma, ci
iket can i komgi. Dok ipo i kom lanebi ma dako ma nyiŋe Noadia kacel ki lwak
lunebi mukene ducu ma yam gutemo buro an ki miya lworo.
Agikki me tic
15I ŋe tic pi nino pyerabic wiye aryo tic me gero cel otum woko, i nino dwe
pyeraryo wiye abic me dwe me Elul .
16I kare ma lumerokwa ma gibedo i rok murumowa guwinyo lok man, ci lworo
omakogi ma komgi oto woko lirut; pien dano acel acel onoŋo oŋeyo atir ni tic
man otine pi kony pa Lubaŋa.
17Ento i kare-nu ducu ludito pa Lujudaya gubedo ka coyo waraga mapol gucwalo
bot Tobia, ki Tobia bene coyo waraga cwalo botgi.
18Lwak mapol ma i Juda onoŋo gitye tuŋ bote ma gucikke bote ki kwoŋo kwoŋ,
dok en onoŋo obedo oro Cekania ma wod pa Ara. Dok wode Yekokanan bene
onoŋo yam onyomo nya pa Meculam wod pa Berekia.
19Jo mogo bene guloko i nyima lok kom tic maber ma Tobia yam otiyo, ka
gidwoko bote lok ducu ma an awaco botgi, Tobia yam omedde ki cwalo waraga
bota pi miyo lworo bota.
Nekemia 7
Nekemia oyero luloc ci oketogi i Jerucalem
1Ka tic me gero cel doŋ otum, ma aketo doggola lalor dogcel ducu, aketo lugwok-
doggola, ki luwer, ka dok ayero Lulevi aketogi i dog ticgi,
2ci aketo jo aryo me loyo gaŋ me Jerucalem, omera Kanani, ki Anania, ma ladit wi
mony ma loyo gaŋ me cel gogo. Anania obedo dano ma genne, dok ŋat ma lworo
Lubaŋa makato lwak mukene-gu ducu.
3Ci awaco botgi ni, “Pe wuwek giyab dogcel me Jerucalem nie ka ceŋ doŋ odoko
lyet, ka dok gilor dogcel woko giceggi ki rii ma noŋo pud peya lukur-piny guweko
dog ticgi ma ceŋ cito ka poto. Ka dok bene atito botgi ni guyer lukur-piny ki i kin
lwak ma gibedo i Jerucalem, ci guketgi i dog tic ma mitte, dano acel acel myero
obed i kabedone, kun kuro piny ka ma okemme ki ode kikome.”
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
811
4Gaŋ meno onoŋo lac dok dit mada, ento jo ma gibedo iye onoŋo pe gidwoŋ, dok
onoŋo pud peya gigero odi mapol iye.
Wel dano ma gudwogo cen ki opii
(Ejira 2.1-70)
5Lubaŋa dok oketo tam i cwinya me guro lwak, rwodi ki ludito ma giloyo wi lwak
kacel, wek gico nyiŋgi i buk me tekwarogi. Ci anoŋo i buk me tekwaro nyiŋ jo ma
gilubo jo mukwoŋo dwogo cen ki i opii, anoŋo gicoyo nyiŋgi kit man:
6Magi gin aye lwak ma gibedo i lobo Juda ma ceŋ gudwogo cen ki i opii ka ma
yam Nebukadnejar kabaka me Babilon oterogi iye macalo lumabuc.
7Gin gudwogo kacel ki Jerubabel, ki Yecwa, Nekemia, Ajaria, Raamia, Nakamani,
Mordekai, Bilcan, Micperet, Bigvai, Nekum, ki Baana. Man aye wel co ma i kin jo
Icrael.
8Likwayo pa Paroc, alip aryo ki miya acel ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
9Likwayo pa Cepatia, miya adek ki pyerabiro wiye aryo.
10Likwayo pa Ara, miya abicel ki pyerabic wiye aryo.
11Likwayo pa Pakat-moab, ma gin aye likwayo pa Yecwa ki Joab, alip aryo ki miya
aboro ki apar wiye aboro.
12Likwayo pa Elam, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
13Likwayo pa Jatu, miya aboro ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
14Likwayo pa Jakaj, miya abiro ki pyerabicel.
15Likwayo pa Binui, miya abicel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aboro.
16Likwayo pa Bebai, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
17Likwayo pa Ajgad, alip aryo ki miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
18Likwayo pa Adonikam, miya abicel ki pyerabicel wiye abiro.
19Likwayo pa Bigvai, alip aryo ki pyerabicel wiye abiro.
20Likwayo pa Adin, miya abicel ki pyerabic wiye abic.
21Likwayo pa Ater, ma en aye likwayo pa Kejekia, pyeraboŋwen wiye aboro.
22Likwayo pa Kacum, miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
23Likwayo pa Bejai, miya adek ki pyeraryo wiye aŋwen.
24Likwayo pa Karip miya acel ki apar wiye aryo.
25Likwayo pa Gibeon, pyeraboŋwen wiye abic.
26Jo Beterekem kacel ki jo Netopa, miya acel ki pyeraboro wiye aboro.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
812
27Jo Anatot, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aboro.
28Jo Betajimavet, pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
29Jo Kiriatarim, jo Kepira, ki jo Beerot, miya abiro ki pyeraŋwen wiye adek.
30Jo Rama ki jo Geba, miya abicel ki pyeraryo wiye acel.
31Jo Mikmac, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye aryo.
32Jo Betel ki jo Ai, miya acel ki pyeraryo wiye adek.
33Jo Nebo mukene-ne, pyerabic wiye aryo.
34Jo Elam mukene-ne, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyerabic wiye aŋwen.
35Likwayo pa Karim, miya adek ki pyeraryo.
36Jo Jeriko, miya adek ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
37Jo Lod, jo Kadid, ki jo Ono, miya abiro ki pyeraryo wiye acel.
38Jo Cenaa, alip adek ki miya aboŋwen ki pyeradek.
39Man aye wel ajwagi: likwayo pa Jedaya, ma i dog ot pa Yecwa, miya aboŋwen ki
pyerabiro wiye adek.
40Likwayo pa Imer, alip acel ki pyerabic wrye aiyo.
41Likwayo pa Packur, alip acel ki miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abiro.
42Likwayo pa Karim, alip acel ki apar wiye abiro.
43Man aye wel Lulevi: likwayo pa Yecwa ki Kadmiel, ma i kin likwayo pa Kodeva,
pyerabiro wiye aŋwen.
468
44Luwer ma gin likwayo pa Acap, miya acel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aboro.
45Likwayo pa lugwok-doggola ma gin aye likwayo pa Calum, likwayo pa Ater,
likwayo pa Talmon, likwayo pa Akub, likwayo pa Katita, likwayo pa Cobai, gin
ducu onoŋo giromo miya acel ki pyeradek wiye aboro.
46Magi gin aye lutic i ot pa Lubaŋa: likwayo pa Jika, likwayo pa Kacupa, likwayo
pa Tabaot,
47likwayo pa Keroc, likwayo pa Cia, likwayo pa Padon,
48likwayo pa Lebana, likwayo pa Agaba, likwayo pa Camlai,
49likwayo pa Kanan, likwayo pa Gidel, likwayo pa Gakar,
50likwayo pa Reaya, likwayo pa Rejin, likwayo pa Nekoda,
51likwayo pa Gajam, likwayo pa Uja, likwayo pa Pacea,
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
813
52likwayo pa Becai, likwayo pa Meunim, likwayo pa Nepucecim,
53likwayo pa Bakbuk, likwayo pa Akupa, likwayo pa Arur,
54likwayo pa Bajlit, likwayo pa Mekida, likwayo pa Arca,
55likwayo pa Barkoc, likwayo pa Cicera, likwayo pa Tema,
56likwayo pa Nejia, ki likwayo pa Katipa.
57Likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon gin ene: likwayo pa Cotai, likwayo pa Coperet,
likwayo pa Perida,
58likwayo pa Jaala, likwayo pa Darkon, likwayo pa Gidel,
59likwayo pa Cepatia, likwayo pa Katil, likwayo pa Poceret-kajebaim, ki likwayo
pa Amon.
60Jo ma gitiyo i ot pa Lubaŋa ki likwayo pa lutic pa Solomon, onoŋo welgi romo
miya adek ki pyeraboŋwen wiye aryo.
61Magi aye gin jo ma gubino ma gua ki i Tel-mela, Tel-karca, Kerub, Adon ki Imer,
ento onoŋo pe gitwero nyuto dog odi pa kwarogi, ka ce onoŋo yam gin jo Icrael:
62likwayo pa Delaya, likwayo pa Tobia, ki likwayo pa Nekoda, gin ducu miya
abicel ki pyeraŋwen wiye aryo.
63Dok jo magi gitye i kin likwayo pa ajwagi: likwayo pa Kobaya, likwayo pa Kakoj,
likwayo pa Baŋilai ma yam onyomo dakone ki i kin anyira pa Baŋilai ma jo
Gilead; yam gilwoŋo en ki nyiŋgi.
64Gin gubedo ka yenyo nyiŋgi i kin lwak nyiŋ ma gicoyogi i buk me tekwaro, ento
pe gunoŋo iye nyiŋgi, omiyo gikwanyogi woko ki i kin ajwagi calo jo ma komgi ki
keni.
65 Laloyo otito botgi ni gin pe gunywak camo cam maleŋ makato, nio waŋ ma
ajwaka binen ma bipenyo dog Rwot ki Urim ki Tumim.
66Lwak ma gucokke ducu welgi romo alip pyeraŋwen wiye aryo ki miya adek ki
pyerabicel,
67ma pe gikwano iye lwak luticgi ki aŋecagi ma welgi romo alip abiro ki miya
adek ki pyeradek wiye abiro. Onoŋo gitye bene ki luwer ma co ki ma mon miya
aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic.
68Aguraguragi yam tye miya abiro ki pyeradek wiye abicel, ki kanagi maditone
miya aryo ki pyeraŋwen wiye abic
69kinagagi romo miya aŋwen ki pyeradek wiye abic, ki kanagi romo alip abicel ki
miya abiro ki pyeraryo.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
814
70I kare meno jo mogo ma i kin ludito wi kaka ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi
gumiyo kony me lim pi gero ot pa Lubaŋa. Laloyo omiyo lim i ot kano lim ma
romo darik me jabu alip acel, becen pyerabic, ki boŋŋi aruka pa ajwagi ma romo
miya abic ki pyeradek.
71Jo mogo ma i kin ludito wi kaka ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi bene gumiyo lim
i ot kano lim pi tic, lim ma roino darik me jabu alip pyeraryo ki mina me ryal alip
aryo ki miya aryo.
72Jo mukene mudoŋŋe gumiyo lim ma romo darik me jabu alip pyeraryo, ki mina
me ryal alip aryo, ki boŋŋi aruka pa ajwagi ma romo pyerabicel wiye abiro.
73 Ajwagi, Lulevi, ki lugwok-doggola, luwer, ki jo mogo mukene, lutic i ot pa
Lubaŋa ki jo Icrael ducu gubedo i gaŋigi.
Nekemia 8
1I kare ma dwe me abiro oromo, onoŋo jo Icrael doŋ gitye i gaŋigi. Ci lwak
gucokke ki cwiny acel i dyekal ma i nyim Dogcel me Pii; ci gutito bot Ejira ma
lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa ni okel buk me cik pa Moses ma yam Lubaŋa omiyo bot jo
Icrael.
2Ci Ejira okelo buk me cik i nyim cokke, ma tye iye co ki mon ki jo ducu ma yam
giromo winyone ki niaŋ iye maber, i nino dwe mukwoŋo me dwe me abiro.
3Ejira ocako kwanone i nyimgi, kun ocuŋ okemo dyekal ma i nyim Dogcel me Pii-
ni, ocako kwanone odiko nio wa dyeceŋ, kun kwano i nyim co ki mon ducu ki jo
ma gitwero niaŋ lokke maber, kun dano ducu guciko itgi ka winyo lok ma i buk
me cik.
4Ejira ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa ocuŋ i wi abam bao ma gitiyo pi kwano lok
meno, Jo magi yam gucuŋ ka ŋete tuŋ lacuc, Matitia, Cema, Anaya, Uria, Ilkia, ki
Maceya; ka dok jo magi gucuŋ ka ŋete tuŋ lacam, Pedaya, Micael, Malkija, Kacum,
Kacbadana, Jekaria, ki Meculam.
5I kare ma Ejira ocuŋ malo ka maleŋ i kabedo me kwano buk, lwak ducu guciko
waŋgi i kome, Oyabo buk ci dano ducu gua malo gucuŋ.
6Ejira okwoŋo ki pwoyo Rwot, Lubaŋa madit; ci lwak ducu gugamo ni, “Amen,
Amen,” kun giriŋo ciŋgi malo; ka dok guryebbe piny, ci guworo Rwot ma gukulo
wigi piny i ŋom.
7Ka dok lwak gucuŋ i kabedogi, ci Lulevi magi: Yecwa, Bani, Cerebia, Jamin, Akub,
Cebetai, Kodia, Maceya, Kelita, Ajaria, Jojabad, Kanan, ki Pelaya, gukonyo lwak me
niaŋ te cik maber, kun onoŋo lwak gubedo i kabedogi mot.
8Gukwano lok me cik nia ki i buk me cik, en aye buk me cik pa Lubaŋa, dok
gugonyo te lokke matir bot lwak, wek guniaŋ lok ma gikwano.
Acoli Baibul
© 1985, Bible Society of Uganda.
815
9Ka lwak doŋ guwinyo lok ma gikwano ki i buk me cik, gucako koko cut. Ci
Nekemia ma onoŋo en laloc, ki Ejira ma onoŋo ajwaka dok bene lapwony-cik pa
Lubaŋa, kacel ki Lulevi ma gupwonyo lwak guwaco bot lwak ni, “Man aye nino
maleŋ bot Rwot Lubaŋawa; pe wukum dok bene pe wukoki.”
10Dok owaco botgi ni, “Doŋ wuwot, wucit wucam moo ki wumat koŋo vino
maliŋo, wucwal cam mogo bot dano mo ma pe ki cam; pien tin aye nino maleŋ
bot Rwotwa; pien yomcwiny pa Rwot en aye tek mewu.”
11Lulevi gujuko dano guliŋ mot, kun giwacci “Wubed mot laliŋ, pien man aye nino
maleŋ; pe wubed ki cwercwiny.”
12Lwak guket gucito i gaŋigi ka cam ki ka mat, dok gucwalo cam mogo ma gitye
kwede bot luwotgi mukene, pi bedo ki yomcwiny madwoŋ, pien guwinyo lok ma
gikwano gitito botgi ci guniaŋ maber.
13I kom nino me aryone ludito ma giloyo dog odi pa kwarogi ma i kin lwak ducu,
kacel ki ajwagi ki Lulevi, gucito bot Ejira ma lapwony-cik pa Lubaŋa pi ŋiyo lok
